大失败 As failure, but the target doesn't consider water a danger and will enter an area of water even if it can't swim or breathe water. If it is attacked by the kelpie or starts to drown, it can attempt a new save at the start of its next turn, but it isn't freed automatically.

kj7lFKS7xdj7h83n.name: Change Shape
kj7lFKS7xdj7h83n.description:
The kelpie can take on the appearance of any Medium or Large animal of an equine nature (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.In2nNwo3JL1RXQhj]{Horse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.z39LYFGYmOsoGVSh]{Hippocampus}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.YUk9S6caKqheRsUQ]{Pony}), or any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speeds or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Korred.name: Korred
Korred.publicNotes: Korreds are reclusive fey in the form of small, hirsute individuals with long, animated manes of hair. While korreds have a natural affinity and admiration for stones and boulders, they prefer to dwell aboveground in areas of rocky forest or wooded hills rather than in caves. Korreds are a private people who don't take kindly to intruders, and they invariably work to drive off or kill any non-fey who stumble into their territory. Staunchly proud of their hair, korreds choose their minimal attire so as to allow their body hair to flow freely, often wearing only a belt with a pouch for throwing rocks and trimming shears-though this belt and pouch are rarely visible under their wild manes.
Korred.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

7j5ta80hcHB60jDE.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

VFViUEQww0BRVE03.name: 塑石术(随意施法) Shape Stone (At will)
VFViUEQww0BRVE03.description:
你将目标石块变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形过程十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。当你塑形一个石头时，站在其上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技（Acrobatics）检定。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标在石头上 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} 。

大失败 该生物从石头上摔落（如可能）并且倒地着地。

mkhUcjzL4QL7a659.name: 粉碎音波(随意施法) Shatter (At will)
mkhUcjzL4QL7a659.description:
高频音波攻击击碎附近的一件物体。你对该物体造成2d10音波伤害，如果物体的硬度为4或者更低，忽视该硬度。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，法术所能忽视的硬度增加2。

HKqAzVBtd2gZsgNk.name: Pouch
HKqAzVBtd2gZsgNk.description: A sack can hold up to 8 Bulk worth of items. A sack containing 2 Bulk or less can be worn on the body, usually tucked into a belt. You can carry a sack with one hand, but must use two hands to transfer items in and out.

K80GtqxqKN7Og68w.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

BdJy1HqrIlkJp8rF.name: Animated Hair
BdJy1HqrIlkJp8rF.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The korred's long, animated hair reaches out and interferes with creatures in the area. The korred can select which targets are affected by their animated hair. An affected creature that ends its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} on a critical failure) as long as it remains in the aura.

zglT7mSqeYfcswev.name: Hair Snare
zglT7mSqeYfcswev.description:
The korred causes a long, tangled length of their hair to detach from their body and snake out to coil around an adjacent creature. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21] save.

The korred cannot use Hair Snare again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The hair wraps around the creature. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all of its Speeds until it Escapes (DC 21) or until the korred uses Hair Snare again (at which point the previous snare drops to the ground, no longer animated).

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} until it Escapes (DC 21) or the korred uses Hair Snare again.

fPGmCfWuF8oqK8hX.name: Otherworldly Laugh
fPGmCfWuF8oqK8hX.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The korred unleashes an otherworldly laugh. Each non-fey creature within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} on a critical failure).

oIucCyy3YvC5FoCA.name: Stone Stride
oIucCyy3YvC5FoCA.description: The korred steps into a block of stone large enough for them to fit inside and instantly teleports to any other stone within 30 feet that has the same minimum size. Once the korred enters the stone, they instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large stones within 30尺。 They can exit from the original stone, if they prefer. They can't carry extradimensional spaces with them when they Stone Stride; if the korred attempts to do so, Stone Stride fails.

Leng Spider.name: Leng Spider
Leng Spider.publicNotes: The monstrous, bloated spiders from the windswept realm of Leng build eerie, dangerous lairs with the aid of magically compelled slaves. Leng spiders have anywhere from five to 13 legs, but never an even number.
Leng Spider.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Leng Spider.senses: 黑暗视觉, detect magic, greater web sense

QoW8rIq8ikH4Ebpr.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

ZwTQYhVwvbqvzaHX.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
ZwTQYhVwvbqvzaHX.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

TanTXAIbWmvfNYpc.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
TanTXAIbWmvfNYpc.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

YGVlqNtd12h0Jimh.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
YGVlqNtd12h0Jimh.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

iw7xcu7OkpYHYyQ2.name: Greater Web Sense
iw7xcu7OkpYHYyQ2.description: While touching its webs, the Leng spider has precise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{震颤感知 Tremorsense} to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

KJKzoE0ci2sMwyFX.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

snsO2nPGYHe6pZx0.name: Create Web Weaponry
snsO2nPGYHe6pZx0.description: The Leng spider creates a weapon by applying a cord of webbing to heavy objects, such as rocks or chunks of metal, either attaching two heavy objects together to create a web bola or fastening one to its leg to create a web war flail.

0hkOF2WHkLhHAEjQ.name: Descend on a Web
0hkOF2WHkLhHAEjQ.description:
The Leng spider moves straight down up to 120尺, suspended by a web line. It can hang from the web or drop off. The distance it Descends on a Web doesn't count when calculating falling damage.

The web can be severed by a Strike that deals slashing damage (AC 30, Hardness 15, 25 HP), causing the Leng spider to fall.

sWbaqjXgO4EigI5j.name: Lay Web Trap
sWbaqjXgO4EigI5j.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The Leng spider spins a web within 20 feet of itself to create a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TFnr9Gq7VXPJu0GQ]{Grasping Snare}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.a2XaerM1KkPyLIPM]{Stunning Snare}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XU8u9F3uoesGDjgM]{Warning Snare}. The Leng spider's web provides all the raw materials it needs. All save and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DCs associated with web traps use the Leng spider's Crafting DC for traps (DC 36). A web trap decays after 24 hours.

k4tbzCH8jMb0d1Qk.name: Leng Spider Venom
k4tbzCH8jMb0d1Qk.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1轮); the confused effect has the emotion and mental traits.

iZxDrmolCkhIxWO6.name: Ranged Trip
iZxDrmolCkhIxWO6.description: A Leng spider can use a web bola to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip} a target with the Athletics skill. The skill check takes a -2 circumstance penalty. A web bola deals no damage when used to Trip.

Leprechaun.name: Leprechaun
Leprechaun.publicNotes:
Leprechauns are mostly jovial tricksters who prefer mischief over conflict. They fill their days with as much fun, wine, and food as possible. Mostly found in forested regions, leprechauns respect nature and those who protect it.

Leprechauns do not attack on sight. Rather, they engage in conversation and try to charm, cajole, or trick those they meet into doing favors for them or freely giving over a treasured item, usually in return for illusory wealth or false promises of wealth and success. These small tricksters are masters at discerning the desires of those they meet-a knack that puts them in a powerful position when bargaining for goods or favors. They aren't above turning people against each other for their own benefit but generally not to an extent that causes harm.

In most cases, a leprechaun doesn't keep a purloined possession for long. The leprechaun most often returns such stolen prizes just in time to defuse tensions, often as they point out the humor of the situation, hoping to share their amusement and mirth with the victim. In cases where a leprechaun's trick goes too far and results in an incensed victim, the leprechaun quickly flees the conflict rather than engage in combat. This willingness to return stolen goods or to flee from battles fades as leprechauns grow older. Ancient leprechauns who have lived for thousands of years often spiral into dark bitterness and increasingly use their powers and illusions to lure those who offend them or fail to appreciate a joke into danger... or even death.

oqcxPwDIMJ2bu4Ul.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

fUotsbKaORew1RjV.name: 隐形术(仅限自身) Invisibility (Self only)
fUotsbKaORew1RjV.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

qZaBb2z6mE2zLL2u.name: Create Object
qZaBb2z6mE2zLL2u.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The leprechaun produces an item out of their hat, from behind their jacket, from within a hole in a tree stump, or from any other unexpected location. This conjured item must be no more than 1 Bulk and must be made of relatively commonplace material (such as cloth, wood, stone, or even low-value metal like iron or lead). It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a Cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher.

The created object is temporary and lasts for 1 hour or until the leprechaun creates a new item, whichever comes first.

ixXRVHF3jg0IMuKw.name: Leprechaun Magic
ixXRVHF3jg0IMuKw.description: When a leprechaun uses their innate spells to deceive, trick, or humiliate a creature, the spell DC increases to 20 and the attack modifier to +11.

Lerritan.name: Lerritan
Lerritan.publicNotes: Lerritans are unstoppable giants with skin of volcanic glass and blood of roiling lava. These malicious arsonists would see the world burned to a cinder. They pay homage to Ymeri, the evil elemental demigod of fire, and they bully other fiery creatures. When the urge to immolate grows too great to ignore, lerritans burn forests, destroy villages, and boil rivers, but they avoid large bodies of water.

ej30s3gZXMNhiGRr.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

71Z5UP7uzcvxSIy9.name: 异界传送() Plane Shift (To the Material Plane, Plane of Fire, or Plane of Earth only)
71Z5UP7uzcvxSIy9.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

aTZDvupAiIZ4j3su.name: +3 Greater Striking Warhammer
aTZDvupAiIZ4j3su.description: This weapon has a wooden shaft ending in a 大型, heavy metal head. Thehead of the hammer might be single‑sided or double‑sided, but it's always capable of delivering powerful bludgeoning blows.

cb6s0BQEA2EVpswg.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

nszzMLENLPQ4zPoa.name: Tenacious Flames
nszzMLENLPQ4zPoa.description:
100尺。

Creatures in the emanation cannot recover from persistent fire damage.

mY1TZIEvZh0l0OBD.name: 投石 Throw Rock
mY1TZIEvZh0l0OBD.description:
A lerritan can break stony scales off its body to throw; these scales reform at the end of each round, so the lerritan is never without a supply of rocks to hurl.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ThrowRock]

JGXYh66auv2dCHDv.name: Volcanic Eruption
JGXYh66auv2dCHDv.description:
The volcano on the lerritan's back erupts and sends lava bombs raining down in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], dealing [[/r {12d12}[fire]]]{12d12火焰伤害}.

Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:46|traits:damaging-effect] saving throw. The lava globules quickly cool into heavy stones, transforming the area into greater difficult terrain for non-lerritans.

The lerritan can't use for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{超载 Encumbered} for 1 round.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} (逃脱 DC 46).

大失败 The creature takes double damage and is encased in a rocky crust with lava on the inside. The creature is restrained (逃脱 DC 46), can't breathe, takes [[/r {3d12}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}, and can't recover from this persistent fire damage until freed.

Leucrotta.name: Leucrotta
Leucrotta.publicNotes: The vile and vicious offspring of a demon lord and a monstrous species of hyenas, leucrottas are intelligent and cruel beasts. They use their astounding vocal mimicry to lure unsuspecting creatures near so that they can first torment and then devour them. Leucrottas measure 5 feet at the shoulder and weigh 800 pounds, and they are perpetually filthy. A leucrotta's oversized jaws are lined with rows of jagged, hardened bony ridges rather than teeth, and it can shear through flesh, bone, and even steel with ease.
Leucrotta.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

kBxRAEuGBWNPM636.name: Language Adaptation
kBxRAEuGBWNPM636.description: A leucrotta can learn any language it hears spoken for at least 10 minutes, adding it to its languages known and replacing the language it previously learned using this ability. Typically, a leucrotta knows Gnoll as the language granted by this ability.

obCe64sZedFgSWGQ.name: Luring Cry
obCe64sZedFgSWGQ.description:
60尺

需求 The leucrotta's last action was Sound Mimicry

效果 The leucrotta utters a plaintive cry to draw its prey closer. Each creature within the emanation that was deceived by Sound Mimicry must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:19] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} and compelled to move toward the sound of the leucrotta's voice on their turn. Fascinated creatures are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}.

If the leucrotta attacks, the fascinated condition ends only for the creature that is attacked. If the leucrotta speaks a creature's name while using its Luring Cry, that creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to their saving throw to resist the ability.

On a successful save, a creature is temporarily immune to Luring Cry for 24 hours.

H7lzbseyLDhs5Tp3.name: Sound Mimicry
H7lzbseyLDhs5Tp3.description: The leucrotta perfectly imitates voices and speech and attempts a Deception check against listeners' Will DC to fool them. The leucrotta gains a +4 bonus to this Deception check if it has listened to the creature it's imitating for at least 10 minutes at any point in the last 24 hours. The leucrotta can't duplicate voice-based abilities or spells, though it can perfectly mimic the sound of verbal spellcasting and can attempt to deceive constructs or undead that respond to voice commands. The leucrotta can't imitate speech in languages it doesn't know.

Living Boulder.name: Living Boulder
Living Boulder.publicNotes: Living boulders roll and glide through the Plane of Earth, gathering gemstones and metal shards until their surfaces resemble a ship's hull covered in barnacles. Barely more intelligent than many animals, living boulders fill much the same role on the Plane of Earth as the great herd animals found on Material Plane worlds.

1fTRsJAGDuFgPeXF.name: Earth Glide
1fTRsJAGDuFgPeXF.description: A living boulder can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{掘地 Burrow} through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

MJIrkULpmp4soA0F.name: Rolling Charge
MJIrkULpmp4soA0F.description: The living boulder Strides twice, and can then make a Strike with its jaws. This jaws Strike gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

Living Thunderclap.name: Living Thunderclap
Living Thunderclap.publicNotes: A living thunderclap is a humanoid-shaped storm cloud that cracks and booms with thunder.

RwPr1Ik2tKeFrL0r.name: Swiftness
RwPr1Ik2tKeFrL0r.description: The living thunderclap doesn't trigger reactions when it moves.

KvQg0sUQsjltpY39.name: Thunderbolt
KvQg0sUQsjltpY39.description:
The living thunderclap emits a bolt of lightning that crashes with deafening thunder. The living thunderclap makes a lightning bolt Strike that deals [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12电击伤害}. If it hits, the target and any creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] around the target take [[/r {2d6}[sonic]]]{2d6音波伤害} and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|basic:true] save.

Any creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Lunar Naga.name: Lunar Naga
Lunar Naga.publicNotes:
Lunar nagas are skilled diviners and astrologers whose dark scales and white hair sparkle with motes of light that mimic the night skies to which they are forever drawn. While they are less physically imposing than other nagas, they possess a graceful beauty that many find entrancing, even without the help of the naga's inherent magical abilities. Earning a lunar naga's trust is difficult, but not impossible, especially for someone who shares the creature's interest in the celestial sphere.

As they have no hands, lunar nagas use mage hand to manipulate delicate instruments and fine telescopes to observe the night sky. They track the positions of celestial bodies, recording their discoveries in esoteric journals. At their best, lunar nagas are wise and mysterious beings who seek to expand their knowledge of the cosmos. At their worst, after too much exposure to the unfathomable entities that dwell in the darkness between the stars, they become dark prophets who drive others to commit terrible deeds in the name of abominable masters.

On Golarion, the lunar nagas of the nation of Nagajor use their abilities to serve many communities as soothsayers. A few have founded observatories in which they and their followers explore the night sky. Some nagas even use their knowledge of the stars as navigators on ships or overland caravans. In the broader world, where people do not give nagas deference as nearly divine rulers, lunar nagas try to avoid contact with outsiders or use their magical powers of disguise to hide their true forms from all but their most worthy allies.

OYGTYAiWBb7ORaF1.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
OYGTYAiWBb7ORaF1.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

ipGw6L7E6GUS565c.name: Hypnosis
ipGw6L7E6GUS565c.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The lunar naga twists the coils of their serpentine body, causing the starlike motes on their scales to shift and move as they glow brighter, creating a mesmerizing swirl of light and darkness. All creatures within a 30.foot emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} until the end of the naga's next turn (on a critical failure, fascinated creatures drop whatever items they are carrying as well). The lunar naga can Sustain a Spell on Hypnosis. If the naga moves, affected creatures are compelled to remain within 30 feet of the naga and must spend each of its actions moving closer to the naga as expediently as possible on its next turn. If a creature is unable to end its turn within 30 feet of the naga, the effect ends for that creature.

OxPw5pr9S1edjy8S.name: Lunar Naga Venom
OxPw5pr9S1edjy8S.description:
豁免检定 DC 24

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 如阶段1 (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1轮). Once a creature falls unconscious from lunar naga venom, they remain asleep for [[/r 1d8 #hours]]{1d8小时} unless woken.

Lurker In Light.name: Lurker In Light
Lurker In Light.publicNotes:
These malicious and strange fey appear as fairies about 2 feet tall, with insectile wings, large eyes, and bulbous heads. They slaughter and cause mischief in a pattern only their alien intellect understands, but they've been seen to take particular umbrage against dwarves, gnomes, and creatures who live in darkness. With their grudges and pursuit of their own wicked and sadistic whims, lurkers in light deftly overturn the conventional wisdom that creatures associated with light are benign and friendly.

While lurkers in light are fey and have ties to the First World, these creatures are often found elsewhere in the Great Beyond. They are particularly fond of invading the Shadow Plane to bring light to those who dwell there-not to help, but to spread misery and pain among those to whom light is agonizing.

ctRDT8yPATnd3gxe.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

tLyD1GZ9Oz7JtF5e.name: 次元门() Dimension Door (Only when in bright light, and only to an area in bright light)
tLyD1GZ9Oz7JtF5e.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

bEAhPwJXnrqxPt5i.name: Blend with Light
bEAhPwJXnrqxPt5i.description:
触发 The lurker in light uses a move action

需求 The lurker in light is in an area of bright light

效果 The lurker in light becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} until it enters an area of dim light or darkness, or until it uses a hostile action.

7ibCw6e1BSbQ94NW.name: Lurker's Glow
7ibCw6e1BSbQ94NW.description:
A creature that takes damage from a lurker in light's mote of light must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to lurker's glow for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is lined in golden light for 1 minute and can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} during this time. If the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}, it is concealed rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

大失败 As failure, but the creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot emanation for the duration of the effect. In addition, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} on its first turn after failing this save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.6E8bOkwFzFuQ3ZAw]{效果: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure)}

v2by5D3cMGyVu78a.name: Ritual Gate
v2by5D3cMGyVu78a.description:
需求 The lurker in light has reduced a living creature to 0 Hit Points on this turn or its previous turn and has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hs7h8f4Z1ZNdUt3s]{Summon Fey} innate spell available

效果 The lurker in light casts summon fey with only a verbal component, using the act of slaughter to replace the normal material and somatic components for the spell. If the fey creature summoned has the same alignment as the lurker in light, the lurker in light can sustain the summon fey spell for up to 1 hour instead of 1 minute.

nQV7pNdpGD2GDrgl.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
nQV7pNdpGD2GDrgl.description:
A lurker in light's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Magma Scorpion.name: Magma Scorpion
Magma Scorpion.publicNotes: Whether skittering through Abyssal wastelands or basking in the searing sand of the deepest deserts, magma scorpions have charred carapaces constantly emitting vision-warping waves of heat.

1jqzGUINJJfVCKfu.name: Smoke Vision
1jqzGUINJJfVCKfu.description: The magma scorpion ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

YJzGe5kr1qCZKV34.name: Magma Scorpion Venom
YJzGe5kr1qCZKV34.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}

Manta Ray.name: Manta Ray
Manta Ray.publicNotes: While manta rays might appear daunting, they are generally docile. Manta rays are found in temperate or tropical oceans, and they generally stay in the upper reaches or at the surface of deeper waters. These rays are filter feeders that subsist on plankton. They can also eat larger fish or aquatic creatures as the need arises, but rarely attack anything Small or larger. Many underwater cultures, particularly aquatic elves, raise and farm manta rays to serve as messengers, beasts of burden, or even pets. Manta rays don't make particularly good mounts, but some aquatic civilizations use them to draw underwater carriages.

u1o4MqU6HFWR8rVh.name: Electrolocation
u1o4MqU6HFWR8rVh.description: A manta ray in water can use its electrolocation as an imprecise sense at the listed range to detect living creatures that are in the same body of water as itself.

RkzJDhpWzxqQXiAq.name: Strafing Rush
RkzJDhpWzxqQXiAq.description: The manta ray Swims, making one tail Strike at any point along the way. The Strike deals half damage.

DDI0cQeKx8SLhTUR.name: Swift Swimmer
DDI0cQeKx8SLhTUR.description: The manta ray Swims twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these actions.

Marrmora.name: Marrmora
Marrmora.publicNotes:
On the First World, marrmoras dwell in ruined wildlands perpetually scourged by fire and rarely, if ever, travel elsewhere. When a wildfire devastates a wilderness region on the Material Plane and results in the death of other fey, marrmoras can be drawn across the planar boundary to revel in the resulting destruction. They seek to reignite the fires that beckoned them, to gather up and feed upon the charred remains of those who perished within (particularly the bodies of dead fey), though they do grow homesick if they spend too much time away from the First World. They are burdened by a capricious but persistent rage and are unfailingly cruel. While they are capable of negotiation and intelligent interaction, they almost never bargain in good faith and typically interact with others only as a means to more efficiently spread their fiery devastation.

A marmorra's twisted appearance evokes the look of an arboreal whose bark has been burnt down to charcoal. They have nearly featureless faces and hands ending in long, sharp claws. Their broken flesh looks like charcoal‑burnt wood, riddled with cracks that still glow with an unwholesome heat. They trail ash wherever they walk, and wisps of smoke curl off of their bodies. Though marrmoras enjoy the sight of any woodland and its inhabitants roasting in the flames of their carefully curated fires, there is little that brings more pleasure to a marrmora than the sight of good-aligned plant creatures cooking to a crisp.

bYqHLnt7oqthGfZi.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

ftyJjjKcXegKOZO6.name: 元素形态(仅限火元素) Elemental Form (Fire Elemental only)
ftyJjjKcXegKOZO6.description:
你唤来位面的能量，转变为中性元素战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择气、土、火、或者水。处于该形态时，你获得对应的特征以及元素特征。在该战斗形态中你有手，并且能进行操作行动。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=19+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 10临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{攻击 Strike}。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+18、你的伤害加值为+9。这些基于敏捷（气或者火）或者基于力量（土或者水）。如果你对应的无武装攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该调整值。
  • 特技（气或者火）或者运动（土或者水）调整值+20；如果你本身的调整值更高，忽略该改变。

你也会根据你选择的元素类型获得特定能力：

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.DliizYpHcmBG130w]{气 Air}
    • 飞行速度 80尺，移动不会触发反应动作;
    • 近战 1 暴风, 伤害 1d4 钝击.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8eWLR0WCf5258z8X]{土 Earth}
    • 速度20尺，掘地速度 20尺;
    • 近战 1 拳, 伤害 2d10 钝击.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.phIoucsDa3iplMm2]{火 Fire}
    • 速度 50尺； 火焰抗力 10，对寒冷和水弱点5;
    • 近战 1 触须 , 伤害 1d8 火焰加 [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.kxMBdANwCcF841uA]{水 Water}
    • 速度20尺，游泳速度 60尺； 火焰抗力 5;
    • 近战 1 波浪, 伤害 1d12 钝击并且你可以在命中后立即花费一个动作，通过一次成功的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}来推离目标5尺。

升阶 (6环级) 你的战斗形态为大型，并且你的攻击具有10尺触及。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=22+你的等级、15临时生命、攻击调整值+23、伤害加值+13、以及特技或者运动+23。

升阶 (7环级) 的战斗形态为超大型，并且你的攻击具有15尺触及。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=22+你的等级、20临时生命、攻击调整值+25、伤害加值+11并且伤害骰子翻倍（包括 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}），以及特技或者运动+25。

1JQ0EDkjIezvUDEb.name: 树化术(随意施法,外形为烧焦的死树) Tree Shape (At will) (Appears as a burnt, dead tree)
1JQ0EDkjIezvUDEb.description: 你变形为一棵大型树。察觉检定不会发现你的本来形态，但是通过成功的对抗你的法术DC的自然（Nature）或者生存（Survival）检定，可以发现你看起来是个树，但对于该区域而言，崭新到奇怪的程度。在树形态中，你可以观察周围所有事物，但除了使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，来结束该法术且结束你的回合以外，你不能进行任何行动。成为树时，你的AC为20，并且只有状态加值，状态减值，环境加值，和环境减值会影响你。你投出的所有成和和大成功反射豁免均为失败。

iKbhKQt4aD8JDvDd.name: Absorb Flame
iKbhKQt4aD8JDvDd.description:
触发 The marrmora is targeted by a fire spell or effect, or is in the area of a fire effect

效果 The marrmora is healed by the fire damage, regaining Hit Points equal to half the damage the fire effect would have dealt.

EYtHIPWgwGTdjCBp.name: Fascination of Flame
EYtHIPWgwGTdjCBp.description:
30尺。

A creature that enters or begins its turn in this aura's emanation must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:33] save. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature loses any resistance to fire for 1 round.

失败 The creature loses any resistance to fire for 1 hour.

大失败 The creature loses any resistance to fire for 1 hour and gains weakness 15 to fire for the same duration.

TOzSzGQn4MrKg3wy.name: Igniting Assault
TOzSzGQn4MrKg3wy.description:
需求 The marrmora is not under the effect of fire shield

效果 The marrmora makes a claw Strike. If it hits, it can immediately cast one of its available fire shield innate spells as a free action.

Marsh Giant.name: Marsh Giant
Marsh Giant.publicNotes:
Dwellers of brackish coastal salt marshes and fetid bogs and swamps, marsh giants are hideous in appearance indeed, with fishlike mouths, slimy gray-green skin, and dark, beady eyes. They prefer to eat the flesh of those they slay in battle, but many are also cannibals. It is perhaps this vicious behavior that keeps the creatures in check, for if a fellow marsh giant becomes too dangerous and powerful, it runs the risk of being ambushed and consumed by its clan.

Marsh giants are insular and mysterious, dedicating much of their lives to zealous worship of sea-dwelling deities or stranger entities. While there is no central religion followed by all marsh giants, many are known to venerate the demon lord Dagon, while others worship even more powerful monstrosities from the Elder Mythos, such as distant, dreaming Cthulhu.

Only rarely do more than a dozen marsh giants settle together in a location, but when they do it is often for a religious purpose. Whatever call from the deep draws them together also tugs at nearby creatures such as boggards or skum, who look upon marsh giants in fear and reverence. The grim, terrifying chants and screams coming from such an encampment are a sure sign of terror to come for any other residents of the area.

Barely topping 11 feet tall and 1,000 pounds, marsh giants are small for giants but make up for their relatively diminutive stature with their zealotry.

SOapd5GiFsybvQAC.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

Yde51S9ffNgHJlgB.name: 卜筮术 Augury
Yde51S9ffNgHJlgB.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

zkvNDt3HOWSmCOid.name: +1 Striking Gaff
zkvNDt3HOWSmCOid.description: Many marsh giants fight with oversized gaffs-lengths of wood with a single metal spike affixed to the tip. Used often by fisherfolk to land fish, marsh giants use their gaffs as weapons.

vVucSfThIT1iEEjO.name: Hook Shake
vVucSfThIT1iEEjO.description:
需求 A creature adjacent to the marsh giant is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} in water at least 1 foot deep

效果 The marsh giant uses its gaff to shake the creature back and forth and hold it underwater. The giant attempts an Athletics check against the target's Fortitude DC.

大成功 The target takes [[/r {6d6+14}[piercing]]]{6d6+14穿刺伤害} and loses 5 rounds' worth of air if they were holding their breath.

成功 The target takes [[/r {3d6+14}[piercing]]]{3d6+14穿刺伤害} and loses 3 rounds' worth of air if they were holding their breath.

失败 目标不受影响。

大失败 As failure, but the giant drops its gaff as well.

eoLK3mAvvXiMTLnH.name: Twist the Hook
eoLK3mAvvXiMTLnH.description: The marsh giant makes a melee Strike with its gaff. If it hits, it twists and yanks the gaff to create an awful wound, dealing @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed3d6.success] to the creature.

Marut.name: Marut
Marut.publicNotes:
A marut is tasked with hunting mortals who cheat death by artificially extending their lifespans. This includes those who seek undeath, such as liches and vampires, but also includes those who use powerful magic to cling to their youth, use divination to discover and avoid an appointed death, or call too often on the power of resurrection. Once the marut has selected its target, the inevitable pursues its quarry without surcease or deviation until either it or the target is dead.

Maruts seem to be carved from stone and clad in golden armor, yet they move with the deliberate grace of a creature made of flesh and bone. A marut never rushes, but its thunderous footfalls are relentless as it pursues its target. Though able to speak any language, the marut is taciturn even among inevitables.
Marut.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

LfTrwLmDBA7f2MCm.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

nzHApOLkuTxQ7ZED.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
nzHApOLkuTxQ7ZED.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

uBJYf08dJnWbAhyX.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
uBJYf08dJnWbAhyX.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

ARiXN5DX2BVzOvCn.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
ARiXN5DX2BVzOvCn.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

0MEzU0e7MJtwV7WA.name: Truespeech
0MEzU0e7MJtwV7WA.description: A marut can speak with and understand any creature with a language.

MtM4AVZZ5pbVijPC.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

jgUPBrXeWbjnI6f1.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

ezme3D83xTKiLkhR.name: Final End
ezme3D83xTKiLkhR.description: The marut is anathema to beings that unnaturally extend their existence, including undead. Its fists bypass such creatures' resistances to damage and apply the creatures' highest weakness to damage. If a marut kills a creature that rejuvenates, like a lich or ghost, it always knows that the creature isn't fully defeated.

JK7loVXQ7UJJt3F9.name: Fists of Thunder and Lightning
JK7loVXQ7UJJt3F9.description:
Each time the marut makes a fist Strike, it chooses either lightning or thunder.

  • If it chooses lightning, the attack deals an additional [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12电击伤害} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 minute.
  • If it chooses thunder, the attack deals an additional [[/r {3d8}[sonic]]]{3d8音波伤害} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 minute.

Mastodon.name: Mastodon
Mastodon.publicNotes: Not to be confused with the larger mammoth, mastodons are primeval elephants who dwell predominantly in temperate forests. There, they travel in close-knit social groups and feed on the forest vegetation.
Mastodon.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

fJwNiBKQ1mE1NNbz.name: Dual Tusks
fJwNiBKQ1mE1NNbz.description: The mastodon makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the mastodon's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

zVVCyjKNSDxZD2Oy.name: Grabbing Trunk
zVVCyjKNSDxZD2Oy.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the mastodon's trunk is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}. If the mastodon moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.

Megalania.name: Megalania
Megalania.publicNotes: Megalanias, like their smaller cousins the giant monitor lizards, strike fast and use their powerful bite to grip their prey. They prefer to swallow their prey whole rather than risk others getting a bite of a hard-won meal.
Megalania.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

YkuWnKDR7iQkfOh8.name: Megalania Venom
YkuWnKDR7iQkfOh8.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

Meladaemon.name: Meladaemon
Meladaemon.publicNotes: Meladaemons personify death by starvation and thirst, and revel in spreading the same despair that brought about their mortal demise. When they aren't blighting fields, massacring livestock, or tainting water supplies, they experiment on prisoners to study how long creatures can go without sustenance and the deleterious effects that result from such deprivation. Fiercely loyal to Trelmarixian, Horseman of Famine, they serve no other beings. They work alongside other daemons if Trelmarixian wills it, but are notoriously traitorous.
Meladaemon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Meladaemon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 生命感知(模糊感官)30尺

OACmutVuYdHoFbvw.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

8lQzvlhmZk1A0Cgw.name: 魔法飞弹(随意施法) Magic Missile (At will)
8lQzvlhmZk1A0Cgw.description:
你朝你能看见的一个生物射出一个力场飞镖。它自动命中，并造成1d4+1力场伤害。你施放该法术时每额外使用一个动作，你射出的飞弹增加一个，最大为3个动作发射三个飞弹。你为每个飞弹分别选择目标。如果你对同一个目标射击超过一个飞弹，将该伤害加在一起再计算伤害加值，减值，抗力，弱点等。

升阶 (+2) 你花费的每个动作额外射出一枚飞弹。

ARgSXbi7YTyqxDpw.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
ARgSXbi7YTyqxDpw.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

toXHeAIIzSZkh0pV.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At will) (Good only)
toXHeAIIzSZkh0pV.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

RLJbJxbajEsFLapw.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

BmhdDSnmoRYLlefv.name: Consumptive Aura
BmhdDSnmoRYLlefv.description:
20尺。

A meladaemon emanates an aura of intense hunger. Each round a creature begins its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:damaging-effect] save. On a failure, the creature takes [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} ([[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} on a critical failure) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}. This fatigue ends as soon as the creature eats any food.

rx9aGcoGrLLVPzhV.name: Withering Opportunity
rx9aGcoGrLLVPzhV.description:
触发 The meladaemon is attacked by an adjacent creature and the attack misses

效果 The meladaemon swipes at the triggering creature, which must immediately attempt a save against the meladaemon's withering touch.

S8XYYEnqxZeY5C7K.name: Daemonic Famine
S8XYYEnqxZeY5C7K.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

阶段1 carrier (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

阶段4 如阶段3 (1天)

阶段5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} (1天)

阶段6 死亡

ERMHc3Xc7e0s0qGD.name: Withering Touch
ERMHc3Xc7e0s0qGD.description: When the meladaemon hits with a claw Strike or a creature begins its turn grabbed by the meladaemon, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|traits:damaging-effect] save. On a failure, the creature takes [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}. This fatigue ends when the creature drinks.

Melody On The Wind.name: Melody On The Wind
Melody On The Wind.publicNotes: This cloud of song and sound has been caught by the wind and carried across the air. While the melody on the wind might enjoy the beauty of music, it is by nature a destructive elemental force.

T0vnmUhrqmtMKLQD.name: Hostile Duet
T0vnmUhrqmtMKLQD.description:
触发 A hostile creature within 30 feet creates an effect with the auditory trait that provides bonuses to itself or its allies

效果 The melody on the wind recreates the auditory effect, gaining the bonuses for itself and its allies as long as the original effect persists.

rSpxgtewFq1FNp4L.name: Retune
rSpxgtewFq1FNp4L.description:
触发 The melody on the wind is targeted by a spell with the auditory trait

效果 The melody on the wind attempts to counteract the spell. If it succeeds, the spell effect is caught in a blast of wind that sweeps it back to its origin, affecting the caster. Targets of the triggering effect other than the melody on the wind are still affected normally.

RJUajmwcmdSx0tQb.name: Mesmerizing Melody
RJUajmwcmdSx0tQb.description:
The melody on the wind sings in a sonorous chorus. Any creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30] save to resist becoming fascinated by the melody on the wind. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is fascinated for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

rOyG05jMYSlAcSS5.name: Swiftness
rOyG05jMYSlAcSS5.description: The melody on the wind's movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Mist Stalker.name: Mist Stalker
Mist Stalker.publicNotes:
The tentacled mist stalker shrouds itself in a cloak of mist through which its single, never-blinking eye can see with clarity, allowing it an advantage when stalking its prey.

Water elementals that become infused with cold or mist have increased mobility in regions outside of bodies of water.

2PLVvoyanKPQQdYK.name: Mist Cloud
2PLVvoyanKPQQdYK.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The mist stalker is surrounded by mist. Creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}. If wind disperses the aura, it returns automatically at the start of the mist stalker's turn. This cloud is suppressed in water.

sc9sTDDxNEMsTklK.name: 迷雾视域 Mist Vision
sc9sTDDxNEMsTklK.description: The mist stalker ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from mist and fog.

r62684lc4BkUMn7p.name: Solidify Mist
r62684lc4BkUMn7p.description:
The mist stalker makes its mist cloud congeal, causing the aura to be difficult terrain until the start of the mist stalker's next turn.

In addition, the mist stalker can make the mist even thicker around a single Medium or smaller creature within the cloud. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes} or it is no longer in the mist cloud's emanation.

Mohrg.name: Mohrg
Mohrg.publicNotes:
The weight of murder wears heavy on the soul. With souls marked by a lifetime of dealing death, these killers, whether mass murderers, bloodthirsty soldiers, or sadistic executioners, sometimes do not let judgment and lawful execution stanch their slaying sprees. When such individuals are brought to justice, they may rise after death as mohrgs to continue their ruinous work.

Drawn to others of their kind, mohrgs prefer to hunt in small groups, occasionally in partnership with weaker free-willed undead such as shadows and wights. They seek out weak prey and revel in causing drawn-out suffering. Some mohrgs haunt locations they favored in life, reenacting old crimes on new victims. They may even skulk about in public, wearing rags, cloaks, or freshly harvested skins to hide their nature. The most dangerous mohrgs are those who grow powerful enough to no longer fear being struck down again and openly assault settlements in an attempt to turn living towns into mass graves.

Since those slain by a mohrg rise soon thereafter as mohrg spawn, the murders of a mohrg rarely go unnoticed for long, even when they take extra care to prey only on a society's dregs. Since mohrg spawn remain under a mohrg's control, a canny mohrg might order its spawn to remain in hiding to keep its presence secret until a point where it feels confident unleashing its undead army upon a doomed settlement.

Mohrgs retain a twisted sentimentality for the crimes of their mortal life, seeking out trinkets that remind them of favorite murders. When not out hunting, mohrgs arrange their mementos into disturbing shrines. Often, these trinkets are valuable objects, and might even provide important clues to ongoing mysteries.

HXNPKNUC1fSgSuTM.name: Mohrg Spawn
HXNPKNUC1fSgSuTM.description: A living creature slain by a mohrg that had a lower level than the mohrg rises as a mohrg spawn after [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}, on its turn. This mohrg spawn is under the command of the mohrg that created it. If the creator of the mohrg spawn is destroyed, the mohrg spawn is destroyed as well, immediately collapsing into a pile of decayed flesh and bones.

zJ48k7LkzzGzYZXF.name: Paralysis
zJ48k7LkzzGzYZXF.description: A living creature hit by a mohrg's tongue Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.

Monadic Deva.name: Monadic Deva
Monadic Deva.publicNotes: Monadic devas stand vigil along the River of Souls as it passes from the mortal realm into the Ethereal Plane. Those who seek to fish souls out for their own use stalk this metaphysical river, and it is against these predators that monadic devas fight. At other times, monadic devas work to guide newcomers to the River of Souls who might be in danger of drifting from the current and lingering as ghosts. Monadic devas often find their tasks place them in alliances with psychopomps, and they work well with the monitors despite the philosophical divide between their views on a soul's inherent goodness. A monadic deva is 7 feet tall and weighs 220 pounds.
Monadic Deva.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

4R3SAD3faLDXH2p1.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

VjrbFMGP6O3PLlyp.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
VjrbFMGP6O3PLlyp.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

sgAI2bN5p9QHXare.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
sgAI2bN5p9QHXare.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

4O37hYlL21BWJ3M8.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At will) (Evil only)
4O37hYlL21BWJ3M8.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

OlCiQCdanvjrjD3s.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

DmYndlktCCjOahA2.name: Spiritual Warden
DmYndlktCCjOahA2.description:
20尺。

Allies in the aura gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects and effects that target or manipulate their souls.

Ujc2l5skhi8bH1Ue.name: Holy Armaments
Ujc2l5skhi8bH1Ue.description: Any weapon gains the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} property rune while a monadic deva wields it.

vm77jtXXqIjODOmX.name: Rebuke Soul
vm77jtXXqIjODOmX.description:
The monadic deva speaks a word to cause a creature's soul to recoil at its sins or an undead creature to recoil at its lack of a soul. One non-good living or undead target within 40 feet takes [[/r {5d10}[good]]]{5d10善良伤害} and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Regardless of the outcome, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

失败 The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}.

大失败 The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 4}.

sLqxJoKDLd1T2p2i.name: Solid Blow
sLqxJoKDLd1T2p2i.description: When a monadic deva hits a target for the second time during its turn with its mace, it deals an additional [[/r {2d12}[force]]]{2d12力场伤害} as its weapon shimmers with ripples of power.

Moonflower.name: Moonflower
Moonflower.publicNotes:
These enormous plants have thick, knotted trunks festooned with fanged blossoms. A gaping mouth sits at the top of the trunk, capable of swallowing most creatures smaller than the moonflower whole. Moonflowers can move slowly on their powerful roots or use them to attack, but usually they dig them deeply into the surrounding ground and remain stationary to await prey.

Though moonflowers can't speak in the conventional sense, they communicate telepathically with other moonflowers. Explorers who encounter a single moonflower can thus be assured that any other moonflowers in the vicinity will be prepared for them. Those who manage to intercept a moonflower's telepathic communications are assaulted by visions of dreadful, primeval jungles ruled over by titanic plant life. Whether this is some vision of the past or a dream of the future shared by all moonflowers is unknown.

Moonflowers are alien life-forms from a long-dead planet, but their proliferation throughout the galaxy has been ensured through the machinations of the Dominion of the Black, a sinister, alien organization from the dark places between the stars.
Moonflower.languages: 心灵感应1 mile (Other Moonflowers Only)

JVxGmdUEcMuZmGlg.name: Light Pulse
JVxGmdUEcMuZmGlg.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50尺}

The moonflower releases a pulse of bright light. Each non-moonflower creature in the emanation must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save.

The moonflower can't use Light Pulse again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Light Pulse]]{1d4轮}.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Dazzled]]{1d4轮}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Blinded]]{1d4轮}.

6Psn5RSYm8UGDpwM.name: Pod Prison
6Psn5RSYm8UGDpwM.description:
触发 The moonflower has swallowed a creature

效果 The swallowed creature is wrapped in a tight cocoon and extruded from the moonflower's body into an adjacent square. The creature continues to be Swallowed Whole. It can't use Acrobatics to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} a pod, but other creatures can attempt to 破裂the pod. The cocooned creature takes half damage from any damage dealt to the cocoon. Once the cocoon is Ruptured, it deflates and decays.

Uoxf8sSuS6pG7QQF.name: Pod Spawn
Uoxf8sSuS6pG7QQF.description:
Should a Small or larger creature die within a pod prison, the pod transforms into an adult moonflower with full Hit Points after [[/br 1d4 #Moonflower Transformation]]{1d4小时} of growth.

The newly formed moonflower has its own consciousness, but some aspect of its trunk or blossoms resembles the creature that died within. The dead creature's equipment remains inside the new moonflower and can be retrieved if the moonflower is slain.

kjaeBRLTBCSOl9cS.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
kjaeBRLTBCSOl9cS.description:
大型, [[/r {2d10 + 10}[bludgeoning] + {2d6}[acid]]]{2d10 + 10 bludgeoning and 2d6 acid}, 破裂21

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Morlock.name: Morlock
Morlock.publicNotes:
Originating from humans long lost from the world of light, morlocks are brutal monsters that dwell in the tangled tunnels of the upper reaches of the Darklands. Their wiry frames mask the strength of their limbs and their swift reactions, and their arms are long enough that they can drop into an uncanny, four-limbed shuffle for speed or stealth. They no longer remember the lives their ancestors led on the surface, although many morlocks still dwell in the shattered ruins of their ancient homes. Some morlocks worship the statues of humans from these bygone eras as gods, but others now worship Lamashtu, Rovagug, or other violent deities.

Morlock young are insatiable and clamor for even the slightest morsel of food, even consuming their siblings if no other meal presents itself. Most morlocks encourage the practice to ensure their ancestral group as a whole grows stronger.

A typical morlock stands just over 5 feet tall and weighs roughly 150 pounds.
Morlock.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. disease and poison

XWdqUKdwgQ9Cn7vC.name: 棍棒 Club
XWdqUKdwgQ9Cn7vC.description: 这是一块结实的木头，打磨形状用来敲击敌人。棍棒可以是复杂雕刻的武术作品，也可以像树枝或木块一样简单。

G412UtVloe7PIpa4.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Disease and Poison

3vycv9ThXOQbgNBf.name: Instinctual Tinker
3vycv9ThXOQbgNBf.description:
The morlock tinkers with an adjacent construct or mechanical hazard. They attempt a @Check[type:crafting] check against the construct's or hazard's Fortitude DC. The morlock can't succeed if the target's level is more than double the morlock's.

大成功 The target gains [[/r {4d6}[healing]]]{4d6生命值} and a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls for 1 minute.

成功 The target gains [[/r {2d6}[healing]]]{2d6生命值}.

大失败 The morlock injures itself, taking [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} (typically bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing, but potentially a different type at the GM's discretion).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.TEzLEXBZzNCp6flg]{效果: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Success)}

HaYQ8Cd4C0hYSFdc.name: Leap Attack
HaYQ8Cd4C0hYSFdc.description:
The morlock Strides up to twice its Speed, during which it attempts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. At any point during its movement, the morlock can make a melee Strike against an enemy in its reach.

The morlock then can't use Leap Attack for 1 round.

NXk6QjCfO8eW6Txp.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
NXk6QjCfO8eW6Txp.description:
A morlock's Strikes deal an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Y6Rqq2ahFM07WKRm.name: Swarming Stance
Y6Rqq2ahFM07WKRm.description: A morlock can share the same space as another morlock, but no more than two morlocks can occupy the same space. When morlocks share the same space, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

Movanic Deva.name: Movanic Deva
Movanic Deva.publicNotes: Movanic devas are stewards of the flow of good creatures' souls through the cycle of life and death, from the point a creature is born to the day it dies. These angels arise from the souls of stalwart nurturers and protectors, and share a specific connection with a creature's vital essence-its life force. Movanic devas are most concerned with guiding and protecting good creatures during their mortal lives, so once a soul has passed into the River of Souls, the movanic deva leaves its protection to the soul angels, or monadic devas. As part of their stewardship over good creatures, movanic devas can waken within animals a level of sapience to allow them to become kindly and benevolent as well, thus increasing the flow of goodness into the afterlife. They also spend time patrolling the Positive Energy Plane and Negative Energy Plane, seeking to contain significant threats to life.
Movanic Deva.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

3R5GHgg08mxLJg23.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

VpnCsS6gaS1m1Imz.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
VpnCsS6gaS1m1Imz.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

FkEMFgT2F1YJ8CJN.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
FkEMFgT2F1YJ8CJN.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

OMt6ba5mjMd0d6WH.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At will) (Evil only)
OMt6ba5mjMd0d6WH.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

IvU2EF3nyrIZUdjp.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

jDvNUVTVAmMni2Va.name: Aura of Vitality
jDvNUVTVAmMni2Va.description: 20尺。 Allies in the movanic deva's aura gain a +1 status bonus to all saving throws, resistance 10 to positive and negative damage, and are unharmed by the effects of a plane's positive and negative traits. Animals in the aura of 12th level or lower don't attack the movanic deva or the deva's allies unless they are controlled or otherwise forced to attack.

NEWDCp6ZApgJEtMx.name: Dispelling Field
NEWDCp6ZApgJEtMx.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The movanic deva attempts to unravel unwelcome magic effects on allies within its aura of vitality to protect them from malevolent forces. The movanic deva attempts a counteract check against as many spell effects affecting allies in the area as it wishes with a +19 counteract modifier and a counteract level of 4, rolling once for the selected effects.

VnUmVnOCMIOvu7ja.name: Flaming Armaments
VnUmVnOCMIOvu7ja.description: When a movanic deva wields a weapon, that weapon gains the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune.

Mudwretch.name: Mudwretch
Mudwretch.publicNotes:
In its resting form, a mudwretch looks like a large puddle of thick, dark mud, heaped at the center in a slightly drier patch of loam. When a living creature approaches, though, the mudwretch lurches upward, piling its muddy flesh upon itself to form a roughly humanoid shape, often in vague mockery of the approaching creature's general form in cases where the creature is a humanoid itself.

Mudwretches possess a low level of intellect, and while they do not form societies or cultures of their own, they are attracted to ruins or abandoned settlements. They have little need to eat, but without a constant source of moisture, a mudwretch dries out, suffering from low throbbing aches until it can resaturate. Often, blood from living creatures has to do-a dried mudwretch is more dangerous to intruders than one that's comfortably wallowing on a river bank.

8wrcvKK8xk5AIIva.name: Muddy Field
8wrcvKK8xk5AIIva.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The ground in the area is difficult terrain for all non-mudwretch creatures.

FlbbYL5EQllXYKjc.name: Susceptible to Desiccation
FlbbYL5EQllXYKjc.description:
If a mudwretch takes any damage from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.M0jQlpQYUr0pp2Sv]{Horrid Wilting} or a similar effect, takes 10 or more fire damage from a single effect, or spends more than 24 hours outside of a source of sufficient hydration (such as a swamp, river, well, or recent rainfall), it becomes dehydrated.

While dehydrated, the mudwretch can't Spew Mud, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} until it either fully immerses in water, spends 1 minute in the rain, or rehydrates in another way (such as via Gory Hydration).

wdSBw6qGzwcD9eZu.name: Gory Hydration
wdSBw6qGzwcD9eZu.description:
需求 The mudwretch is dehydrated

触发 The mudwretch deals Constrict damage to a living creature that has blood

效果 The mudwretch squeezes harder, dealing @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] to the target. The mudwretch absorbs this blood, removing any penalties it had as a result of being dehydrated.

gmtlsmLh9eNdpNrk.name: Mud Puddle
gmtlsmLh9eNdpNrk.description: Until it next acts, the mudwretch appears to be an ordinary puddle of mud. It has an automatic result of 20 on Deception checks to pass as a mud puddle and can make a fist Strike against a creature that walks onto the mud puddle as a reaction.

EDGqAUdAUwkbCzQK.name: Spew Mud
EDGqAUdAUwkbCzQK.description:
The mudwretch spews a @Template[type:line|distance:20] of pressurized mud that deals [[/r {2d10}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10钝击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, a creature also takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

The mudwretch can't Spew Mud again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Nabasu.name: Nabasu
Nabasu.publicNotes:
Nabasus are birthed directly into the Material Plane from the Abyss, an invasive infestation that releases the newly formed and ravenously hungry demons directly into the midst of their favored prey: mortal life. Nabasus feed on sapient creatures, but they never quite manage to sate their eternal hunger, even as they grow more and more powerful. Once they have sufficiently feasted, the demons become worthy to make the return trip to the Abyss, where they undergo a vile transformation, finally digesting their accumulated meals and deforming further into powerful vrolikais.

Nabasus form from the souls of evil gluttons, particularly from cannibals, blood-drinkers, and those who prefer the tang of undead flesh.
Nabasu.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

7dOMKFcaiBcHkgt1.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

SZFg9OyW2ROGepvG.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
SZFg9OyW2ROGepvG.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

W9vOqV3RGCnKCbHu.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

X9B0ICfO4bmtJ9pv.name: Death-Stealing Gaze
X9B0ICfO4bmtJ9pv.description:
30尺。

When a non-demon ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}.

x7QZQO50H5BxEvkk.name: Starvation Vulnerability
x7QZQO50H5BxEvkk.description: A nabasu denied food suffers painful backlash as their demonic nature feeds on their own corrupted spirituality. If a nabasu's Consume Death is disrupted (such as by a fighter using Disruptive Stance) or a creature resists the effect with a critical success, the nabasu takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6心灵伤害}.

gS1EUP1J8sgiDyR1.name: Consume Death
gS1EUP1J8sgiDyR1.description:
The nabasu focuses their death-stealing gaze upon a single target they can see within 30尺。 The target must immediately attempt a Fortitude save against death-stealing gaze.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and the nabasu suffers starvation vulnerability.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is affected by death-stealing gaze and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. If the creature was already drained 1 by the death-stealing gaze before attempting the save, a failed save increases the value of the drained condition by 1, to a maximum of drained 4. The nabasu gains 10 temporary Hit Points, and the drained creature is temporarily immune until the start of the nabasu's next turn.

大失败 As failure, but the creature increases the amount of drain by 2.

RvyDbBs5muX2yHdI.name: Stolen Death
RvyDbBs5muX2yHdI.description: A creature that dies while suffering drain from a nabasu's death-stealing gaze rises as a ghoul the next midnight.

Nalfeshnee.name: Nalfeshnee
Nalfeshnee.publicNotes: Nalfeshnees are huge, corpulent, boar-headed demons that hoard treasures and knowledge alike and form from the souls of avaricious mortals. Few demons understand the inner workings of the Abyss itself like nalfeshnees, and it's not unusual for a nalfeshnee to see itself as a servitor of the Abyss itself first rather than bow before a demon lord. Some claim stewardship over the fleshy realms that birth new demons, while others guard sites of particular significance deep in the plane's secret reaches. A nalfeshnee's realm in the Abyss can easily surpass the strength and size of the largest mortal kingdoms, for nalfeshnees display a singular gift for managing and manipulating the chaos of the Abyss.
Nalfeshnee.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

sP3rroIKBiOI5Xug.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

u3M9UJPCkvUJAvTB.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At will)
u3M9UJPCkvUJAvTB.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

wbilAnBHlo9UFygH.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
wbilAnBHlo9UFygH.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

zmdWFf8TYR11NSvB.name: 幻象造物(随意施法) Illusory Object (At will)
zmdWFf8TYR11NSvB.description:
你创造一个固定物体的视觉幻象。该幻象必须能完全处于法术区域中。该物体会自然活动，但是不会发出声音或者产生气味。举例而言，幻象瀑布中会出现水并流下，但是它会是安静的。

当生物触摸幻像，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它时，该生物可以尝试不相信你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 你的幻象也会发出合适的声音，产生正常气味，并且摸起来也很正常。该法术获得听觉特征。该持续时间增加到1小时。

升阶 (5环级) 如2环级，但是持续时间为无限。

Z9Qm5DGAbFw04kMI.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
Z9Qm5DGAbFw04kMI.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

I1XiJaJSXxln1l7V.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Y7LW92BfHBvUX6RP.name: Forfeiture Aversion
Y7LW92BfHBvUX6RP.description: A nalfeshnee's greed is such that losing possessions causes them harm. If an item is stolen from a nalfeshnee, the demon takes [[/r {3d6+10}[mental]]]{3d6+10心灵伤害}.

fon9lS38svdiFHZJ.name: Greedy Grab
fon9lS38svdiFHZJ.description:
触发 A creature critically fails a weapon Strike against the nalfeshnee

效果 The nalfeshnee attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the weapon used in the triggering Strike at a -2 circumstance penalty. On a success, the nalfeshnee steals the weapon.

6N8zQ0TKFxKlkOTG.name: Claim Wealth
6N8zQ0TKFxKlkOTG.description: The nalfeshnee steals all unattended items glowing with its Light of Avarice into an extradimensional space. The demon can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} to regurgitate any number of these items into their hand or onto the ground. If the demon dies, is affected by a teleportation effect, or consumes an extradimensional space (such as a bag of holding), they vomit up all the items.

gyVj6MqUbxY54dB9.name: Light of Avarice
gyVj6MqUbxY54dB9.description:
频率 once per hour

效果 Beams of unholy light shoot from the nalfeshnee toward four items within 60尺。 If someone is holding or wearing a targeted item, they can keep it from being affected with a successful @Check[type:reflex|dc:34] save. For 1 minute, the affected items glow in nauseating colors. Any non-demon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} as long as it holds, wears, or touches a glowing item.

Recovering from the sickness requires a successful @Check[type:will|dc:29] save instead of a Fortitude save. Ending the sickness this way ends the slowed condition and makes the creature temporarily immune to Light of Avarice for 24 hours.

If the creature removes or drops the item, both conditions end immediately but the creature doesn't become immune to Light of Avarice.

Neothelid.name: Neothelid
Neothelid.publicNotes: This gigantic, mauve worm has a hooked mouth with multiple circular bands of teeth and four barbed tongues. A wielder of terrible occult powers and a vast alien intellect, the neothelid serves the ageless horrors that dwell in strange dimensions beyond known reality-the Outer Gods and Great Old Ones of the Elder Mythos. Neothelids pass down these mysteries to the eerie wormlike creatures they spawn and create in preparation for a future where the worms below shall rule-a time when all other life is nothing more than food.
Neothelid.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Z5Ph0zkg0xMl6iK6.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

hYDyNv5iN58yeeg1.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At will)
hYDyNv5iN58yeeg1.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

anSe09sUoNwtRyCS.name: 精神质询(随意施法) Mind Probe (At will)
anSe09sUoNwtRyCS.description:
你将你的精神投射入一个生物的精神以寻找信息。除非其通过一次成功豁免抵抗你，否则你可以获得目标的记忆与知识。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 法术持续时间的每一轮中，你可以维持该法术来询问一个不同的问题，并尝试发现答案。对于每个问题，目标可以尝试一次欺骗（Deception）检定，对抗你的法术DC；如果目标成功，你不会得知答案，并且当大成功时，目标会提供给你一个假的答案，并且你信以为真。在你向目标提问过一个问题后，再次提问该问题，即使通过另一次施放的精神质询，也会得到相同的结果。

大失败 如同失败，并且目标在对抗你的问题的欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-4环境减值。

zpkYVcLlyvOVqOdx.name: 念动移物(随意施法) Telekinetic Haul (At will)
zpkYVcLlyvOVqOdx.description: 你移动目标至多20尺，可能令其停留在半空。当你维持该法术时，你可以再次如此做，或者你可以选择移动另一个可行的目标。

k9UHlbcKndqZYBaw.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
k9UHlbcKndqZYBaw.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

k2HAX2N3qaYcbpb8.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

zKvBvpelIhRXPoSW.name: 思维感知 Thoughtsense
zKvBvpelIhRXPoSW.description: The neothelid uses its mind as a precise sense at the listed range to notice all non-mindless creatures.

YwEDGRZpJYEj2PKw.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

p9eUNDT8mPVTSS1D.name: Dimensional Wormhole
p9eUNDT8mPVTSS1D.description:
触发 A creature the neothelid is aware of uses a teleportation effect

效果 The neothelid creates an extradimensional wormhole at the triggering creature's initial location that persists for up to 1 minute. If the neothelid moves into the wormhole's space, the neothelid teleports to the same destination as the triggering creature.

VWC3NNUYpN6qbf09.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
VWC3NNUYpN6qbf09.description:
The neothelid breathes a spray of acid that deals [[/r {16d6}[acid]]]{16d6酸液伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true] save).

The neothelid can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

aHamTcS3vkrZLHGN.name: Instant Suggestion
aHamTcS3vkrZLHGN.description:
触发 A creature fails a Will save against a spell or effect created by the neothelid

效果 The neothelid casts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion} spell it has available on the creature that failed its Will save.

9cHX93V0XpVb7b7b.name: Lashing Tongues
9cHX93V0XpVb7b7b.description: The neothelid's four tongues lash out in a frenzy at several targets. It makes up to four rasping tongue Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the neothelid's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the neothelid makes all of its attacks.

V4WvWjukxtroI8Xs.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
V4WvWjukxtroI8Xs.description:
大型, [[/r {2d12}[bludgeoning]]]{2d12钝击伤害} plus [[/r {2d12}[acid]]]{2d12酸液伤害}, 破裂27

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Nereid.name: Nereid
Nereid.publicNotes:
Nereids are aquatic fey with deep ties to water. They share some similarities with naiads, but they are not guardians and do not bind themselves to a specific body of water. Although they are primarily aquatic creatures, their unique ability to imbue their vitality into a supernatural shawl allows them to travel on land as well. A nereid must be careful when manifesting a shawl, however, as their life essence is bound to it, so it can be stolen or destroyed to threaten the nereid.

Nereids prefer to exist in isolation. Left to their own devices, they avoid combat, but when forced to fight, their ability to transform the natural waters in their flesh into poison serves them as well as any weapon.

Often, ignorant sailors lump all water-dwelling fey into a single category of "aquatic tempters", regardless of the fey's type or gender, using these creatures' names interchangeably to represent the concept of a beautiful figure who exists to lure mortals to a drowning death. Whereas naiads have more patience and often seek to educate the ignorant regarding the harm that stereotypes can cause, nereids and rusalkas have little patience for such methods. Rusalkas are the primary source for the legends of fey preying upon sailors, and nereids loathe them for that, as they prefer to live apart from humanity and enjoy the beauty of the natural world in peace.

When a nereid learns of a rusalka's increased activity, it often seeks out the rusalka to route them-not so much out of an urge to protect humanoids (in whom nereids traditionally have little interest), but to prevent the rusalka from inadvertently riling up violent responses from humanoids who can't be bothered to note the difference between a murderous fey and one who just wants to be left alone.

DEz7gcf0AumMmDO8.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

VgQyT5O8X59xTXWs.name: 召唤元素(仅限水元素) Summon Elemental (Water Elementals only)
VgQyT5O8X59xTXWs.description:
你创造一个为你而战的元素生物。这如同 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}，但你会召唤一个具有元素特征的常见生物，其等级为1或者更低。

升阶 (3环级) 等级 2

升阶 (4环级) 等级 3

升阶 (5环级) 等级 5

升阶 (6环级) 等级 7

升阶 (7环级) 等级 9

升阶 (8环级) 等级 11

升阶 (9环级) 等级 13

升阶 (10环级) 等级 15

YtRTdI3UAqH6vZVL.name: 元素形态(仅限水元素) Elemental Form (Water only)
YtRTdI3UAqH6vZVL.description:
你唤来位面的能量，转变为中性元素战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择气、土、火、或者水。处于该形态时，你获得对应的特征以及元素特征。在该战斗形态中你有手，并且能进行操作行动。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=19+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 10临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{攻击 Strike}。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+18、你的伤害加值为+9。这些基于敏捷（气或者火）或者基于力量（土或者水）。如果你对应的无武装攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该调整值。
  • 特技（气或者火）或者运动（土或者水）调整值+20；如果你本身的调整值更高，忽略该改变。

你也会根据你选择的元素类型获得特定能力：

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.DliizYpHcmBG130w]{气 Air}
    • 飞行速度 80尺，移动不会触发反应动作;
    • 近战 1 暴风, 伤害 1d4 钝击.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.8eWLR0WCf5258z8X]{土 Earth}
    • 速度20尺，掘地速度 20尺;
    • 近战 1 拳, 伤害 2d10 钝击.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.phIoucsDa3iplMm2]{火 Fire}
    • 速度 50尺； 火焰抗力 10，对寒冷和水弱点5;
    • 近战 1 触须 , 伤害 1d8 火焰加 [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.kxMBdANwCcF841uA]{水 Water}
    • 速度20尺，游泳速度 60尺； 火焰抗力 5;
    • 近战 1 波浪, 伤害 1d12 钝击并且你可以在命中后立即花费一个动作，通过一次成功的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}来推离目标5尺。

升阶 (6环级) 你的战斗形态为大型，并且你的攻击具有10尺触及。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=22+你的等级、15临时生命、攻击调整值+23、伤害加值+13、以及特技或者运动+23。

升阶 (7环级) 的战斗形态为超大型，并且你的攻击具有15尺触及。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=22+你的等级、20临时生命、攻击调整值+25、伤害加值+11并且伤害骰子翻倍（包括 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}），以及特技或者运动+25。

MuzXu4bDzodvaZ7w.name: Watery Transparency
MuzXu4bDzodvaZ7w.description: When underwater, the nereid's body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. The nereid can dismiss or resume this transparency as an action that has the concentrate trait.

gpZkw015Ns4Dbplk.name: Drowning Touch
gpZkw015Ns4Dbplk.description:
The nereid touches a creature and causes water from its own body to flow into the creature's lungs. If the creature cannot breathe water, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to for 24 hours.

失败 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3} as it chokes on the water.

大失败 The creature chokes on the water and runs out of air. It falls unconscious and starts drowning. If the creature is above water, it recovers from drowning as soon as it succeeds at a saving throw against suffocation.

nd0M4055DPNvjNvf.name: Manifest Shawl
nd0M4055DPNvjNvf.description:
The nereid divests themself of part of their connection to the First World and imbues this essence into a flowing shawl that enables them to function on land. The nereid can Dismiss this effect as long as they are touching the shawl. As long as the shawl exists, the nereid gains the amphibious trait. A non-nereid who carries the shawl also gains the amphibious trait.

If a nereid's shawl is destroyed rather than Dismissed, the nereid can't Manifest a Shawl for 24 hours.

Nixie.name: Nixie
Nixie.publicNotes:
These aquatic fey often guard ponds, rivers, lakes, and springs, protecting their bucolic homes from the advances of predators and careless humanoids alike. Nixies tend to be reclusive and try to keep their presence hidden from humanoids, hoping trespassers won't give them cause to act. Stories of minor miracles granted by nixies to those they befriend encourage humanoids to seek out these reclusive fey, and ironically make it even more unlikely for a nixie to grant such a boon.
