IoKSTbFElqXPiGiX.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

shoUZGVA0Hg78nbc.name: 飞行术 Fly
shoUZGVA0Hg78nbc.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

iHz93nPS055VlpTQ.name: +1 Crossbow
iHz93nPS055VlpTQ.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

xrKfhlv0heNZjJQl.name: +1 Morningstar
xrKfhlv0heNZjJQl.description: This weapon has a short shaft ending in a metal ball studded with spikes.

OKH1R1FoBSEm3oKP.name: Enraged Growth
OKH1R1FoBSEm3oKP.description:
触发 The spriggan warlord takes damage

效果 The spriggan warlord grows to size 大型, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan warlord's reach increases by 5尺。 They regain 15 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attack and damage rolls.

This effect continues until the end of the spriggan warlord's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan warlord deals damage to another creature and is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, the effect extends until the end of the following turn.

When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan warlord is fatigued for 1 hour.

YHmyiWDMvEgujfl1.name: Bully's Bludgeon
YHmyiWDMvEgujfl1.description: The spriggan warlord makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is nonlethal.

7kGu1ORgE4Nay79B.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
7kGu1ORgE4Nay79B.description:
The spriggan warlord's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

FapwAUPhHeXc1NKj.name: Warlord's Training
FapwAUPhHeXc1NKj.description: A spriggan warlord has access to the critical specialization effects for crossbows and morningstars, and the reload of any crossbow they wield is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Star Archon.name: Star Archon
Star Archon.publicNotes: Embodiments of the virtue of prudence, star archons serve as philosophers and administrators, and in times of war as the tacticians, strategists, and generals of archon armies. Star archons burn with the glory and intensity of a sun, and their sense of duty and desire to defeat evil are as indefatigable as the light of the stars. While their dazzling intellects and unmatched strategic cunning make them most useful in war rooms rather than on battlefields, star archons are fierce opponents when motivated to enter the fray. Those who witness the self-sacrifice of a star archon and live to tell the tale describe the experience in terms that might befit the sight of a supernova at the instant the star collapses in on itself.
Star Archon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

oJLAT2NTlht6zFtA.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

mzVH7SLTrdxDaZ3j.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
mzVH7SLTrdxDaZ3j.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

y12tfuxEBFbR9qgU.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
y12tfuxEBFbR9qgU.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

mjBHvn4bdXCaG65R.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
mjBHvn4bdXCaG65R.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

KRlaXOK9VXp9mlCh.name: +2 Greater Striking Starknife
KRlaXOK9VXp9mlCh.description: From a central metal ring, four tapering metal blades extend like points on a compass rose. When gripping a starknife from the center, the wielder can use it as a melee weapon. It can also be thrown short distances.

3KU5Y0WaS2TkXwb0.name: +2 Greater Resilient Full Plate
3KU5Y0WaS2TkXwb0.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor and a pair of gauntlets.

LPLiXKoxMuJu4ifi.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

xmYe9vSGZokROsE8.name: Blinding Soul
xmYe9vSGZokROsE8.description:
Whenever the star archon takes slashing damage, bright light pours from their wounds. Non-archons within 10 feet must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save.

On a failure, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} instead.

The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 round.

XuX1YKa36ctJmZJH.name: Explosive Rebirth
XuX1YKa36ctJmZJH.description:
When killed, the star archon explodes in a blinding flash of holy energy that deals [[/r {12d6}[fire]]]{12d6火焰伤害} and [[/r {12d6}[good]]]{12d6善良伤害} to anything in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save.

A non-archon creature that sees the explosion and critically fails its save is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} as well.

The slain star archon reincarnates [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} later as a shield archon.

x3aksJFYweZk98OP.name: Retributive Strike
x3aksJFYweZk98OP.description:
伤害降低 21

A star archon can also make a Retributive Strike by throwing its starknife, and the enemy and ally can be within 60 feet instead of 15尺。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.RetributiveStrike]

NqdW9zuvmBwHZScr.name: Archon's Door
NqdW9zuvmBwHZScr.description: Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast dimension door, the archon can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door} (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door. If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either creature used dimension door.

OJA9CljFVtmCuzlZ.name: Prudent Asterism
OJA9CljFVtmCuzlZ.description:
The star archon calculates a celestial constellation and sends their starknife flying along that path from one foe to the next. It makes a starknife Strike against a target within 60尺。 If the Strike hits, it can make another Strike at a different target within 60 feet of the first target, and so on, until it misses with a Strike or runs out of targets it hasn't attacked within range of the most recent target.

The star archon can attack a given target only once per use of this ability. These attacks don't apply any range increment penalty, and the star archon resolves all the attacks before increasing the multiple attack penalty.

Steam Mephit.name: Steam Mephit
Steam Mephit.publicNotes: These brash and arrogant creatures are among the more energetic mephits. They are quick to nominate themselves the leaders of any group, barking out orders in shrill, high-pitched voices and insisting on having everything done their way. Even when they aren't bossing others around, the constant hiss of steam escaping from their pores ensures that there is never a quiet moment.
Steam Mephit.hp: (快速愈合2 (in boiling water or steam))

Lc0XTAOFODosmzys.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

0IwQxSLxEqwPcB3q.name: Steam Vision
0IwQxSLxEqwPcB3q.description: The steam mephit ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from mist and steam.

CpVMSme8RWwiT0UY.name: 快速愈合2 (in boiling water or steam)

uyXWXmerHoFxX1jU.name: Boiling Rain
uyXWXmerHoFxX1jU.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The steam mephit calls down a rain boiling water that surrounds them in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. Creatures in the area take [[/r {2d8}[fire]]]{2d8火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save), and small unattended flames (such as torches) are extinguished.

j9L9BPR6t7eHpHAt.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
j9L9BPR6t7eHpHAt.description:
The steam mephit spits a cloud of steam in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害} to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).

The steam mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Stingray.name: Stingray
Stingray.publicNotes: Found in salt or fresh water, stingrays are normally passive creatures, but when threatened or cornered, they lash out with their tails to lance foes with their toxic stingers. Stingrays often bury themselves in mud, sand, or sea grass, and unfortunately for those wading in shallow waters, stepping on an unseen stingray is a surefire way to receive a painful sting.

r3hGo7TAQ3TtGwLY.name: Electrolocation
r3hGo7TAQ3TtGwLY.description: A stingray in water can use its electrolocation as an imprecise sense at the listed range to detect living creatures that are in the same body of water as itself.

c2nQF7qTMD3mwnrM.name: Stingray Venom
c2nQF7qTMD3mwnrM.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

Striding Fire.name: Striding Fire
Striding Fire.publicNotes: An embodiment of the speed and chaos of a spreading blaze, a striding fire appears as a lithe and long-limbed humanoid composed of shifting-hued flames churning within a skeleton-like framework.

7B1Q0p1BKuDwOEoo.name: Smoke Vision
7B1Q0p1BKuDwOEoo.description: The striding fire ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

up0HVVMUk86V0DdT.name: Burning Rush
up0HVVMUk86V0DdT.description:
The striding fire Strides up to double its Speed in a straight line. Its movement during this Stride doesn't trigger reactions. Any creature the striding fire was adjacent to at any point during this Stride must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save. If it critically fails, it is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} by a wave of heated air.

The striding fire can't use Burning Rush for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Stygira.name: Stygira
Stygira.publicNotes:
Withered hermits wrapped in tattered rags, these scarred, eyeless creatures command strange secrets of the earth and interpret the fateful energies of the subterranean depths. In some regions, stygiras are worshipped as seers or even gods, although they lack the ability to grant spells to clerics and are often not aware of their worshippers at all. In other areas, they have strange ties to the ancient empires of the cyclopes, often dwelling in the oversized ruins those creatures left behind long ago. To many stygiras, gemstones harvested from ancient cyclopean mosaics have even greater magical properties than other crystals.

Although technically blind, stygiras do have vestigial eyes hidden beneath the stony, scarred flesh of their faces. Capable of sensing bright lights even through their scars, stygiras are sickened and distracted by these flashing glimpses, so they keep to their caves during the day and wander into the world above only after nightfall. Far from benevolent, they seek out unwary travelers or explorers to capture and reduce them down to the base chemicals and supernatural humors the stygiras require to infuse gemstones with the capacity to give them sight and magical power.
Stygira.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

SITpZWO5sj03l95G.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

uRbNro9mLAqvYrrE.name: 卜筮术 Augury
uRbNro9mLAqvYrrE.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

fiKhFiynAYN8X5if.name: Gemsight
fiKhFiynAYN8X5if.description: As long as the stygira holds a gemstone, they can see through the gem with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.qCCLZhnp2HhP3Ex6]{Darkvision} and the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing}. The stygira is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} when they are not holding a gem in a hand.

LqnyBEmxdZr7oIfJ.name: Light Sickness
LqnyBEmxdZr7oIfJ.description: A stygira in an area of bright light is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

gYBpkJDYJYKODQRK.name: Gem Gaze
gYBpkJDYJYKODQRK.description:
The stygira holds aloft a gem and gazes into the mind of a creature within 30尺, infusing the creature's thoughts with visions of the creature's own dead body slowly petrifying.

The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical failure).

pSl7SmKRkTYkQI1N.name: Stone Curse
pSl7SmKRkTYkQI1N.description: Wounds dealt by the stygira's claws leave the flesh bleached of color and turn the blood that runs from them dark gray. Each time a creature is damaged by the stygira's claw Strike, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (slowed 2 on a critical failure) as its flesh stiffens like stone. If a creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points from the stygira's claw Strike and fails the saving throw against stone curse, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}. A creature that spends 8 hours in direct sunlight can attempt a new saving throw to remove the effects of stone curse, even if it has been petrified.

Suli Dune Dancer.name: Suli Dune Dancer
Suli Dune Dancer.publicNotes:
Because their genie forebears are native to the Material Plane, sulis are by and large the most common geniekin on the Material Plane. They are often artisans and peace brokers, compelled to try and bring harmony and balance in a world wrought with discord.

Sulis have a natural charm that often eludes other geniekin, but tend to layer on a level of boastful pride or even arrogance as a personal quirk or humorous facade. Few non-sulis realize that bragging is not simply the symptom of a puffed-up ego for sulis, but instead is a cultural institution easily comparable to human poetry. Sulis' boasts not only glorify themselves, but also secure their companions' and families' accomplishments in history, with the ultimate goal of spinning stories that will be retold for generations. This is especially true for sulis who have lived with other geniekin and have been seen as lesser for not having a strong connection to an Elemental Plane.

Suli dune dancers are but one way these geniekin seek to integrate with other humanoid societies. They work to hone their skills at boasting to an extent that their claims help to bolster those they travel with. Suli from regions other than deserts adjust their names to match their terrains, but regardless of whether they prefer forests, hills, or arctic plains, their boasts remain as compelling.

nktnO0aAYu7JllFI.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
nktnO0aAYu7JllFI.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

pIbaFSljYvozaZdG.name: Tambourine (Handheld Musical Instrument)
pIbaFSljYvozaZdG.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played.

D89GcjloR9CLNbq8.name: Elemental Bulwark
D89GcjloR9CLNbq8.description:
触发 An enemy is about to damage the dune dancer with cold, electricity, or fire, or with a spell that has the air, earth, fire, or water trait

效果 The dune dancer gain resistance 2 against the triggering damage

1Kmvtn64DZibqUls.name: Elemental Assault
1Kmvtn64DZibqUls.description:
Elemental magic fills the dune dancer's body or weapon. The dune dancer chooses one element and makes a melee Strike. The Strike deals an additional [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害} of the indicated type and has the trait corresponding to the element:

  • Air electricity
  • Earth bludgeoning
  • Fire fire
  • Water cold

Sunflower Leshy.name: Sunflower Leshy
Sunflower Leshy.publicNotes:
Sunflower leshys are the ambassadors and social leaders of their kind. Their petals radiate from their heads in various hues with a serrated, leafy, beard-like ruff. When particularly excited, their eyes and petals glow with collected sunlight, and when they become depressed or saddened, their usually vibrant coloration grows correspondingly muted. These shifts in coloration are echoed in sunflower leshy art, which can lead to unexpected color palettes for artworks. For example, a human artist might illustrate Hell as a place of glowing lava and flickering flames, drawing upon many vibrant colors, but to a sunflower leshy, the only proper way to depict a place like Hell is in morose grays, blacks, and whites.

The more adventurous sunflower leshys leave their communities to grow bonds with nearby settlements of humanoids. When interacting with humanoids, sunflower leshys are some of the most likely to act friendly and give strangers a chance to prove their good intentions, though they remain cautious. They're often accompanied by other, more powerful leshys.

E283z5pYuHL8XdzA.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

LQBlltvEb0rVnJYA.name: Heliotrope
LQBlltvEb0rVnJYA.description:
20尺

需求 The sunflower leshy begins its turn in an area of bright light

效果 The sunflower leshy reflects the sun or another source of bright light from their face. Each creature that ends its turn in the emanation must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:16] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to heliotrope for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is distracted by the light, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

大失败 As failure, but the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

G3Qoqz5IMBvs9EYb.name: Verdant Burst
G3Qoqz5IMBvs9EYb.description:
When a sunflower leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring [[/r {1d8}[healing]]]{1d8生命值} to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This area immediately fills with sunflowers, becoming difficult terrain.

If the terrain is not a viable environment for these sunflowers, they wither after 24 hours.

LwAD4kqFgkuoaJ0b.name: Change Shape
LwAD4kqFgkuoaJ0b.description:
The sunflower leshy transforms into a Small flower. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树形术 Tree Shape}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

h20KMmp1wuDSm1Oa.name: Seed Spray
h20KMmp1wuDSm1Oa.description:
The sunflower leshy launches a deluge of seeds from their head in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害} to creatures within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true] save).

It gains a +2 status bonus to this damage against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} creatures.

The sunflower leshy can't use Seed Spray again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Sylph Sneak.name: Sylph Sneak
Sylph Sneak.publicNotes:
Born with elemental gales coursing through their breath, sylphs are wispy planar scions whose bodies seem caught in a perpetual, gentle breeze. Born of unions between mortals and djinn, sylphs are quick-witted and creative, but they are prone to flights of fancy and tend to be easily distracted.

Sylphs are notorious for their practice of "listening to the wind," which most others dismiss as a fancy name for eavesdropping. Yet this custom means much more to sylphs, who spend hours listening to the stories brought to them on the proverbial breeze. While some less scrupulous sylphs may use the information they learn to blackmail or abuse others, most of them see listening to the wind as their way of staying connected to the world around them while still keeping it comfortably at arm's length. Certainly the typical sylph sneak doesn't seek to use what they learn for ill, but instead tries to warn others of dangers yet unrealized or to prepare themself for a dangerous task.

sRJgd3DpiEABxebP.name: Deflecting Gale
sRJgd3DpiEABxebP.description:
触发 The sylph sneak is the target of a physical ranged attack

需求 The sylph sneak is aware of the attack

效果 A swift gale whips up between the sylph sneak and the source of the ranged attack, giving the sneak a +3 status bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the wind deflected it. The wind can't deflect unusually large or heavy ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts).

HhUiMTB8Qa8ySlVM.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
HhUiMTB8Qa8ySlVM.description:
The sylph sneak's Strikes deal 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

DcQizfyqoLcJASk7.name: Surprise Attacker
DcQizfyqoLcJASk7.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the sylph sneak.

U64zKLjgQG2MzhAS.name: Wind's Guidance
U64zKLjgQG2MzhAS.description: When the sylph sneak attacks with a thrown weapon, the range increment increases by 10尺。

Taiga Giant.name: Taiga Giant
Taiga Giant.publicNotes:
Taiga giants prefer a nomadic lifestyle, both to keep from depleting any one area's resources while satiating their massive appetites and to satisfy a constant wanderlust. They are deeply spiritual and frequently commune with their ancestors' spirits for guidance and knowledge. Taiga giants are happiest when they are left alone to live out their traditional lives, and their impressive size and strength are enough to persuade all but the most dangerous foes to do so.

Taiga giants subsist on migratory herds of aurochs, mammoths, and elk. They occasionally raid humanoid villages, but such cases are opportunistic rather than malicious, with a focus on stealing away livestock for food rather than people. Nevertheless, the arrival of a group of taiga giants is a potentially devastating event to any town or village, so many communities attempt to placate the giants by creating a yearly offering at those times when they know the giants are scheduled to come close.

Most taiga giants venerate their ancestors and seek to honor their works in everything they do. This deep connection makes them ferociously proud of those legacies, and little can compel taiga giants to go to war more swiftly than insulting their ancestors. Merely mentioning the false rumors that ancient taiga giant spellcasters were responsible for the creation of the first rune giants is a surefire way to earn a taiga giant's unending wrath.

A taiga giant stands 20 feet tall and weighs 10,000 pounds.
Taiga Giant.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. enchantment and illusion effects

dNIO5C35HeSGtxDD.name: See Invisibility
dNIO5C35HeSGtxDD.description: A taiga giant can see invisible creatures and objects as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} to the taiga giant.

x1avaIq02Cr7LmNs.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Enchantment and Illusion Effects

XrJk8sW9W9FE8rtL.name: Guardian Spirit
XrJk8sW9W9FE8rtL.description:
触发 The taiga giant has Ancestral Guardian active and would take energy or mental damage

效果 The taiga giant's ancestral spirits intervene and protect the giant from taking up to 20 energy damage or 30 mental damage. The giant takes any remaining damage; if it does, the spirits depart and the giant is no longer protected by the ancestors.

TW4FUgjb7YgD89jt.name: Ancestral Guardian
TW4FUgjb7YgD89jt.description:
需求 The taiga giant must be protected by the ancestors

效果 The taiga giant calls upon their ancestors' spirits to rise up and protect them, causing a cloak of spectral faces to shimmer and swirl around them. The taiga giant's AC increases to 34 until the start of its next turn.

Ir6SQ9XsXTFTSPKi.name: Protected by the Ancestors
Ir6SQ9XsXTFTSPKi.description: A taiga giant's prayers to their ancestors grant them spiritual protection. If a taiga giant loses this protection (such as by taking too much damage when using Guardian Spirit, or if the ancestors are counteracted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}), it loses its immunity to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} condition and its status bonus to saving throws against enchantment and illusion effects. A taiga giant can once again be Protected by the Ancestors by performing a 10-minute prayer as an activity that has the concentrate trait.

Taiga Linnorm.name: Taiga Linnorm
Taiga Linnorm.publicNotes: Taiga linnorms are covered in hundreds of quill-like black spines as sharp as spears. Wise hunters native to linnorm-infested lands know to watch for spines stuck in the bark of conifers-a sure sign that a taiga linnorm has recently passed through. Sometimes this means of tracking isn't enough to avoid an encounter, however; taiga linnorms, like their tarn and tor brethren, are skilled stalkers. They prefer to lurk in half-frozen bogs or swampy marshlands with their heads poking just above the water's surface, ever watchful for unwary prey.
Taiga Linnorm.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Taiga Linnorm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺, true seeing

hTqMUAAnd9iTtvQW.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

k8jXY7QubcoSOAYR.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
k8jXY7QubcoSOAYR.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

fh90HLxqhj0ijf1r.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
fh90HLxqhj0ijf1r.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

HViM44dkUyHEWK31.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

h4MdAekw9ZoGZc2Q.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

mcsK2cK4pMrDIfZJ.name: Curse of Endless Storms
mcsK2cK4pMrDIfZJ.description: When a creature slays a taiga linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:46] save or permanently gain weakness 20 to electricity.

g41jvLpQ6exKQBgd.name: Spines
g41jvLpQ6exKQBgd.description: Any creature that makes a melee attack against a taiga linnorm is stabbed by the taiga linnorm's spines and takes [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害} per attack. A melee weapon with reach protects the user against these spines.

kli2QsKUO2VSz2oy.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
kli2QsKUO2VSz2oy.description:
The taiga linnorm breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of electrified vapor, dealing [[/r {20d6}[electricity]]]{20d6电击伤害} to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save). The electrified mist persists for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}, dealing [[/r {6d6}[electricity]]]{6d6电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save) to each creature that ends its turn in the mist.

The taiga linnorm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

qCZyXHHj5OMACPYY.name: Taiga Linnorm Venom
qCZyXHHj5OMACPYY.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {7d6}[electricity]]]{7d6电击伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {10d6}[electricity]]]{10d6电击伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1轮)

Tatzlwyrm.name: Tatzlwyrm
Tatzlwyrm.publicNotes:
Tatzlwyrms resemble human-sized snakes with two arms and a dragon's head. Distant relatives of true dragons, tatzlwyrms possess only a meager level of intelligence. They can speak Draconic (with a thick, hissing accent), but their ability to reason is limited and they can't use magic. They do possess a level of cunning, however, and some have been known to build rudimentary traps and even lairs. They are not treasure-hoarders, though, so don't expect to find a tatzlwyrm sitting atop a bed of coins.

Some tatzlwyrms have managed to forge working relationships with dragons, though it's a rare occurrence. From time to time, dragons have used them as messengers (because they can speak their language, however crudely), scouts (due to their smaller size), guides (when they're familiar with a particular mountain), and even muscle (harassing foes not worthy of a dragon's direct attention).

Tatzlwyrms don't work with kobolds, though-tatzlwyrms eat kobolds.

Tatzlwyrms hibernate in cold weather, and when they feel winter approaching they seek out underground lairs, mountain crevices, or even hay lofts. On one notable occasion, townsfolk reported being briefly overrun by tatzlwyrms after a conflict between spellcasters in the nearby hills caused a sudden blizzard. Local scholars still debate whether the cause of the influx was the sudden change in weather or if the creatures were drawn to one of the other magic users staying in town who were part of the same pilgrimage as those doing battle.

When confronted, tatzlwyrms are more likely to attack than retreat. Indeed, they sometimes lie in wait on purpose, taking advantage of their scales' natural camouflage and awaiting the chance to unleash their signature move: belching poisonous vapor into an opponent's face. Since this breath attack doesn't have much range, the wyrms usually need to grab their foes first and bring them close to their mouth.

sN3JKaIDG5kFRAvC.name: Natural Camouflage
sN3JKaIDG5kFRAvC.description: A tatzlwyrm's green, gray, and brown scales provide it natural camouflage. In areas of dense undergrowth, a tatzlwyrm can move at its full Speed when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneaking}, and it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}.

8prRtWLrblxto9pO.name: Poison Gasp
8prRtWLrblxto9pO.description:
The tatzlwyrm belches a puff of poisonous vapor into the face of an adjacent creature, which must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15|traits:damaging-effect] save; the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to this save if it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}.

The tatzlwyrm can't use Poison Gasp again for 2 rounds.

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The target takes [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

大失败 The target takes [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6毒素伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.

Tendriculos.name: Tendriculos
Tendriculos.publicNotes:
These strange amalgams of plant and fungus with animal tendencies form where the natural world is corrupted by foul magic or frayed planar boundaries. Tendriculoses are instinctive ambush predators who seek out lightly traveled forest paths and lie in wait in the undergrowth. A tendriculos swallows its prey as quickly as possible and lets its paralytic digestive juices finish the meal, while swiftly restoring itself with the nourishment provided by the trapped creature. When collected, neutralized, and refined, the digestive fluids of a tendriculos form a lacquer that retains some of the tendriculos's acid resistance.

A tendriculos comes into being with a rudimentary understanding of the Sylvan language, but in some cases it might manifest knowing a different tongue, such as Aklo, Draconic, or even Necril. Regardless, tendriculoses have little patience for chattering from potential meals, though some determined fey and primal spellcasters have been known to form alliances or even closer bonds with tendriculoses. Befriending a tendriculos requires great patience and plentiful food-and these the gifts of food must be alive when handed over.

When it has finished feeding and is out of combat, a tendriculos slips into a quiescent state for a full day, one of the few times it is safe to approach. Upon rousing, it seeks the deep forest to regurgitate the less digestible portions of its meal. These remains may contain valuables that survived digestion and indicate that a tendriculos's hunting grounds lie nearby.

Tendriculoses dwell in deep woods and jungles. Those too near populated areas soon draw unwanted attention with their ravenous appetites. Well-fed tendriculoses develop fruiting bodies that cast forth millions of spores. Spores that happen to alight on carrion grow into new tendriculoses.

z8CeXCEQdHlFMc0u.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Gbcpa6lIhj2KUyH4.name: Rampant Growth
Gbcpa6lIhj2KUyH4.description:
需求 A creature the tendriculos has Swallowed Whole has taken damage since the end of the tendriculos's last turn, and the tendriculos hasn't used any other actions this turn

效果 The tendriculos regains [[/r {3d8}[healing]]]{3d8生命值} and recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed} conditions. It reduces any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled} value it has by 2.

1zSROTRkSluSvmzR.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
1zSROTRkSluSvmzR.description:
大型, [[/r {2d10+7}[acid]]]{2d10+7酸液伤害} plus tendriculos venom, 破裂14

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

XHjjW9wEW3pVVm5K.name: Tendriculos Venom
XHjjW9wEW3pVVm5K.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1轮)

Thanadaemon.name: Thanadaemon
Thanadaemon.publicNotes:
Also known as the deacons of death, thanadaemons represent death via old age. They are among the most patient daemons, and prefer to bide their time to enact far-reaching, decades-long plans rather than fight (though they are still deadly foes). Like the Horseman of Death, they ply the waters of the River Styx in search of wayward souls. Rarely are thanadaemons seen without a trademark oar (which they wield as a bo staff), a tool they use to navigate the river's muck-ridden channels and turbulent rapids.

Daemons form from the most despicable souls and personify forms of death.
Thanadaemon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

6mCb1o0EW6yQ0NfB.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

lPHvBGYu9z42HqQj.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
lPHvBGYu9z42HqQj.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

CTeOUny3G8ZgKMct.name: 异界传送() Plane Shift (At Will; Self Plus Skiff and Passengers Only; Astral, Ethereal, and Evil Planes Only)
CTeOUny3G8ZgKMct.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

9ejFXBhPxifD2amI.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
9ejFXBhPxifD2amI.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

iDFRh2jZ2ogL63IM.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
iDFRh2jZ2ogL63IM.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

BuPE1MFIbw6ZThvx.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (Good Only) (At Will)
BuPE1MFIbw6ZThvx.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

jF73rxKIbYkxXiUW.name: +1 Striking Bo Staff
jF73rxKIbYkxXiUW.description: This strong but slender staff is tapered at the ends and well balanced. It's designed to be an offensive and defensive weapon.

GHcUVfhfs6mcm7mS.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

5fPhzfjVfDH0Ssgz.name: Terrifying Gaze
5fPhzfjVfDH0Ssgz.description:
30尺

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30] save. If the creature fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}. The creature is then temporarily immune to terrifying gaze (but not Focus Gaze) for 24 hours.

yHiEUWvnlHVJLlCA.name: Draining Strike
yHiEUWvnlHVJLlCA.description: When a thanadaemon damages a living creature with a melee Strike, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the thanadaemon increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 4}.

e7rgKN11dqX1fsSq.name: Focus Gaze
e7rgKN11dqX1fsSq.description: The thanadaemon glares at a single creature they can see within 30尺。 If the target wasn't already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, they must immediately attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:33] save against the thanadaemon's terrifying gaze. If the target was already frightened, they must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}; this second effect has the incapacitation trait. After attempting its save, the creature is temporarily immune to this ability until the start of the thanadaemon's next turn.

mKh47XLxTvXG71TF.name: Soul Crush
mKh47XLxTvXG71TF.description:
需求 The thanadaemon has a soul gem

效果 The thanadaemon crushes the soul gem in one hand and gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing} 15 for 1 minute.

Theletos.name: Theletos
Theletos.publicNotes: Theletoses maintain the balance between fate and free will. A theletos is a roughly spherical mass of crystals from which emerge four limbs, each split at the elbow and ending in three-fingered hands. A pair of crystalline tentacles also emerges from its body. Those who have been damaged by a theletos's tentacles describe a disorienting dilemma as they simultaneously feel forced to make a single choice while also being overwhelmed by the endless options available to choose from. Theletoses are more likely than most aeons to interfere in non-aeon societies, particularly in regions with draconian laws. Their involvement is twofold; a theletos concerns itself with both the freedom of individuals and the laws that restrict these individuals, even when the two are in opposition.
Theletos.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

ziM5W7Pshzb5HJ4L.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

mLsKErBN02PEpFEb.name: 卜筮术(随意施法) Augury (At will)
mLsKErBN02PEpFEb.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

RFPvW7U5w3NRyp3q.name: Envisioning
RFPvW7U5w3NRyp3q.description: When a theletos conveys information, it does so wordlessly through psychic projections. This acts as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]{心灵感应 Telepathy} with a range of 100 feet but is understandable to all creatures regardless of whether they have a language. The meaning to non-aeons can be vague and is often mysterious. A theletos can use this ability to communicate flawlessly with any other aeon on the same plane.

wSYxanQKAbTVaazk.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

f3X4SLxmMSok3p65.name: Fate Drain
f3X4SLxmMSok3p65.description:
A creature damaged by the theletos's tentacle must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}.

As long as the creature is stupefied, it can no longer benefit from fortune effects. If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

sA3oeWc14avc7CPO.name: Wrath of Fate
sA3oeWc14avc7CPO.description:
The theletos releases a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of energy from its center. Creatures in the cone become overwhelmed with the knowledge of various fates that destiny has in store for them and lack of clear pathways to these potential futures. They must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} indefinitely.

An affected creature can choose to roll twice when it attempts an attack, saving throw, or skill check and take the lower result. Regardless of the outcome, that creature is no longer slowed after that roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.QSy3KaLI1AYTR7rP]{效果: Wrath of Fate}

The theletos can't use Wrath of Fate again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Thulgant.name: Thulgant
Thulgant.publicNotes: Although they spend most of their time hunting and battling demons for control of the Abyss, thulgants amuse themselves with a variety of diversions, such as maintaining galleries of petrified mortals or building massive, hive-like lairs filled with enslaved minions. Each of these qlippoth is a horrific tangle of limbs, with spiderlike legs, writhing tentacles emerging from the top of its head, and three scorpion-like stingers.
Thulgant.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, true seeing

fEKfgiJvpDVUGTI9.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

yhlcSZF88RwErXcb.name: 神圣灵光(仅限混乱) Divine Aura (Chaotic only)
yhlcSZF88RwErXcb.description:
神圣的能量保护目标，每个目标在区域内时，赋予其AC和豁免上的+1状态加值。

选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。在对抗由法术所对立的阵营（你选择混乱时为守序，选择善良时为邪恶）的生物的攻击，以及这样的生物创造的效果时，法术赋予的加值提升到+2。在对抗由这样的生物所创造的，会赋予你的神圣灵光的目标 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled} 状态效果，以及对抗与你的神圣灵光所对立阵营的效果所召唤的生物时，该加值增加到+4。

当一个对立阵营的生物通过近战攻击命中目标时，该生物必须成功通过一次意志豁免，否则会 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} 1分钟。然后它会暂时免疫1分钟。

当你每轮第一次维持该法术时，神圣灵光的半径增加10尺。

5kY50OvZXGwzw1RS.name: 神圣裁决(仅限混乱) Divine Decree (Chaotic only)
5kY50OvZXGwzw1RS.description:
你呢喃你信仰中的一段强大祷词，这是会伤害对立你的信念之人的敕令。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你对区域内生物造成7d10伤害；每个生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。具有你所选择的阵营的生物不受法术影响。阵营既不对应也不对立的目标，将其豁免结果视为更好一级，并且不会承受伤害以外的额外效果。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} ，持续1分钟。在你的原属位面，一个在豁免中大失败生物生物会如同在 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{放逐术 Banishment} 豁免中失败一般被放逐。10级或者更低的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。在失败时，它会 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} 1分钟；在大失败时，它会死亡。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，并且在豁免大失败时必须尝试第二次豁免的生物等级增加2。

Dc4o0DNBB2mCvOPt.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
Dc4o0DNBB2mCvOPt.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

Vz2xdhsoi4Vg6Gej.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
Vz2xdhsoi4Vg6Gej.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

haHyNwNcOTBVXk4D.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
haHyNwNcOTBVXk4D.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

GIj7axAUfLMpl5DN.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

0dNqhk5KI3nAaTlu.name: Demon Hunter
0dNqhk5KI3nAaTlu.description: The thulgant causes a demon within 30 feet to suffer the effect of its sinful vulnerability.

2R71xX6zTcFcPntf.name: 高等紧勒 Greater Constrict
2R71xX6zTcFcPntf.description:
[[/r {2d6+17}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+17钝击伤害} and [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6酸液伤害}, DC 40

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GreaterConstrict]

34NmTbXjw24GQVju.name: Mind-Rending Sting
34NmTbXjw24GQVju.description:
需求 The thulgant hits the same enemy with two consecutive sting Strikes in the same round

效果 The thulgant deals [[/r {3d12+17}[mental]]]{3d12+17心灵伤害} to the enemy. If the enemy is affected by thulgant venom, that poison gains the virulent trait.

uY2J1JrUYcVbFp2j.name: Stunning Display
uY2J1JrUYcVbFp2j.description:
The thulgant rises up on its twitching limbs and presents its numerous tentacles and stingers in a horrifying display of awfulness. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Stunning Displays for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 4}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 8}.

p1rxtsKx33vjytn0.name: Thulgant Venom
p1rxtsKx33vjytn0.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害} and the victim gains one of the following at random: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6毒素伤害} and the victim gains two of the following at random: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6毒素伤害} and the victim gains all three of the following: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3} (1轮)

Thunderbird.name: Thunderbird
Thunderbird.publicNotes:
Thunderbirds bring storms on their wings. In times of drought, they are welcomed. Other times, they are offered gifts in hopes they might leave before flooding begins. When angered, they call down hurricanes and lay waste to entire villages, so many settlements conduct extensive rites to appease and honor local thunderbirds.

Thunderbird parents carry their newly hatched offspring to hidden mountaintop nests, where the young are struck by their first bolts of lightning and learn the mysteries of the storm.

Jd5I0ORcv8JckftL.name: Stormsight
Jd5I0ORcv8JckftL.description: Wind, precipitation, and clouds don't impair a thunderbird's vision; it ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from storms, mist, precipitation, and the like.

Jw5v3XqSesAoiBsp.name: Reactive Shock
Jw5v3XqSesAoiBsp.description:
触发 A creature enters the thunderbird's reach or uses a move action within their reach

效果 A lightning bolt dancing on the thunderbird's body leaps onto the creature, dealing [[/r {8d6}[electricity]]]{8d6电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save).

IoE3s3hLaVewsjSQ.name: Storm Aura
IoE3s3hLaVewsjSQ.description:
100尺。

The thunderbird is surrounded by a cyclone of wind and driving rain. This area is greater difficult terrain for flying creatures, who must successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight} (DC 27) or be blown 30 feet away from the thunderbird. Creatures on the ground must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27] save to perform any move action and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} on a critical failure.

The driving rain in the storm aura imposes a -2 circumstance penalty on Perception checks and extinguishes smaller flames.

A thunderbird can deactivate or activate the storm aura as a free action with the concentrate trait.

4BH9uwuYigIuBuzB.name: Lightning Blast
4BH9uwuYigIuBuzB.description: The thunderbird spreads their wings and blasts their foe with thunderous bolts of lightning. Each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] takes [[/r {6d6}[electricity]]]{6d6电击伤害} and [[/r {6d6}[sonic]]]{6d6音波伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save). The thunderbird can't use Lightning Blast for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

LcmY1jYUhcSTLbed.name: Stormflight
LcmY1jYUhcSTLbed.description: A thunderbird can move in wind with ease. They don't treat wind as difficult terrain or need to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight} in high winds.

KBUEqfW6m7bI5a0g.name: Thunderstrike
KBUEqfW6m7bI5a0g.description: A creature that takes damage from a thunderbird's thunderbolt Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 round.

Titan Centipede.name: Titan Centipede
Titan Centipede.publicNotes: These colossal, solitary centipedes claim vast hunting grounds.

fDD7cIf8ZsYLF8fv.name: Impaling Critical
fDD7cIf8ZsYLF8fv.description: When a titan centipede scores a critical hit with its mandibles, the target is painfully pierced with barbed spines and bristles, taking @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] and becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} as long as the bleed damage continues.

bu97rur2OngJhlHv.name: Titan Centipede Venom
bu97rur2OngJhlHv.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} (1轮)

9hRQJlQwiVSfsdc2.name: Undulate
9hRQJlQwiVSfsdc2.description: The titan centipede Strides up to its Speed or Steps. During this movement, it can pass through spaces as narrow as 10 feet without @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入空间 Squeezing}.

Totenmaske.name: Totenmaske
Totenmaske.publicNotes: Spawned by the same unnatural and self-destructive obsessions that drove them when they were alive, totenmaskes are the undead remnants of the most self-indulgent and sinful among us. Though unable to sate their perverse desires, these foul undead can drain the very flesh from their victims so as to wrap themselves in a perverse mockery of life that allows them to pursue their base wants. Totenmaskes' specific longings vary-one might be obsessed with food or drink, while another might be vain and desirous of an attractive form to marvel at in a mirror, while yet another could simply long for the scent of blood. Whatever the sensation the totenmaske seeks, it is always a vice taken to extreme, for this sin is what helped condemn it to unlife in the first place. A totenmaske obsessed with food, for example, might find itself assaulting bakeries or breweries, while a vain totenmaske obsessed with glamor could quickly grow bored of each new look and switch its victims out daily, or even hourly.

MSbm9DhCPOKdhf7m.name: Drink Flesh
MSbm9DhCPOKdhf7m.description:
需求 The totenmaske hit the same enemy with two claw Strikes this turn and is still adjacent to it

效果 The totenmaske drains flesh from the creature's body. The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} on a critical failure).

JHlhwEGUybavtbTq.name: Living Form
JHlhwEGUybavtbTq.description:
The totenmaske takes the appearance of a Medium or smaller humanoid creature. This is either its form from before it became undead, or the form of the last creature it successfully hit with Drink Flesh.

This doesn't change the totenmaske's Speed or the attack and damage bonuses for its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

DteZBAInF0ur5LIY.name: Shape Flesh
DteZBAInF0ur5LIY.description:
After spending 1 minute in contact with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, or willing creature, a totenmaske can reshape the target's face, causing flesh to cover vital features.

The target can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save to resist; a critical success grants temporary immunity to Shape Flesh for 24 hours.

Each time the totenmaske Shapes Flesh, it chooses one feature: ears (target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}), eyes (target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}), mouth (target can't speak or eat), or nose (target can't smell). A creature with both its nose and mouth sealed can't breathe and begins to suffocate.

Changes are permanent until reversed by removing this curse, or the sealed flesh can be surgically opened with a @Check[type:medicine|dc:25] check that takes [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} and deals [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6挥砍伤害} per round.

Triton.name: Triton
Triton.publicNotes:
While sometimes understandably mistaken for merfolk-both species live underwater and have a blend of features from both humans and fish-tritons have two legs instead of a tail. This gives tritons the ability to operate on land, though they are neither as comfortable nor as skilled above water as below.

The arms and legs of a triton feature fins that assist in swimming, and their entire body is covered in fine scales that range in color from silver to cerulean blue to seaweed green. Their amphibious nature shows in the webbing between the digits of their feet and hands, as well as the fact that they have both gills and a human-shaped nose and mouth. Triton hair grows in wide strands like seagrass, commonly green in shade but in some cases blue or white. Their eyes range in color from sea blue to golden.

Many tritons see themselves as defenders of the deep, dedicating their lives to protecting the inhabitants of the seas from evil creatures and intruders-whether they come from underwater or the surface world. Primary among triton foes are sea devils and alghollthu, both of whom have amphibious forces that tritons have had to fight underwater and on land.

In their quest to fight underwater evil, tritons sometimes ally with dolphins and sea turtles (both of which make excellent mounts), water elemental, and sometimes even sharks and sea serpents. Tritons can summon such allies using a conch shell as a trumpet. When it comes to other intelligent undersea species, however, tritons take pride in their self-sufficiency, rarely trading with other underwater peoples such as merfolk, and even more rarely forming established alliances.

Tritons live in natural-grown villages on the sea floor, forging dwellings out of colorful coral reefs, in rift valleys heated by volcanic activity, and even in underwater canyons- though they avoid settling in extreme depths due to the risk of encountering krakens or worse. They like to decorate their homes with aquatic plants, bioluminescent fish, and attractive trinkets recovered from shipwrecks.

UEPKPYWJrNSP0Jqk.name: Shell Armor (Hide)
UEPKPYWJrNSP0Jqk.description: A mix of furs, sturdy hide, and sometimes molded boiled leather, this armor provides protection due to its layers of leather, though its bulkiness slows the wearer down and decreases mobility.

wy1mkkY0rhH0B5oL.name: Defender of the Seas
wy1mkkY0rhH0B5oL.description: The triton Interacts to raise their trident, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of their next turn. During this time, any of their allies also gains the bonus while adjacent to the triton.

NNPWYZUGqcGbUeZI.name: Summon Aquatic Ally
NNPWYZUGqcGbUeZI.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The triton blows into a conch shell, casting a 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal} spell. The triton can summon only an aquatic creature, such as a dolphin, octopus, ray, sea snake, or electric eel. This creature remains until it is slain, the triton Dismisses it, or the triton summons another ally.

Trollhound.name: Trollhound
Trollhound.publicNotes:
Trollhounds are squat, slavering beasts akin to trolls in canine form. Requiring vast quantities of meat to fuel their regenerative metabolisms, packs of wild trollhounds prowl the foothills of regions where trolls dwell, their voracious hunger driving them to slaughter and consume any prey they encounter. In some regions, trolls breed trollhounds as pets, utilizing the trollhounds' keen sense of smell to aid in the hunt.

Covered in fetid, weeping sores, trollhounds are carriers of a debilitating contagion known as bloodfire fever. Creatures that contract the disease through the bite of a trollhound experience deep internal pain, as if their blood were on fire. Additional symptoms include loss of muscle coordination, pus-filled blisters, and overall lethargy and fatigue. Other than suffering from skin irritation, both trolls and trollhounds are immune to the major effects of the disease.

Trollhounds are fearless on the hunt and in combat, relying on their ability to regenerate to carry them through. Not even the threat of fire is enough to repel them, as the beasts don't recognize the danger it represents. Nevertheless, fire is one of the most effective tools in combating trollhounds; canny hunters know to burn every last remnant of a supposedly slain trollhound, for their regenerative powers are potent indeed.

While trolls themselves have had great success in domesticating, training, and even befriending trollhounds, the same cannot be said for other would-be masters. Whether impeded by constant exposure to trollhounds' diseased slobber, their ravenous hunger that never seems to be fully sated, or simply their foul personality and quick-to-bite temperament, most attempts to use trollhounds in place of more reliable guardians end in pain, misery, and a pack of feral trollhounds escaping into the hinterlands. Left to their own devices, a pack of escaped trollhounds can breed relatively quickly, and it can take less than a year for a small pack to multiply into a significant threat to the countryside. Best to leave the trollhounds to the trolls, as they say!
Trollhound.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺
Trollhound.hp: 再生15 (酸液或火焰使其失效)

kFT6c7OlCSLY8QF1.name: 再生15 (酸液或火焰使其失效)

0DDWtKSDSWdXnkgj.name: Bloodfire Fever
0DDWtKSDSWdXnkgj.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

阶段1 携带但不发病(1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段3 Enfeebled 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1天)

阶段5 Enfeebled 2, Clumsy 2, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1天)

RNDT57aD8UzBIRVk.name: Pack Attack
RNDT57aD8UzBIRVk.description: The trollhound deals an extra [[/r 1d6]] damage to any creature within reach of at least two of the trollhound's allies.

Trumpet Archon.name: Trumpet Archon
Trumpet Archon.publicNotes: Trumpet archons are messengers, emissaries, and storytellers-embodiments of the virtue of kindness. They use stories and allegories to prevent bloodshed, and among all archons they are the most likely to work together with angels, perhaps leading to the similarities in their forms. When diplomacy is impossible, trumpet archons rally the righteous to battle-one reassuring glance from a trumpet archon is often all it takes to instill a shaken ally with resounding courage once again.
Trumpet Archon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

5E9Da5IYp7uvbZKT.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

qT91ezbxbLydVEdW.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
qT91ezbxbLydVEdW.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

BDA6jFei5doNakee.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
BDA6jFei5doNakee.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

3cOLTqxhMIIVbLaC.name: 防护法阵(仅限对抗邪恶) Circle of Protection (Against evil only)
3cOLTqxhMIIVbLaC.description:
你从一个特定阵营中保护一个生物和其附近生物。选择混乱、邪恶、善良或者秩序；该法术获得对立的特征。在该区域中的生物，在对抗所选阵营的生物的攻击的AC上，以及在对抗这些生物的豁免上获得+1状态加值。对于这些生物直接控制目标的豁免，或者对抗选择阵营的被召唤生物的攻击时，该加值提升到+3。所选阵营的被召唤生物除非通过成功的意志豁免否则无法自愿进入法术区域；重复尝试使用最初的豁免效果。

升阶 (4环级) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.RawLEPwyT5CtCZ4D]{法术效果：防护术}

KJp32QDhePr24crV.name: +2 Striking Bastard Sword
KJp32QDhePr24crV.description: This broad-bladed sword, sometimes called the hand-and-a-half sword, has a longer grip so it can be held in one hand or used with two hands to provide extra piercing or slashing power.

E2cmnuR9GJnpvSmN.name: +1 Resilient Full Plate
E2cmnuR9GJnpvSmN.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor and a pair of gauntlets.

TSzAkKreLHo2kCCD.name: Virtuoso Trumpet
TSzAkKreLHo2kCCD.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played. A virtuoso instrument gives a +1 item bonus to Performance checks using that instrument.

3EzYscL7vFw5pVbn.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

B26U4dSQygOAKMgv.name: Archon's Door
B26U4dSQygOAKMgv.description:
Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}, the archon can use dimension door (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door.

If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either creature used dimension door.

p18BSmeidbDDfJ2D.name: Kind Word
p18BSmeidbDDfJ2D.description: The trumpet archon offers an ally praise or encouragement. The archon attempts to counteract one emotion effect on the ally (with a counteract modifier of +24), and the archon and the ally both gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 round.

FdZZPAWhuFULerJd.name: Trumpet Blast
FdZZPAWhuFULerJd.description:
The trumpet archon blows mightily on their horn, creating a tone of such beauty and grandeur those who hear it are paralyzed in awe. Non-archons within 100 feet must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save.

They are temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} and flat-footed as long as it's stunned.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Twigjack.name: Twigjack
Twigjack.publicNotes:
Maladjusted forest denizens, twigjacks form from the cruel and prankish combination of fey and the very woods in which they reside. A twigjack's body is made up of prickly brambles woven with vines. Shaggy, mossy growth, not unlike hair, tops a twigjack's head. Its mouth is just a canyon of splintered and broken sticks bisecting its face. Leaves and sprigs of new growth randomly sprout from the creature's body. Many dense forests on Golarion have at least a handful of twigjacks living in the undergrowth.

While truculent and violent, twigjacks care deeply for what they consider to be their forests. These creatures harass outsiders who delve deep into their wooded domains, forcing back even the most determined explorers, foresters, and travelers, especially when those intruders cut roads through the forest. However, they are not terribly territorial when it comes to other forest creatures. When sylvan creatures, especially fey, rally against an outside threat, twigjacks in the area eagerly arrive to fight, even if they were not invited.

Less seasoned travelers who encounter twigjacks in their canopied homes often mistake them for leshys, a tendency that frustrates twigjacks, as they have a low opinion of such creatures. More broadly, twigjacks resent being considered mere animated plants at all. Rather, they embrace their fey heritage-often to a foolish end. Twigjacks go out of their way to ingratiate themselves to the fey creatures they live among. Several popular comic songs weave the tale of a twigjack attempting to woo a powerful and graceful dryad, only to be comically disgraced after many loutish attempts. Many fey seem embarrassed by these strange cousins, but some spriggans, quicklings, and redcaps harness the twigjacks' violent urges and disruptive behavior for their own purposes.

While twigjacks are fey, and as such are often found in the First World, it's somewhat curious that those twigjacks who find religion only rarely turn to the Eldest of the First World. Instead, twigjacks tend to worship false deities of their own design: figures spotted in tangles of tree branches, clots of undergrowth, or other hidden nooks in the natural world. These religions are always highly localized, and while these faiths do not support clerics, they often inspire zealous crusades against non-fey.

1abnSJGdHEvG6Lyl.name: Bramble Jump
1abnSJGdHEvG6Lyl.description:
需求 The twigjack is in undergrowth

效果 The twigjack scrambles into the undergrowth and instantly teleports to a square of undergrowth within 60尺。 This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

dOcDYCNGkTD6GGcZ.name: Splinter Spray
dOcDYCNGkTD6GGcZ.description:
The twigjack sprays a barrage of splinters and brambles from its body in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save).

It can't use Splinter Spray again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Two-Headed Troll.name: Two-Headed Troll
Two-Headed Troll.publicNotes:
Two-headed trolls are savage, dual-minded monsters with an unquenchable thirst for bloodshed, and dread tales of their ravenous appetites are whispered of in homesteads throughout the lands of the Inner Sea. Indeed, it is a custom for parents to invoke the two-headed troll as a warning to misbehaving children. "Finish your chores," a parent might say to a stubborn child, "or a two-headed troll will snatch you away at night and swallow you whole!" It's unclear why such a morbid tradition gained traction with parents, but it's an undeniable fact that two-headed trolls have an appetite for "nibbles"-creatures small enough to devour with one bite.

Mature two-headed trolls stand 13 feet in height, weighing roughly 1,700 pounds. Unlike common trolls, two-headed trolls share the upright gait of their ettin ancestry and do not walk hunched over.
Two-Headed Troll.hp: 再生25 (酸液或火焰使其失效)

ngIT9cdBAAOK2wzV.name: Independent Brains
ngIT9cdBAAOK2wzV.description:
Each of a two-headed troll's heads rolls their own initiative and has their own turn. Neither head can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.A72nHGUtNXgY5Ey9]{Delay}. At the start of a head's turn, that head gets 2 actions and 1 reaction. Each brain controls one of the troll's arms, but both can move the legs.

Any ability that would sever a two-headed troll's head (such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6xaxxKfvXED6LfIY]{Vorpal} weapon property) doesn't cause the two-headed troll to die if they still have their other head, but does cause them to lose the turns, actions, and reactions of the severed head.

Mental effects that target a single creature affect only one of the troll's heads.

hykxILVZRpdseaRk.name: 再生25 (酸液或火焰使其失效)

OXfHyEExXIhlnUp7.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

cPD60wC9FBtIdzPL.name: Head Regrowth
cPD60wC9FBtIdzPL.description:
A two-headed troll's regeneration can regrow a severed head. After regaining Hit Points from regeneration, the two-headed troll attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:10] check. On a success, the missing head is fully restored.

If a two-headed troll loses their last remaining head, they die immediately.

RUcTjfOyyFNcxgIK.name: Reactive Chomp
RUcTjfOyyFNcxgIK.description:
触发 On one head's initiative, the troll hits the same enemy with two consecutive claw Strikes in the same round

效果 While the prey is distracted with unrelenting claw attacks, the head that's not taking its turn makes a jaws Strike against the enemy.

Umonlee.name: Umonlee
Umonlee.publicNotes:
Those who dwell in the coldest climates of Golarion tell of a brutal beast that swims through the ice and snow and can devastate entire villages in minutes. Ancient Erutaki who made their homes in the frozen polar expanse called the Crown of the World named this monster the umonlee.

Umonlees are bestial predators who constantly hunt, rarely resting in service of a hunger that is never fully sated. Despite this animalistic drive, umonlees are semi-intelligent creatures who often select and stalk their prey. However, they are not terribly bright and often keep their hunting grounds in sparsely-trafficked areas. It is rare for an umonlee to attack a village, but one might attack a sparse group, such as a hunting or scouting party. Many caravans traversing the Path of Aganhei-the trade route between the continents of Avistan and Tian Xia that crosses the Crown of the World-have had their expeditions abruptly ended by an encounter with one of these monstrosities.

Those who study monsters posit that umonlees are related to chuuls, as the creatures exhibit some similarities. Both are semi-intelligent, crustacean predators that use ambush tactics to kill and eat their prey. Even though they can talk, umonlees typically only speak Aklo, which also gives credence to this theory. This would also lend to the theory that chuuls are products of alghollthu manipulation, meaning that umonlees are also the results of these alien designs. However, the fact that these creatures aren't evil argues well against such a theory.
Umonlee.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. mental
Umonlee.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)80尺

EAsAGjtMDBLWo0ZO.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

AWGPMKkIerwV9Q8R.name: Freezing Breath
AWGPMKkIerwV9Q8R.description:
The umonlee breathes a cone of extremely cold air that damages its prey and can freeze them to the ground. Its breath deals [[/r {12d8}[cold]]]{12d8寒冷伤害} to creatures in the @Template[type:cone|distance:50] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|traits:damaging-effect] save).

The umonlee can't use Freezing Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the creature is standing on the ground, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} as thick ice forms around it, and it can't recover from being slowed. The creature remains immobilized and slowed 1 until it manages to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} (DC 36) or deal 30 damage to the ice, which has weakness 10 to fire.

大失败 As failure, except the creature takes double damage and the ice holding it in place requires 60 damage to break.

Undine Hydromancer.name: Undine Hydromancer
Undine Hydromancer.publicNotes:
Undines are infused with elemental water-the churning power of the briny deep flows through them. These planar scions are often athletic and lithe, but they are easily distracted by auditory sensations because of how much louder and clearer sound rings above the waves.

Undines are perhaps the most settled of all geniekin, often forming communities along the coast or even on the water itself. In the latter case, they prefer to settle in ship-towns that sometimes number dozens of vessels in all shapes and sizes. The undines who fill these communities are similarly diverse, bringing aspects of multiple cultures together to form one whole. Ship-towns are permanent, but fluid-they grow, recede, and migrate constantly as undine families add their ships to or remove them from the flotilla. An undine town like this may remain at sea for years, its residents coming ashore only on rare occasions to collect wood for cookfires or to repair their homes. The paradoxically ever-shifting permanence of these communities reflects the undine virtues of adaptability and freedom, while also maintaining the prime importance of the community.

Undine hydromancers are quite valued on these floating settlements, if only for their ability to create fresh drinking water while adrift on the sea.

nKxh2nKRG7lu73n8.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
nKxh2nKRG7lu73n8.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

Urdefhan Tormentor.name: Urdefhan Tormentor
Urdefhan Tormentor.publicNotes: Urdefhan spellcasters with a knack for the divine are invariably unholy worshippers of daemonkind, typically taking on one of Abaddon's Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse as their patron deity. With their unholy gifts, these urdefhan tormentors summon daemons into battle and bolster their allies with profane magic, preferring to stick to the sidelines rather than enter the fray directly.

i3JP3msktn7Ld1pK.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

cXiAbItR9q9FYi5R.name: 羽落术(仅限自身) Feather Fall (Self only)
cXiAbItR9q9FYi5R.description:
触发 射程内的一个生物坠落

你利用空气，阻碍坠落。目标的坠落减慢到60尺每轮，并且在法术持续时间范围内的下坠高度不会用于计算坠落伤害中。如果在法术生效时目标触地，它不会因坠落承受伤害。该法术在目标落地时立即结束。

fJJc56GDg0EB3oit.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

g5TUPRPR9gHfXrfU.name: Necrotic Decay
g5TUPRPR9gHfXrfU.description:
When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around the body.

This gas deals [[/r {5d6}[negative]]]{5d6负能量伤害} to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|basic:true] save).

J2UWT1TZOpg7ODbW.name: Stoke the Fervent
J2UWT1TZOpg7ODbW.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The urdefhan lets out a battle cry, sending itself and its allies into a fanatical frenzy. Each ally that hears the call gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws, and takes a -1 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

This lasts for [[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4轮}.

cLUNjff4ATgKuIj8.name: Wicked Bite
cLUNjff4ATgKuIj8.description:
需求 The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action

效果 The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save. If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.

  • Drain Blood The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} and the urdefhan regains 5 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} and the urdefhan regains 10 HP).
  • Drain Vitality The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour on a failed save (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} for 1 hour on a critical failure).

Urdefhan Warrior.name: Urdefhan Warrior
Urdefhan Warrior.publicNotes: From the moment they are born, urdefhans are prepared for war. Urdefhan warriors are among the least powerful urdefhans one might encounter outside of their eerie underground cities.

sZ3V72jPCOJ8oK7p.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

MPie4KH85kEeFZ7y.name: 羽落术(仅限自身) Feather Fall (Self only)
MPie4KH85kEeFZ7y.description:
触发 射程内的一个生物坠落

你利用空气，阻碍坠落。目标的坠落减慢到60尺每轮，并且在法术持续时间范围内的下坠高度不会用于计算坠落伤害中。如果在法术生效时目标触地，它不会因坠落承受伤害。该法术在目标落地时立即结束。

0a9bxpI79rMpqyXh.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

w1UuelNH4N0BPFBe.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

M5bYj5m7ymoWlabG.name: Necrotic Decay
M5bYj5m7ymoWlabG.description:
When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around the body.

This gas deals [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6负能量伤害} to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|basic:true] save).

cOypeEDeaznFsSdO.name: Ravenous Attack
cOypeEDeaznFsSdO.description: The urdefhan makes one rhoka sword Strike and one jaws Strike against a single creature. Its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

tONGWAraS1nSA49Y.name: Wicked Bite
tONGWAraS1nSA49Y.description:
需求 The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action

效果 The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save.
