If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.

  • Drain Blood The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} and the urdefhan regains 5 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} and the urdefhan regains 10 HP).
  • Drain Vitality The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour on a failed save (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} for 1 hour on a critical failure).

Vampire Squid.name: Vampire Squid
Vampire Squid.publicNotes: Vampire squid are neither undead nor blood drinkers. Their name is instead inspired by their red eyes and the dark, cloak-like webbing between their arms. Living in the lightless depths of the ocean, the vampire squid can eject a cloud of bioluminescent mucus that nauseates predators.

vmyBkhvE34HW6vpl.name: Glowing Mucus
vmyBkhvE34HW6vpl.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 The vampire squid is in water

效果 The vampire squid ejects a cloud of bioluminescent mucus in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Non-squid creatures within the cloud must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}. The glowing mucus remains in the area for 1 minute, and any creature that ends its turn in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:13] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

Vanth.name: Vanth
Vanth.publicNotes: Protecting the Boneyard are the stern and resolute guardians of the dead known as vanths, psychopomps who resemble skeletons with raven-like wings and a mask resembling a vulture's skull. Vanths carry black scythes to fight against those who would disturb the natural progression of souls, and they consider any visitor to the Boneyard a potential troublemaker. When the psychopomp armies go to war, vanths serve as front-line soldiers. They rarely speak and even more rarely show any emotion other than a grim adherence to duty.
Vanth.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Vanth.senses: 黑暗视觉, 生命感知60尺

d2h0zilfslOI1NGH.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

O09US7v1AHXJRsXA.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
O09US7v1AHXJRsXA.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

lzENfKBITeCmLlWo.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
lzENfKBITeCmLlWo.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

TgdLSsUbxoCtvEgV.name: +1 Scythe
TgdLSsUbxoCtvEgV.description: Derived from a farming tool used to mow down long grains and cereals, this weapon has a long wooden shaft with protruding handles, capped with a curved blade set at a right angle.

Z4dJO56WCJUBTpyf.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

pV2UvWTozyuKQHGx.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

de7GnRXapzBCdDoL.name: Infuse Weapon
de7GnRXapzBCdDoL.description: A vanth's scythe is its symbol of office and gains a measure of its personal power. This scythe becomes a +1 scythe and is treated as if it were adamantine while the vanth wields it. A vanth whose scythe is taken or destroyed can infuse a new one with an hour of work.

oBV1Ybwqj4dpXeff.name: 灵魂之触 Spirit Touch
oBV1Ybwqj4dpXeff.description: An vanth's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune and deal [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} to living creatures and [[/r {2d6}[positive]]]{2d6正能量伤害} to undead.

Sep8lU0AriLntZmy.name: Vanth's Curse
Sep8lU0AriLntZmy.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The vanth bestows a curse on a creature by touching it with its scythe. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

大成功 The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Vanth's Curse for 24 hours.

成功 The target feels a momentary shudder of doom and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 minute by the distracting sensation.

失败 The target becomes morose and glum as it accepts its own inevitable fate. For 1 hour, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}. Each time the target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying} condition, the stupefied condition value increases by 1, to a maximum value of stupefied 4.

大失败 As failure, but the effect is permanent.

Vaspercham.name: Vaspercham
Vaspercham.publicNotes: The darkly intelligent vaspercham, an aquatic horror who delights in violence and destruction, lurks in the shallows near shorelines. Once a vaspercham settles on a new home, they stubbornly stay there, regardless of any communities dwelling nearby. A vaspercham's physical might and magic-warping abilities make them incredibly hard to dislodge once entrenched, and many seaside communities have relocated after a vaspercham came calling. The monster responds only to strength, so one must best a vaspercham in combat to gain their begrudging cooperation. But once the creature recovers their strength, they inevitably betray any temporary alliance.
Vaspercham.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

fRuyuldjZkDBFASw.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

7p38bExu8L9jgQ5N.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
7p38bExu8L9jgQ5N.description:
你能看见 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

RHRtFPGTQDqJ0cER.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

yNsJmPBe7WVLrPiX.name: Magic-Warping Aura
yNsJmPBe7WVLrPiX.description:
30尺。

A vaspercham's shell distorts nearby magic. Any creature in the aura who Casts a Spell must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:37] save.

大成功 The spell is unaffected and the caster is temporarily immune to the magic-warping aura for 1 minute.

成功 The spell is unaffected, but if the spell allows a saving throw, the vaspercham gains a +1 circumstance bonus to save against it.

失败 If the spell has a target and there are one or more viable targets within its range, the spell's target changes, determined randomly by the GM. If there is no other possible target within range or the spell has no target, the spell is disrupted.

大失败 The caster instead Casts another Spell, choosing randomly from their spell repertoire, prepared spells, or available focus spells (as appropriate) and selecting any targets at random.

lL32oAteqyTNi0nT.name: Hallucinatory Brine
lL32oAteqyTNi0nT.description: A creature hit by the vaspercham's Strikes or Mindwarping Tide must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save. On a failure, the creature is overwhelmed with phantasmal visions, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure).

YwNfN5E1fuqbDqG5.name: Mindwarping Tide
YwNfN5E1fuqbDqG5.description: The vaspercham releases an effusion of noxious water from its shell. Creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] must save against the vaspercham's hallucinatory brine.

WbbgLFwKjXAiRHsC.name: Whipping Tentacles
WbbgLFwKjXAiRHsC.description: The vaspercham makes four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the vaspercham's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the vaspercham makes all of their attacks.

Veranallia.name: Veranallia
Veranallia.publicNotes:
Veranallias represent the freedom of life to grow, change, and adapt. They rarely interact directly with non-azatas, as most other beings find their nature hard to comprehend, but those who secure their aid find them powerful allies. The lower half of a veranallia's body is made of vegetation that constantly repeats a dizzying cycle of sprouting, blooming, thriving, and wilting. The upper half of their body appears as that of a humanoid of any gender-it is rare for a veranallia to remain consistent in their gender for more than a few seasons at a time.

Veranallias transform the landscape in their wake, bringing creation and destruction alike. The world around them overflows with an abundance of vegetation, with plenty of food for nearby animals, and when they bring destruction, they do so without cruelty, as it is sometimes necessary to make room for new life. They trigger forest fires in woodlands before dry brush piles up to dangerous levels, and bring bitter winters to areas plagued with parasites that thrive in hot weather.
Veranallia.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)120尺
Veranallia.languages: Speak With Animals, Speak With Plants, Tongues

hyuJvmXFcS4R6bfc.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

qxGCsUCI43v3qoRC.name: 荒古奇观(每年一次) Primal Phenomenon (Once per year)
qxGCsUCI43v3qoRC.description:
你从自然世界中请求直接干涉。大自然总是会拒绝非自然的请求，并且可能满足一个另外的请求（可能更为强力或者更符合其本性），而不是你所本来请求的那个。施放一次荒古奇观可以达成下列事情。

  • 复制任何你有访问许可（Access）的9环级或者更低的原能法术。
  • 复制任何你有访问许可（Access）的7环级或者更低的非原能法术。
  • 产生任何效果与上述效果相当的效果。
  • 逆转提到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}的效果。

根据GM的判断，你可以通过荒古奇观尝试产生比这些更强的效果，但是这可能非常危险，并且该法术可能只会部分生效。

5AQMHCwBWHE6c3p1.name: 忍受环境(恒定法术) Endure Elements (Constant)
5AQMHCwBWHE6c3p1.description:
你保护目标免受危险温度的侵害。选择严寒（Severe cold）或者炎热（Severe heat）。目标免受你选择的温度的影响（但不包括极寒（Extreme cold）和炽热（Extreme heat））。

升阶 (3环级) 目标免受严寒（Severe cold）和炎热（Severe heat）的影响。

升阶 (5环级) 目标免受严寒（Severe cold），炎热（Severe heat），极寒（Extreme cold）和炽热（Extreme heat）的影响。

4wGOi1Y9QjvOIUWd.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
4wGOi1Y9QjvOIUWd.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

X8HPyH2dWuDAiYT3.name: 植物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Plants (Constant)
X8HPyH2dWuDAiYT3.description: 你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答，但该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

r9Vti0pP2In1fPgO.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
r9Vti0pP2In1fPgO.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

Um9w32ZfDOZ1WfA3.name: 融身入林(随意施法) Tree Stride (At will)
Um9w32ZfDOZ1WfA3.description:
你进入一个主干足够大，能够容纳你的活着的树中，并立即传送到5英里内，任一种类相同的，同样树干足够大的树中。当你进入前一棵树中时，你会立即了解到射程内其他足够大的同类树的大致位置，并且如果需要，可以从原来的树出来。你不能随身携带异次元空间；如果你尝试如此做，该法术失败。

升阶 (6环级) 你出来的树可以至多距离50英里。

升阶 (8环级) 你出来的树可以至多距离500英里。

升阶 (9环级) 你出来的树在同一星球上的任何位置。

ajiWSW5GFwz1c2fZ.name: 极冰射线(随意施法) Polar Ray (At will)
ajiWSW5GFwz1c2fZ.description:
你从指间射出一道围绕着冰雪的蓝白色急冻射线，造成10d8寒冷伤害。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰。

大成功 目标承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

成功 目标承受完整伤害，并获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d8。

IHpzMqwVP4Qwisa6.name: 阳炎爆(随意施法) Sunburst (At will)
IHpzMqwVP4Qwisa6.description:
强力而耀眼的球状日光在区域中爆开，对该区域中的生物造成8d10火焰伤害，以及对不死生物造成8d10额外正能量伤害。在该区域中的每个生物和物体必须尝试一次反射豁免。如果阳炎爆的球状区域与魔法黑暗的区域部分重叠，则会尝试反制该黑暗效果。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害。

大失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且永久 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲} 。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d10，并且对不死生物的正能量伤害增加1d10。

T1jTn0jRuZqV93CM.name: 恶意变形术(随意施法) Baleful Polymorph (At will)
T1jTn0jRuZqV93CM.description:
你尝试将目标生物变形为一种与所处地区相关的无害动物，该效果基于强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标的身体会获得该无害生物的一些次要特征。其身体内部被这种部分变化所扰乱，获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。当它从恶心中恢复时，其形态恢复到正常状态。

失败 目标被变形，持续一分钟，但是会保留心智。它可以在自己的回合花费所有动作，专注于其本来的形态，这令它可以获得一次意志豁免以结束该效果。

大失败 目标从身体到心灵被变形为选择的无害动物，持续一天。

ISGa39OKNaOBS5Rb.name: 缠结匐蔓(随意施法) Tangling Creepers (At will)
ISGa39OKNaOBS5Rb.description: 茂密缠绕的蔓生植物从区域中所有表面中冒出，并充实每一块水体。。在该区域中的，在地面上移动的，在藤蔓上攀爬或者游泳的生物，在其速度上承受-10尺环境减值。每轮一次，你可以使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，令藤蔓从任何方格涌出。该藤蔓具有15尺触及。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰；如果成功，该藤蔓会将目标拽入蔓生植物中，令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} ，持续1轮，或者直到该生物逃脱（Escape）（对抗你的法术DC），以先发生为准。

H1AVYB6nbAL4PkmI.name: +3 Greater Striking Sickle
H1AVYB6nbAL4PkmI.description: Originally a farming tool used for reaping grain, this one‑handed weapon has a short wooden handle ending in a curved blade, sometimes sharpened on both sides.

9WzRmRmcle5Fmp7N.name: Alter Weather
9WzRmRmcle5Fmp7N.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The veranallia dramatically alters weather patterns in the surrounding area, producing any of the results of a successful 9th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XkDCzMIyc0YOjw05]{Control Weather} ritual.

iCMR05ML275h0Gek.name: Rebirth
iCMR05ML275h0Gek.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The veranallia spends a minute to encase a creature that has been dead for no more than a year in a cocoon. After 24 hours, the creature is restored to life, and the cocoon explodes in a shower of colorful blossoms. If the veranallia's chooses, Rebirth can change the creature's ancestry or heritage, typically into an aasimar.

Verdurous Ooze.name: Verdurous Ooze
Verdurous Ooze.publicNotes: Verdurous oozes are found in temperate forests, warm jungles, or other places where plant life grows in abundance. Unlike many types of oozes, verdurous oozes are not particularly good climbers and have been known to get trapped in natural or artificial chasms. Warlords and wizards sometimes make use of that fact and keep verdurous oozes as guardians in pits around the walls of their fortresses or towers.

Ox2rTRtNAQouxryx.name: 运动感知60尺
Ox2rTRtNAQouxryx.description: A verdurous ooze can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

whb2OZIXgagZrUoX.name: Corrosive Surface
whb2OZIXgagZrUoX.description: A creature that hits a verdurous ooze with a metal weapon or unarmed attack must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect] save. On a failure, the weapon or creature takes [[/r {2d4}[acid]]]{2d4酸液伤害} (after dealing damage to the ooze as normal). Thrown weapons take this damage automatically with no save.

H5H2qTd7RH9FnyiA.name: Enliven Foliage
H5H2qTd7RH9FnyiA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The verdurous ooze constantly emits supernatural vapors that cause nearby plants to grow rapidly and writhe and grasp at anything and everything within the emanation. This area becomes difficult terrain for non-verdurous ooze creatures. When a creature starts its turn in this aura, it must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21] save or take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the emanation.

Q1JyYPsUlKes2ELl.name: Split
Q1JyYPsUlKes2ELl.description: When a verdurous ooze that has 10 or more HP is hit by an attack that would deal piercing or slashing damage, it splits into two identical oozes, each with half the original's HP. One ooze is in the same space as the original, and the other is in an adjacent, unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or heavy to push).

u9uoDYlFsBGEdg0u.name: Sleep Gas
u9uoDYlFsBGEdg0u.description:
The verdurous ooze adjusts its aura of supernatural vapors to affect living creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], forcing them to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to Sleep Gas for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}. If it's still unconscious after 1 minute, it wakes up automatically.

大失败 The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}. If it's still unconscious after 1 hour, it wakes up automatically.

TcRZ95uAXroBAwRv.name: Verdurous Ooze Acid
TcRZ95uAXroBAwRv.description: A verdurous ooze's acid damages only metal and flesh-not bone, stone, or other materials.

Vexgit.name: Vexgit
Vexgit.publicNotes:
These gremlins are covered head-to-toe by a crustacean-like exoskeleton that clacks and rattles whenever a vexgit moves. They delight in sabotaging the works of other creatures, often turning these works into dangerous traps. An individual vexgit might jam a door lock, loosen the wheels on a carriage, or remove nails from a boat hull. Buildings infested by vexgits become filled with traps like portcullises descending suddenly, water pipes exploding violently, and clock towers disgorging an avalanches of gears.

Aware of their own physical weakness, vexgits carry hammers and other tools to leverage pieces apart or smash whatever they're unable to disassemble. Indeed, a hammer sized for a human becomes a maul in the tiny hands of a vexgit.

Vexgit infestations range from one to a score. Larger groups are often led by a more powerful vexgit with additional skill in thievery or primal magic. Trained giant rats, vipers, and rat swarms are common in vexgit lairs.

5UAZUiojo21FxrFI.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

u4BcgBmwi4zY27Ei.name: Clacking Exoskeleton
u4BcgBmwi4zY27Ei.description: A creature that can hear gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its Perception DC against a vexgit's attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

wA3oz36wHS6e53Sa.name: Destructive Smash
wA3oz36wHS6e53Sa.description: A vexgit's maul Strike against an object deals ignores up to 5 of the object's Hardness.

HQfx53oV60UYo0lg.name: Gremlin Snare
HQfx53oV60UYo0lg.description:
频率 once per hour

效果 The vexgit creates a snare of their level or lower that normally takes 1 minute to craft at no cost. A single vexgit can maintain one gremlin snare at a time-if they create a new snare, the previously created one vanishes.

8og5NF6ejbQcG1bF.name: Rusting Grasp
8og5NF6ejbQcG1bF.description:
频率 once per hour

效果 The vexgit makes a [[/r {1d20+9}#Spell Attack]]{+9 spell attack} against a creature or unattended object. If they succeed, the vexgit deals [[/r 1d6]] damage (doubled on a critical hit) to a metal item the target is wearing or holding, ignoring its Hardness. If they hit an unattended metal item, the item takes this damage automatically.

If a creature uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.m4HQ2o5aPxjXf2kY]{Shield Block} with a metal shield against this attack, the shield is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{破损 Broken}, but no other item is rusted on that attack.

AiGQomtSZwNKsTr9.name: Speedy Sabotage
AiGQomtSZwNKsTr9.description: When a vexgit succeeds or critically succeeds at a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{解除装置 Disable a Device}, they gain an additional success toward disabling a complex device.

Violet Fungus.name: Violet Fungus
Violet Fungus.publicNotes:
At a glance, a violet fungus might seem to be little more than an unsightly and sickeningly purple mushroom of unusual size. Only once one draws closer-once whip-like tentacles dripping with flesh-rotting venom slither out from the fungus's cratered cap-does the terrifying truth of this carnivorous toadstool become apparent. Many amateur spelunkers have met untimely ends in the clutches of this monstrous fungus's tentacles, since violet fungi are practically synonymous with caverns on Golarion.

Anyone who has ever braved the world's caves for an extended period of time know the dangers of the deadly violet fungus. Darklands dwellers such as drow and duergars often bear the long, whip-like scars of at least one brush with this vicious plant's cruel, poison-infused tentacles. Canny subterranean trappers and scouts sometimes make use of cultivated violent fungi to catch game in the enormous caverns below the surface world. Some Darklands peoples also cultivate violet fungi as a means to defend their territory. Xulgaths in particular place violet fungi around the perimeters of their settlements as a first line of defense.

f1adZO1FX8WkPN1h.name: Violet Rot
f1adZO1FX8WkPN1h.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} plus enfeebled 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害} plus enfeebled 1 and drained 1 (1轮)

Void Zombie.name: Void Zombie
Void Zombie.publicNotes:
A void zombie arises when a humanoid dies from an akata's void death affliction. This walking corpse is animated by a larval akata attached to the deceased creature's brain, using a grotesque feeding tendril that emerges from the corpse's mouth to drink blood from its victims.

A void zombie typically exists for only a few months before it collapses and the larval akata crawls free from the motionless shell. When it feels the natural end of its unlife approaching, a void zombie finds a secluded place to vomit forth the nearly mature akata larva, then withers away. The disgorged larva metamorphizes into a full-grown akata several hours later, usually eating the corpse as its first meal.

The name "void zombie" is something of a misnomer; though still compelled by necromantic energies, a void zombie is a host in the life cycle of a parasitic alien, not a mindless, reanimated corpse (despite their similar appearances). The fact that a typical void zombie shares the neutral alignment of the larval akata within, rather than the intrinsically evil nature of other zombies, has caused some scholars to push to reclassify them under other names. Suggestions have included "void dead," "akata spawn," or "bloodwalker," but the visceral and compelling commonplace name has proven difficult to shed.

The driving force behind a void zombie's violence rises from the ravenous hunger of the alien parasite that serves as the channel for its animating negative energies. Necromancers have tried often to duplicate the void zombie, but without a larval akata hosted within, the result is simply a zombie with missing jaws or, at best, one that moves faster than normal. Others have compared a captive void zombie to a captive yellow musk thrall in an attempt to discover a potential link between the two- after all, both are animated bodies controlled by a parasitic outside force. Strangely, a void zombie becomes particularly violent when encountering a yellow musk thrall, making direct comparisons of the two creatures particularly difficult, or even dangerous. The fact that a void zombie, unlike a yellow musk thrall, is actually undead may hold some clues as to the source of this strange behavior.

mdEZdShzE63nlTQK.name: Salt Water Vulnerability
mdEZdShzE63nlTQK.description: Salt water acts as an extremely strong acid on the larval akata inside the void zombie. Full immersion in salt water deals [[/r {4d6}[acid]]]{4d6酸液伤害} per round. On any round in which the void zombie takes damage due to its salt water weakness, the larval akata retreats to the depths of the void zombie's body, causing the void zombie to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

19Ayra6rX2M49iPG.name: Feed on Blood
19Ayra6rX2M49iPG.description:
需求 The void zombie's previous action was a successful feeding tendril Strike against the target creature

效果 The void zombie uses its feeding tendril to drain blood from the creature struck. The void zombie regains 4 Hit Points, and the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives healing of any kind or amount.

Vrolikai.name: Vrolikai
Vrolikai.publicNotes: Unlike other demons, the dread vrolikai doesn't form from a sinful soul-they instead manifest from a nabasu once the nabasu finally satisfies their hunger and returns to the Abyss, and as such vrolikais suffer from no vulnerability associated with a specific sin. A vrolikai who survives this process and the period of vulnerability that follows gains great power and in time can claim large regions of the Abyss as their own domain. Also known as death demons, these murderous monsters often serve demon lords as executioners or assassins.
Vrolikai.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

yinuvv1DAaHpt2dq.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

zmGi1QNStSaYC6ai.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
zmGi1QNStSaYC6ai.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

LFMYOAZVijC6GmzA.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
LFMYOAZVijC6GmzA.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

QNvBVG4wk0atHVo9.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

28xyMG8bDPJrcRsP.name: Death-Stealing Gaze
28xyMG8bDPJrcRsP.description:
30尺。

When a non-demon ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}.

FQZGypLzxjxM8v3a.name: Black Flame Knives
FQZGypLzxjxM8v3a.description: A vrolikai can manifest a dagger-shaped blade of what looks like crystallized black flame in each of their four hands. These weapons function as +2 Striking Daggers, although they fade away into nothingness 1 minute after a vrolikai no longer carries them.

Nl0sqXtr54YzMawN.name: Consume Death
Nl0sqXtr54YzMawN.description:
The vrolikai focuses their death-stealing gaze upon a single target they can see within 30尺。 The target must immediately attempt a Fortitude save against death-stealing gaze.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is affected by death-stealing gaze and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. If the creature was already drained 1 by the death-stealing gaze before attempting the save, a failed save increases the value of the drained condition by 1, to a maximum of drained 4. The vrolikai gains 10 temporary Hit Points, and the drained creature is temporarily immune until the start of the vrolikai's next turn.

大失败 As failure, but the creature increases the amount of drain by 2.

ej0lyLnZuPKMNMnI.name: Focused Flames
ej0lyLnZuPKMNMnI.description:
The vrolikai attacks a single target with all of its black flame knives. The demon makes a black flame knife Strike. On a successful attack, the vrolikai deals the damage from a black flame knife Strike to the target, plus an additional [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} for every black flame knife they wield beyond the first (typically [[/r {6d6}[negative]]]{6d6负能量伤害}). Even on a failed attack, the vrolikai deals the damage from one black flame knife to the target, though they still miss completely on a critical failure. On a critical hit, the victim becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} as the focused attack drains pure life essence as well as damage.

This counts toward the vrolikai's multiple attack penalty as a number of attacks equal to the number of black flame knives the demon wields.

JS74Gdm0nVhPpG4k.name: Mindwarping
JS74Gdm0nVhPpG4k.description:
The sting of a vrolikai is mind-warping. A creature struck must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:44] save.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

失败 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}. Further failed saves against mindwarping increase the condition value by 1, to a maximum of stupefied 4.

大失败 As failure, but the creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 minute.

Ij85zXU5FdthHI5o.name: Stolen Death
Ij85zXU5FdthHI5o.description: A creature that dies while suffering drain from a vrolikai's death-stealing gaze rises as a ghoul the next midnight.

Vrykolakas Ancient.name: Vrykolakas Ancient
Vrykolakas Ancient.publicNotes: Vrykolakas ancients are the sinister overlords of their kind, stealing blood, breath, and life to feed their immortal hunger.

aeyCi4yAR1t8VtMz.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

8GQKAYkj3NIJHurF.name: Children of the Night
8GQKAYkj3NIJHurF.description: The presence of a vrykolakas ancient inspires savage creatures to crawl forth to do its bidding, including rat swarms, wargs, werewolves, and similar creatures. The vrykolakas ancient can give telepathic orders to these creatures within 100尺, but they can't communicate back.

tTPvWYYvp1PgybyK.name: Swift Tracker
tTPvWYYvp1PgybyK.description: The vrykolakas moves at full Speed while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}.

WPVTRIdQSTbDZImk.name: Feral Possession
WPVTRIdQSTbDZImk.description:
触发 The vrykolakas is reduced to 0 Hit Points, and an animal is within 100尺

效果 Unlike most other undead, a vrykolakas isn't destroyed when it reaches 0 HP. Instead, it attempts to cast its spirit into an animal within 100尺, which must attempt a Will save (DC 33). On a failure, the animal is possessed. This has the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{占据术 Possession} spell, but it lasts a number of days equal to the vrykolakas's level. This possession can't be counteracted with magic (though remove curse works against it normally).

If the animal succeeds at its save, the vrykolakas can attempt to possess a different animal within 100尺。 If at any point an animal critically succeeds at its save or no animal is within 100尺, the vrykolakas fails to possess anything and is destroyed.

A vrykolakas possessing an animal seeks out its burial site (see Burial Site Bound) immediately, burying itself there. While the vrykolakas is in this state of recovery, its animal host is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, and beheading it destroys the vrykolakas and kills its host. Removing the curse destroys the vrykolakas and returns the animal to normal.

After [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}, if the vrykolakas hasn't been destroyed, the animal dies and the vrykolakas rises in a new body that's identical to its previous one, formed from the animal's remains.

sSAVmevencpx75UB.name: Pestilential Aura
sSAVmevencpx75UB.description:
5尺, @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

Creatures beginning their turn in the area while the vrykolakas is in its true form are exposed to bubonic plague.

Bubonic Plague

This widespread illness can sweep through entire communities, leaving few unaffected. The first indication of the disease is a telltale swelling of glands. In some cases, the disease can move into your lungs (pneumonic plague) or blood (septicemic plague), which is even more fatal.

If you have bubonic plague, you can't remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} condition while affected.

潜伏期 1天

阶段1 fatigued (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} and fatigued (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3}, fatigued, and take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] every [[/r 1d20 #minutes]]{1d20分钟}

JGEy5BcX7MQ17sdA.name: Vrykolakas Vulnerabilities
JGEy5BcX7MQ17sdA.description:
Vrykolakas all have the following vulnerabilities.

  • Burial Site Bound A vrykolakas is bound to the place of its death or interment. It must return to this location once per week and bury itself in the earth for 24 hours, during which time it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} and can be beheaded. If it is unable to return to this site, it is reduced to 0 Hit Points and attempts to use Feral Corruption; if this host animal can't return to the burial site before the possession effect ends, the vrykolakas is destroyed and the animal host returns to normal.
  • Vulnerable to Decapitation A vrykolakas that is beheaded can't use its Feral Possession, and a beheaded corpse cannot rise as a vrykolakas.

x1kqxURcucjG3BaP.name: Change Shape
x1kqxURcucjG3BaP.description:
A vrykolakas ancient can transform into a form resembling the body it had in life, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} but with unlimited duration. It loses its fangs and claw Strikes but gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} in this form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

DC3068Ne4eQKeeW1.name: Create Spawn
DC3068Ne4eQKeeW1.description:
If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, a vrykolakas ancient can turn this creature into a vrykolakas spawn by donating some of its own blood to the creature and burying it in earth for 3 nights.

Such vrykolakas spawn are generally friendly to the vrykolakas that created them, but they are not under its control and typically wander off on their own rampage within [[/r 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days} of their creation.

G0D3kQHUd2mouA90.name: Dominate Animal
G0D3kQHUd2mouA90.description:
DC 33,

The vrykolakas can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} at will as a divine innate spell that affects only animals. A creature that succeeds is immune to that vrykolakas's Dominate Animal for 24 hours. Destroying the vrykolakas ends the effect, but reducing it to 0 HP does not.

A dominated animal takes a -4 circumstance penalty to saving throws against the vrykolakas's Feral Possession.

pTjXZs6ZwSF31KLb.name: Drink Blood
pTjXZs6ZwSF31KLb.description:
需求 The vrykolakas' last action was a successful fangs Strike

效果 The vrykolakas sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}, and the vrykolakas regains 25 HP, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points.

Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire, but it increases the creature's drained condition value by 1. A vrykolakas can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

The target creature's drained condition value decreases by 1 per week.

A blood transfusion, which requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:20] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drained value by 1 after 10 minutes.

Mtkrvum6bboSrXtq.name: Sanguine Mauling
Mtkrvum6bboSrXtq.description:
需求 The vrykolakas ancient's last action was to Drink Blood

效果 The vrykolakas ancient makes two claw Strikes. Both count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after it makes both attacks. If it hits with both claws, the target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success].

uot20BQOy52S73qO.name: Steal Breath
uot20BQOy52S73qO.description:
需求 The vrykolakas ancient is adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} creature

效果 The vrykolakas ancient steals the creature's breath. The unconscious creature begins suffocating, can't be awakened for 1 round, and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save. If a creature is targeted with this ability in consecutive rounds, the save DC decreases by 2 each round after the first.

大成功 The target immediately awakens and is then temporarily immune to Steal Breath for 24 hours.

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 The target takes [[/r 1d10]] damage.

大失败 The target is reduced to 0 HP and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying 1}.

Vrykolakas Master.name: Vrykolakas Master
Vrykolakas Master.publicNotes: Vrykolakas masters are sinister shapechangers. They walk undetected among the living and prey upon them like a wolf among sheep, often leaving the corpses to rise as vrykolakas spawn.

lxYAhoN0aTLMmh5g.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

iYT6OEbdoPMem0XE.name: Children of the Night
iYT6OEbdoPMem0XE.description: The presence of a vrykolakas master inspires savage creatures to crawl forth to do its bidding, including rat swarms, wargs, werewolves, and similar creatures. The vrykolakas master can give telepathic orders to these creatures within 100尺, but they can't communicate back.

zZs4I9L8EkJWK9UP.name: Swift Tracker
zZs4I9L8EkJWK9UP.description: The vrykolakas moves at full Speed while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}.
