gm4ckzxne8UYVaZg.description:
触发 The vrykolakas is reduced to 0 Hit Points, and an animal is within 100尺

效果 Unlike most other undead, a vrykolakas isn't destroyed when it reaches 0 HP. Instead, it attempts to cast its spirit into an animal within 100尺, which must attempt a Will save (DC 29). On a failure, the animal is possessed. This has the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{占据术 Possession} spell, but it lasts a number of days equal to the vrykolakas's level. This possession can't be counteracted with magic (though remove curse works against it normally).

If the animal succeeds at its save, the vrykolakas can attempt to possess a different animal within 100尺。 If at any point an animal critically succeeds at its save or no animal is within 100尺, the vrykolakas fails to possess anything and is destroyed.

A vrykolakas possessing an animal seeks out its burial site (see Burial Site Bound below) immediately, burying itself there. While the vrykolakas is in this state of recovery, its animal host is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, and beheading it destroys the vrykolakas and kills its host. Removing the curse destroys the vrykolakas and returns the animal to normal.

After [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}, if the vrykolakas hasn't been destroyed, the animal dies and the vrykolakas rises in a new body that's identical to its previous one, formed from the animal's remains.

2ESgkLReH2zyxUIl.name: Pestilential Aura
2ESgkLReH2zyxUIl.description:
5尺, @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

Creatures beginning their turn in the area while the vrykolakas is in its true form are exposed to bubonic plague.

Bubonic Plague

This widespread illness can sweep through entire communities, leaving few unaffected. The first indication of the disease is a telltale swelling of glands. In some cases, the disease can move into your lungs (pneumonic plague) or blood (septicemic plague), which is even more fatal.

If you have bubonic plague, you can't remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} condition while affected.

潜伏期 1天

阶段1 fatigued (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} and fatigued (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3}, fatigued, and take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] every [[/r 1d20 #minutes]]{1d20分钟}

lIiFggTlCNveUaJM.name: Vrykolakas Vulnerabilities
lIiFggTlCNveUaJM.description:
Vrykolakas all have the following vulnerabilities.

  • Burial Site Bound A vrykolakas is bound to the place of its death or interment. It must return to this location once per week and bury itself in the earth for 24 hours, during which time it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} and can be beheaded. If it is unable to return to this site, it is reduced to 0 Hit Points and attempts to use Feral Corruption; if this host animal can't return to the burial site before the possession effect ends, the vrykolakas is destroyed and the animal host returns to normal.
  • Vulnerable to Decapitation A vrykolakas that is beheaded can't use its Feral Possession, and a beheaded corpse cannot rise as a vrykolakas.

MvqmGM4ha7aQt1CR.name: Change Shape
MvqmGM4ha7aQt1CR.description:
A vrykolakas master can transform into a form resembling the body it had in life, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} but with unlimited duration. It loses its fangs and claw Strikes but gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} in this form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

I06QLdoJMbnJD3Pu.name: Create Spawn
I06QLdoJMbnJD3Pu.description:
If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, a vrykolakas master can turn this creature into a vrykolakas spawn by donating some of its own blood to the creature and burying it in earth for 3 nights.

Such vrykolakas spawn are generally friendly to the vrykolakas that created them, but they are not under its control and typically wander off on their own rampage within [[/r 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days} of their creation.

kvsmf0ENkLJSdBP2.name: Dominate Animal
kvsmf0ENkLJSdBP2.description:
DC 29

The vrykolakas can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} at will as a divine innate spell that affects only animals. A creature that succeeds is immune to that vrykolakas's Dominate Animal for 24 hours. Destroying the vrykolakas ends the effect, but reducing it to 0 HP does not.

A dominated animal takes a -4 circumstance penalty to saving throws against the vrykolakas's Feral Possession.

cjFyZppcDxVUaRJD.name: Drink Blood
cjFyZppcDxVUaRJD.description:
需求 The vrykolakas' last action was a successful fangs Strike

效果 The vrykolakas sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}, and the vrykolakas regains 19 HP, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points.

Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire, but it increases the creature's drained condition value by 1. A vrykolakas can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

The target creature's drained condition value decreases by 1 per week.

A blood transfusion, which requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:20] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drained value by 1 after 10 minutes.

Vrykolakas Spawn.name: Vrykolakas Spawn
Vrykolakas Spawn.publicNotes: Vrykolakas unleash their spawn upon the world to spread terror, plague, and suffering and to draw attention away from their masters.

GnAoSJeodjtFoanm.name: Feral Possession
GnAoSJeodjtFoanm.description:
触发 The vrykolakas is reduced to 0 Hit Points, and an animal is within 100尺

效果 Unlike most other undead, a vrykolakas isn't destroyed when it reaches 0 HP. Instead, it attempts to cast its spirit into an animal within 100尺, which must attempt @Check[type:will|dc:24] save. On a failure, the animal is possessed. This has the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{占据术 Possession} spell, but it lasts a number of days equal to the vrykolakas's level. This possession can't be counteracted with magic (though remove curse works against it normally).

If the animal succeeds at its save, the vrykolakas can attempt to possess a different animal within 100尺。 If at any point an animal critically succeeds at its save or no animal is within 100尺, the vrykolakas fails to possess anything and is destroyed.

A vrykolakas possessing an animal seeks out its burial site (see Burial Site Bound below) immediately, burying itself there. While the vrykolakas is in this state of recovery, its animal host is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, and beheading it destroys the vrykolakas and kills its host. Removing the curse destroys the vrykolakas and returns the animal to normal.

After [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}, if the vrykolakas hasn't been destroyed, the animal dies and the vrykolakas rises in a new body that's identical to its previous one, formed from the animal's remains.

JOeW89FGrajDYQsW.name: Vrykolakas Vulnerabilities
JOeW89FGrajDYQsW.description:
Vrykolakas all have the following vulnerabilities.

  • Burial Site Bound A vrykolakas is bound to the place of its death or interment. It must return to this location once per week and bury itself in the earth for 24 hours, during which time it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} and can be beheaded. If it is unable to return to this site, it is reduced to 0 Hit Points and attempts to use Feral Corruption; if this host animal can't return to the burial site before the possession effect ends, the vrykolakas is destroyed and the animal host returns to normal.
  • Vulnerable to Decapitation A vrykolakas that is beheaded can't use its Feral Possession, and a beheaded corpse cannot rise as a vrykolakas.

DxgiMoyx7wyltYqp.name: Drink Blood
DxgiMoyx7wyltYqp.description:
需求 The vrykolakas' last action was a successful fangs Strike

效果 The vrykolakas sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}, and the vrykolakas regains 10 HP, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points.

Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire, but it increases the creature's drained condition value by 1. A vrykolakas can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

The target creature's drained condition value decreases by 1 per week.

A blood transfusion, which requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:20] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drained value by 1 after 10 minutes.

Water Orm.name: Water Orm
Water Orm.publicNotes:
Legendary creatures lurking in remote lakes, water orms always find their way into the tavern tales of lakeside communities. To some travelers, every lake of respectable size seems to be surrounded by towns full of fishers claiming to have spotted a water orm. These elusive creatures inhabit lakes mainly in cool and gloomy regions. Some claim that water orms are an offshoot of sea serpents and linnorms, but no credible link between these creatures has been found.

Water orms have many features that sea serpents do not, such as the ability to understand the rudiments of language. Their natural inclination to avoid contact and remain hidden often remains at odds with their equally compelling curiosity about those they might spy upon the shores of their lakes. Water orm sightings usually occur when they can't help but to rise up to the surface to take a peek at someone particularly unusual on the beach or floating on the water's surface.

These creatures are extremely long-lived and can go for decades, or even centuries, with very little to eat. This allows water orms to subsist in lakes without surfacing for many years, even in bodies of fresh water without ample food sources. Water orms might lie in a silty lake bed for years, their elusiveness only contributing to their mythical reputation. When a pet or child goes missing near a lake, rumors might hold that the local water orm is responsible, leading to folk tales that caution residents against venturing out alone near the water.

While most water orms are described as serpentine or long-necked reptiles, others look similar to bizarrely elongated seals or whales, impossibly large sea horses, or long-necked creatures with paddles resembling those of elasmosauruses.

fakAfk3puTMpw1vT.name: Slow Metabolism
fakAfk3puTMpw1vT.description: A water orm can go for 10 years without feeding. Beyond this limit, the water orm's hunger causes it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}, but doesn't otherwise impact its lifespan. A water orm that's slowed as a result of starvation can remove this condition by using Swallow Whole to gulp down a meal.

qpAN2omg7HvCwOzk.name: Undetectable
qpAN2omg7HvCwOzk.description: A water orm automatically tries to counteract any detection, revelation, or scrying divination attempted against it, using its Stealth modifier for the counteract check.

JAh7SWOTsIXvrckz.name: Water Travel
JAh7SWOTsIXvrckz.description: A water orm can dissolve into water, appearing only as a long, dark, serpentine stretch of water. While in this form, a water orm's swim Speed increases to 600尺, it automatically succeeds at Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim}, and it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks in water. A water orm can remain in this form for 8 hours, but it can't enter salt water when using this ability. A water orm can return to its normal form using a single action which has the concentrate trait.

Wereboar.name: Wereboar
Wereboar.publicNotes: Wereboars tend to be aggressive and stubborn, and often live with their own kind in small, remote communities. Even when they're inclined to interact with others, wereboars' short tempers and hostile nature lead other creatures to avoid them. Lone wereboars who settle down-often on remote farms-are extremely territorial, though others are content to roam and explore lands far from home. Their other habits also vary widely from individual to individual, right down to diet: some wereboars might feast on human flesh, while others are mostly vegetarian.
Wereboar.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

LqV3ag2bSeXmlk7D.name: Boar Empathy
LqV3ag2bSeXmlk7D.description: The wereboar can communicate with boars and pigs.

lA1KEaw1II1i4twA.name: Boar Charge
lA1KEaw1II1i4twA.description: The wereboar Strides twice and then makes a melee Strike. As long as they moved at least 20尺, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their attack roll.

hwnMtKzru4aBoOu3.name: Change Shape
hwnMtKzru4aBoOu3.description:
The werecreature changes into their humanoid, hybrid, or animal shape. Each shape has a specific, persistent appearance. A true werecreature's natural form is their hybrid shape. In humanoid shape, the werecreature uses their original humanoid size, loses their jaws and claw Strikes, and gains a melee fist Strike that deals bludgeoning damage equal to the slashing damage dealt by their claw. In animal shape, their Speed and size change to that of the animal, they gain any special Strike effects of the animal that they didn't already have (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{攫抓 Grab}), and they lose their weapon Strikes.

Human with fist +10 for [[/r {1d4+2}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4+2钝击伤害}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.4MwjCsa5O9aAjxSm]{Boar} with Speed 40 feet and tusk for [[/r {2d6+4}[piercing]]]{2d6+4穿刺伤害}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

5g1Keo0L3GpJZyQp.name: Curse of the Wereboar
5g1Keo0L3GpJZyQp.description:
This curse affects only humanoids

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15].

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a wearboar until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

hSvaFFK9ERUSfUry.name: Moon Frenzy
hSvaFFK9ERUSfUry.description: When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases their reach by 5尺, and increases the damage of their jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #hours]]{2d4小时}.

Weretiger.name: Weretiger
Weretiger.publicNotes:
These ferocious werecreatures stalk prey with the cunning and skill of a true apex predator. Weretigers typically view all life as a potential meal. Powerful nocturnal hunters with excellent senses that help them ambush prey, weretigers are adaptable to an extreme range of environments. However, weretigers living in densely populated cities (potentially as courtesans, assassins, or guild leaders) often struggle to suppress their killer instincts, becoming overwhelmed by the urge to hunt. They prefer to wear loose-fitting clothing and rely on their claws and jaws in a fight.

Werecreatures transform into animals and animal-humanoid hybrids under the light of the full moon. The doomed fate of these shapechanging creatures derives from an ancient primal curse that they can, in turn, transmit through their own bites. The stat blocks in this section reflect werecreatures in their hybrid forms.
Weretiger.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

aBIEnRecRBiBmpU4.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

3IQSdTZPneapXwVf.name: Change Shape
3IQSdTZPneapXwVf.description:
The werecreature changes into their humanoid, hybrid, or animal shape. Each shape has a specific, persistent appearance. A true werecreature's natural form is their hybrid shape. In humanoid shape, the werecreature uses their original humanoid size, loses their jaws and claw Strikes, and gains a melee fist Strike that deals bludgeoning damage equal to the slashing damage dealt by their claw. In animal shape, their Speed and size change to that of the animal, they gain any special Strike effects of the animal that they didn't already have (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{攫抓 Grab}), and they lose their weapon Strikes.

n

Human with fist +14 for [[/r {1d4+7}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4+7钝击伤害}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{Tiger} with Speed 30 feet and Wrestle.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

RCjZk0ilv6kHRuT5.name: Curse of the Weretiger
RCjZk0ilv6kHRuT5.description:
This curse affects only humanoids

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18].

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into the same kind of werecreature until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

AKOKPl5zfFti3EZh.name: Moon Frenzy
AKOKPl5zfFti3EZh.description: When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases their reach by 5尺, and increases the damage of their jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #hours]] hours.

3t8p1OnCR5iUrhxt.name: Pounce
3t8p1OnCR5iUrhxt.description: The weretiger Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the weretiger began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, they remain hidden until after this ability's Strike.

White Dracolisk.name: 白石化龙蜥 White Dracolisk
White Dracolisk.publicNotes: 石化龙蜥是彩色龙和石化蜥蜴的稀有魔法杂交品种。虽然无人知道它确切的起源，但人们发现它可以和同类进行繁殖，也可以和石化蜥蜴进行繁殖。虽然石化龙蜥的外表看起来更像对应类型的青年龙，但它的八条腿表明它并不仅仅是龙。石化龙蜥的鳞片颜色各不相同，这取决于它的龙类先祖，但是它的腹部颜色较浅，翼端颜色较深。一般的石化龙蜥有15尺长，重3000磅。
White Dracolisk.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

9XxEDCpiqnYKds7V.name: 龙类抗力 Draconic Resistance
9XxEDCpiqnYKds7V.description: 石化龙蜥拥有和其吐息伤害类型一致的10点抗力。

B73QNqTjGdZQ9uba.name: 石化瞥视 Petrifying Glance
B73QNqTjGdZQ9uba.description:
触发 一个石化龙蜥能看见的、位于石化龙蜥30尺范围内的生物开始它的回合。

效果 该生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]豁免。如果失败，它的身体慢慢变硬，获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}效果，持续1分钟。

CsYqT7LTtX34B3Yz.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
CsYqT7LTtX34B3Yz.description:
石化龙蜥吐息，其能量类型基于它的龙类传承。该吐息造成[[/r {6d10}[cold]]]{6d10寒冷伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免。

石化龙蜥在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

白 @Template[type:cone|distance:30]（寒冷）

ysswRv1XkPgse3iC.name: 石化凝视 Petrifying Gaze
ysswRv1XkPgse3iC.description:
石化龙蜥瞪视它30尺内的一个能被看见的生物。目标必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]检定，如果失败且没有被石化瞥视能力及本能力影响，则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。如果目标已经被石化瞥视或此能力影响过，则目标被永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}。

通过这种方式被石化的生物，可以通过往表面涂满（不能仅仅溅到）新鲜的石化龙蜥血（从死亡不超过1小时的石化龙蜥身体里提取）可以立即恢复肉身。一只石化龙蜥的血足够使[[/r 1d4+2 #Medium creatures]]中型生物恢复肉身。

4tJ8KAPk36CVF7E2.name: 野蛮啃咬 Savage Jaws
4tJ8KAPk36CVF7E2.description: 石化龙蜥进行一次单独的啃咬打击。如果命中，它造成[[/r {4d12+16}[piercing]]]{4d12+16穿刺伤害} (多用S)。这在计算它的多重攻击减值时视为一次打击。

Witchfire.name: Witchfire
Witchfire.publicNotes:
Manifesting as a sinuous form wreathed in sickly green flames, this incorporeal undead forms when a powerful hag or witch dies in agony or rage. The body at the center of the flames usually resembles the witch's idealized self-image, regardless of their age and appearance at the time of their death.

A witchfire often resides in a bog or swamp, which slowly blackens and decays around them. These regions are often plagued by will-o'-wisps, which seem to have an uncanny relationship with the resident witchfire. A witchfire might visit villages on the edge of their home terrain to lure away villagers, but always attack victims within earshot to make sure that other villagers hear the screams. A witchfire might also ally with other hags or witches and even join their covens, but a witchfire is incapable of forming covens entirely on their own.

dr.exceptions: 除了力场、幽冥或正能量；对非魔法效果双倍抗力
dr.label: All

TzpdMinu4WoEyAY9.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

xuzZonbgefgsArAz.name: 召唤怪形(仅限鬼火) Summon Entity (Will-o'-Wisp Only)
xuzZonbgefgsArAz.description:
你创造一个为你而战的异怪。这如同 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}，但你会召唤一个具有异怪特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。

升阶 (6环级) 等级 7

升阶 (7环级) 等级 9

升阶 (8环级) 等级 11

升阶 (9环级) 等级 13

升阶 (10环级) 等级 15

p5gjyhtbqwnQsyV8.name: 梦魇术 Nightmare
p5gjyhtbqwnQsyV8.description:
你向目标送去一段恼人的噩梦。在目标下一次入睡时，它必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果你知道目标的名字但是从未遇见过它，目标在意志豁免上获得+4环境加值。

大成功 目标不承受任何负面效果，并暂时免疫1星期。

成功 目标经历了噩梦，但不会承受除了糟糕回忆以外的负面效果。

失败 目标经历噩梦，并且在醒来时 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

大失败 目标经历噩梦，醒来时疲乏，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} 直到不再疲乏。

snd7Tyk8hoE1AHoM.name: 卜筮术 Augury
snd7Tyk8hoE1AHoM.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

ExTn8RH5Xp1BVvJk.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At Will)
ExTn8RH5Xp1BVvJk.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

pViUeTjTLhTubzOw.name: 巫团 Coven
pViUeTjTLhTubzOw.description:
The witchfire adds @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0XP2XOxT9VSiXFDr]{Phantasmal Calamity}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i1TvBID5QLyXrUCa]{Summon Entity} to their coven's spells.

A coven can contain one or more witchfires, but it must also include at least one living creature capable of forming a coven; three witchfires cannot form a coven.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

t9ReCb126y5KXuru.name: Opportune Witchflame
t9ReCb126y5KXuru.description:
触发 A creature makes a melee Strike against or touches the witchfire

效果 The witchfire makes a witchflame caress Strike against the triggering creature.

GCu6OFgRjem6F0sI.name: Witchflame
GCu6OFgRjem6F0sI.description:
Any creature that takes negative damage from a witchfire's Strike must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to witchflame for 1 hour.

成功 The creature appears to catch fire with sickly green flames. These flames deal no damage on their own, but as long as the flames burn, the creature can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}) and gains weakness 5 to fire for 1 round.

失败 As success, but the effect is permanent until removed.

大失败 As failure, but the creature gains weakness 10 to fire.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.NHwmrSyF0e8HUE3m]{效果: Witchflame (Success)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.L7SiTshdimUPWfnB]{效果: Witchflame (Failure)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.McawF8weCe7O81um]{效果: Witchflame (Critical Failure)}

tjQCRx8UN4LQPnwJ.name: Witchflame Kindling
tjQCRx8UN4LQPnwJ.description:
需求 A creature within 30 feet of the witchfire burns with witchflame

效果 The witchfire's eyes and mouth glow brightly, and the witchflame on the target creature momentarily burns much hotter, dealing [[/r {5d6}[fire]+{5d6}[negative]]]{5d6 fire damage and 5d6负能量伤害} to that creature (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] save).

The witchfire can't use Witchflame Kindling for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Witchflame Kindling]]{1d4轮}.

Witchwyrd.name: Witchwyrd
Witchwyrd.publicNotes:
Witchwyrds conceal most of their faces, leaving only their eyes unmasked. Their inscrutability is a boon to one of their most significant interests-mercantilism- and many haughty witchwyrds openly revel in the befuddlement inspired by their mysterious guises and mannerisms. Witchwyrds have a keen eye for new opportunities and markets, and a witchwyrd almost always knows when someone is trying to pull one over on them.

These four-armed humanoid creatures have hairless blue-gray skin, are typically 6-1/2 feet tall, and weigh 300 pounds. Their hands have three evenly sized and spaced digits in a tripod-like arrangement. When not trying to blend in with the local community, witchwyrds favor outlandish, loose-fitting clothes in bright reds or yellows and a signature conical hat. They tend to prefer the driest, warmest regions of the lands they visit-perhaps an indicator of their mysterious home world. This, however, is the only indicator; witchwyrds are notoriously close-mouthed about details of this distant world, and with good reason: most witchwyrds on Golarion have never visited their ancestral home. To these witchwyrds, the notion of a home planet is a constant thorn in their side, and when asked, many choose to ignore the question altogether. Others are so agitated by these queries that they respond with impatience or even violence. Some scholars have theorized a connection between witchwyrds and several other four-armed creatures, but like with questions of their place of origin, witchwyrds have little to say about the topic.
Witchwyrd.languages: One or More Planar Languages, Tongues

THUDJyCpb4at07bz.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

2mXUYLr8NYh6u9sO.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
2mXUYLr8NYh6u9sO.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

z0tSvLqh0IK6Y4TT.name: 浮碟术(随意施法) Floating Disk (At will)
z0tSvLqh0IK6Y4TT.description:
一个由魔法力量组成的浮碟在与你相邻的位置形成。该浮碟直径为2尺，跟随在你身后五尺，悬浮于地面之上。它能负载至多5负载的物体（这些物体必须能稳定放在其表现上）。当法术结束时，浮碟上的物品会坠落到地面上。

如果生物尝试踩到浮碟上，或者浮碟超载，或者某人尝试将浮碟抬高或令浮碟离地面更远，或者你移动到了浮碟的30尺以外，法术结束。

ybZoLDhRr9Dy4RFI.name: 隐形仆役(随意施法) Unseen Servant (At will)
ybZoLDhRr9Dy4RFI.description:
你召唤一个隐形仆役（见边栏），你可以通过维持该法术的一部分来命令它。它会为你服务直到其生命值被减少到0，此时法术结束，或者直到你停止维持该法术。隐形仆役获得被召唤特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.j7NNPfZwD19BwSEZ]{隐形仆役} (无阵营)

wJkawABLUtrnlz3Y.name: +1 Ranseur
wJkawABLUtrnlz3Y.description: This polearm is a long trident with a central prong that's longer than the other two.

f4JPwXqfZM8fy4Zp.name: Absorb Force
f4JPwXqfZM8fy4Zp.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发 A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile} is fired at the witchwyrd, and the witchwyrd is aware of it and has a free hand

效果 The witchwyrd "catches" the missile, absorbing it and causing that hand to glow while it holds this energy. A hand that's holding energy can't be used for any other purpose except to use Force Bolt. The energy lasts for 6 rounds or until it is released.

eohTEKJnqW3cF8U8.name: Force Bolt
eohTEKJnqW3cF8U8.description:
1 to 3 actions

The witchwyrd fires one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile} per action spent (dealing [[/r {1d4+1}[force]]]{1d4+1力场伤害} each). They can't spend more actions on this ability than they have free hands. If they use a hand that has Absorbed Force, that hand hurls two missiles instead of one, expending the held energy.

2C1Wu7Y8e0BUVKgV.name: one or more Lore skills related to a specific plane

Wolverine.name: Wolverine
Wolverine.publicNotes: Wolverines resemble small bears, to which they are related. Stocky and muscular with long claws, wolverines are about 3 feet in length and weigh approximately 40 pounds. They have a thick fur coat that protects them from the cold temperatures of the forests and frozen tundras where they reside.
Wolverine.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

lbNjzpti2ihhuipU.name: Pounce
lbNjzpti2ihhuipU.description: The wolverine Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the wolverine begins this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the attack.

AFlgcQtl6dJr1rtT.name: Wolverine Rage
AFlgcQtl6dJr1rtT.description: The wolverine enters a state of pure rage that lasts either for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, whichever comes first. While raging, the wolverine has AC 17, its jaws Strike deals [[/r {1d8+7}]]{1d8+7伤害}, and its claw Strike deals [[/r {1d6+7}]]{1d6+7伤害}. While raging, the wolverine can't use actions that have the concentrate trait, except for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}. After it's stopped raging, a wolverine can't use Wolverine Rage again for 1 minute.

Wood Giant.name: Wood Giant
Wood Giant.publicNotes:
Wood giants are the denizens and protectors of the deepest, most primeval forests in the world. They dedicate their entire lives to the preservation of nature-a role that they believe nature itself has selected them to carry out. Wood giants are patient and kind to those who show respect and care for wild places. Although most wood giants consider civilization as simply another part of the world, they value places untouched by permanent structures and dense humanoid settlements.

Wood giants have long, drooping ears and more slender builds than most giants. Despite their size, they are graceful and agile, able to move through dense forests and brush with little sound. They have been known to work closely with druids and others who share their respect for the sanctity of wilderness regions. Wood giants spend their days patrolling vast swaths of territory, foraging, and keeping an eye out for any who would despoil their lands. While they respect the connection to nature they share with many fey creatures and remain on good terms with them, wood giants see most fey as far too flighty to take part in any long-term plans.

An average wood giant stands 14 feet tall and weighs 1,200 pounds.

4Ot5qt44391NJqRn.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

rEHDvZqglITeLKYB.name: 行踪无迹(恒定法术) Pass Without Trace (Constant)
rEHDvZqglITeLKYB.description:
你令留下的痕迹模糊不清，并令其他人追踪你非常困难。追踪（Track）你的检定DC获得+4状态加值，或者等于你的法术DC，取较高DC。你同时只会从一个行踪无迹中受益。

升阶 (2环级) 该持续时间增加到8小时。

升阶 (4环级) 该持续时间增加到8小时。该法术射程为20尺，并且具有20尺弥漫区域，影响该区域中至多10个由你选择的生物。

IV7eERHkT9RjZVgM.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
IV7eERHkT9RjZVgM.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

5b4HNF0LotCdB3Bv.name: +1 Composite Longbow
5b4HNF0LotCdB3Bv.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

ehkSYzB2HyKwd9xA.name: Hide
ehkSYzB2HyKwd9xA.description: A mix of furs, sturdy hide, and sometimes molded boiled leather, this armor provides protection due to its layers of leather, though its bulkiness slows the wearer down and decreases mobility.

pvidfrziJK8Olr4p.name: Piercing Shot
pvidfrziJK8Olr4p.description: The wood giant shoots an arrow at a target so that it glances off the first target to strike another target behind the first one. The wood giant chooses two targets in a direct line, one of which must be giving lesser cover to the other, then makes a single ranged Strike with its longbow against both targets. This attack ignores the lesser cover the first target provides to the second. The wood giant rolls damage only once, and applies it to each creature it hits. Piercing Shot counts as two attacks for the wood giant's multiple attack penalty.

Wooly Rhinoceros.name: Wooly Rhinoceros
Wooly Rhinoceros.publicNotes: Even bulkier than their non-woolly cousins, these rhinoceroses have a shaggy pelt of long, thick fur and a huge crescent-shaped horn. Woolly rhinos inhabit areas of arid tundra and cold steppes, spending much of their day grazing for sustenance.
Wooly Rhinoceros.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. cold

ivy8kuAr2Ml8VdAF.name: Cold Adaptation
ivy8kuAr2Ml8VdAF.description: The woolly rhinoceros treats environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme.

vCEb36Sv06OtmLaz.name: Rhinoceros Charge
vCEb36Sv06OtmLaz.description: The wooly rhinoceros Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the wooly rhinoceros moved at least 20尺, the Strike's damage increases to [[/r {3d12+6}[piercing]]]{3d12+6穿刺伤害}. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24] save or be automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shoved} back 5 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} by the force of the blow.

Worm That Walks Cultist.name: Worm That Walks Cultist
Worm That Walks Cultist.publicNotes: This worm that walks was a cultist of the Great Old One Hastur in its prior life. It continues its conspiracies and strives to further its evil plots in its new life.
Worm That Walks Cultist.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

YtVYS3Y94KOFm5YU.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
YtVYS3Y94KOFm5YU.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

49xv61tdfV6J6P29.name: Discorporate
49xv61tdfV6J6P29.description:
When the worm that walks is reduced to 0 HP, it discorporates and the component worms that make up its body disperse in every direction. If even a single worm escapes, the worm that walks will eventually re-form using a process that typically takes [[/r 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}.

While the exact circumstances and surroundings determine how long the worm that walks's foes have to dispatch the fleeing worms before they escape, usually its foes have only a single round. Typically, this requires the application of an area effect or splash weapon within 1 round to the space where the worm that walks collapsed. After any amount of area or splash damage is dealt to that space, the character dealing the damage must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. Each subsequent area or splash damage effect performed on the area reduces the DC of this flat check by 2, to a minimum of DC 5. If any of these flat checks succeed, none of the worms escape, and the worm that walks is destroyed permanently.

At the GM's discretion, clever means of trapping or otherwise detaining the vermin may extend the time allowed to finish off the worm that walks.

zNeDe02hwHzcyE1s.name: Squirming Embrace
zNeDe02hwHzcyE1s.description: The worm that walks Strides, ending its movement sharing a space with a creature, and deals [[/r {5d8}[piercing]]]{5d8穿刺伤害} to the creature. The creature can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save.

DfyikbxEMRuzW77m.name: Swarm Shape
DfyikbxEMRuzW77m.description: The worm that walks collapses into a shapeless swarm of worms. It drops all held, worn, and carried items. While discorporated, the worm that walks can't use attack actions and can't cast spells, but it can move through areas small enough for its individual worms to fit without having to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入空间 Squeeze}. It can use the same action to coalesce back into its normal form.

Xill.name: Xill
Xill.publicNotes: Xills visit the Material Plane, where they're often known as ethereal stalkers, primarily to maraud and to kidnap creatures back to their native Ethereal Plane. These four-armed, warmongering monsters paralyze their victims before implanting them with eggs using an ovipositor normally kept retracted behind their mandibles. Their single-minded drive to expand and conquer is so all-encompassing that while they work together dutifully and without dissent, there is little else in their lives.

jURll9yGhDX2eIFe.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

rijZTMFR5Ee6MsQm.name: 异界传送() Plane Shift (To Ethereal Plane or Material Plane only) (Self only)
rijZTMFR5Ee6MsQm.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

BrL7yO7TVS8Vo0MQ.name: +1 Longbow
BrL7yO7TVS8Vo0MQ.description: This 5‑foot‑tall bow, usually made of a single piece of elm, hickory, or yew, has a powerful draw and is excellent at propelling arrows with great force and at an extreme distance. You must use two hands to fire a longbow, and it can't be used while mounted.

T4TOIiPyHfghQy04.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

cJ2jYiJRZR43AJCJ.name: Double Slash
cJ2jYiJRZR43AJCJ.description: The xill makes two scimitar Strikes against a single target. If both hit, combine their damage for the purpose of the target's resistances and weaknesses. The xill applies its multiple attack penalty to each strike normally.

bysIJ8d5SoGqSABO.name: Implant
bysIJ8d5SoGqSABO.description:
需求 The xill is adjacent to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, willing, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} creature

效果 The xill implants xill eggs in the creature's flesh.

J8KaQAnTGQqYov9e.name: Xill Eggs
J8KaQAnTGQqYov9e.description:
The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened} condition from xill eggs doesn't improve on its own until the disease is cured or runs its course. It can be cured with a 10-minute operation that requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:26|name:Remove Xill Eggs] check and deals [[/r {4d6}[slashing]]]{4d6挥砍伤害} to the host

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24]

最大持续时间 24 hours

阶段1 infested with no ill effect (8 hours)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (8 hours)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (4 hours)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] as larval xills burrow out of the body and immediately fade away into the Ethereal Plane (1小时)

ERoazbmYgnuBSYsk.name: Xill Paralysis
ERoazbmYgnuBSYsk.description:
A creature hit by the xill's bite Strike must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is immune to xill paralysis for 1 minute.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is paralyzed. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to recover, and the save DC decreases by 1 each round.

Yamaraj.name: Yamaraj
Yamaraj.publicNotes:
The greatest judges among the psychopomps are the massive yamarajes, whose wisdom is legendary and whose edicts are unappealable except to ushers or Pharasma herself. A yamaraj resembles an immense dragon with dark, feathery scales and an emotionless, dispassionate gaze behind a feathered mask. When not serving as the senior magistrates, lords, and generals of the Boneyard, yamarajes pursue highly individualistic hobbies, such as gardening or literature. They are willing to halt in their duties to converse with mortals whose expertise matches their interests.

Many psychopomps are intimately involved with the Boneyard's massive bureaucracy. Few pursue mercy, justice, or personal gain; their duties to Pharasma and her Boneyard are supreme. Nevertheless, individual psychopomps interpret their duties in different ways, which might put them in conflict with mortals or even with each other.
Yamaraj.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Yamaraj.senses: 黑暗视觉, 生命感知240尺, true seeing

FhV61jMMGaGgOnmc.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

hzBBpY4XdhIZXued.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
hzBBpY4XdhIZXued.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

yfqMmmrCpEGsye6G.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
yfqMmmrCpEGsye6G.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

T4ROoWQsVb4LvmqB.name: 精神质询(随意施法) Mind Probe (At will)
T4ROoWQsVb4LvmqB.description:
你将你的精神投射入一个生物的精神以寻找信息。除非其通过一次成功豁免抵抗你，否则你可以获得目标的记忆与知识。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 法术持续时间的每一轮中，你可以维持该法术来询问一个不同的问题，并尝试发现答案。对于每个问题，目标可以尝试一次欺骗（Deception）检定，对抗你的法术DC；如果目标成功，你不会得知答案，并且当大成功时，目标会提供给你一个假的答案，并且你信以为真。在你向目标提问过一个问题后，再次提问该问题，即使通过另一次施放的精神质询，也会得到相同的结果。

大失败 如同失败，并且目标在对抗你的问题的欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-4环境减值。

gSm7LVM6KgueNn8S.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

1ENGsx3BESdgdHnk.name: Lightning Drinker
1ENGsx3BESdgdHnk.description:
Whenever a yamaraj would take electricity damage if not for its immunity, its fast healing increases to 40 on its next turn.

During that turn, if it uses its breath weapon, the beetles crackle with electricity and deal [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 additional电击伤害}.

VKysBYdqHBzZ3aOg.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
VKysBYdqHBzZ3aOg.description:
The yamaraj breathes a blast of beetles in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] that deals [[/r {14d8}[slashing]]]{14d8挥砍伤害} and [[/r {4d8}[persistent,slashing]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续挥砍伤害} to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|traits:damaging-effect] save).

The Yamaraj can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 The creature takes no damage.

成功 The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}.

大失败 The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}.

nEZNMODnNpwrnUPC.name: Final Judgment
nEZNMODnNpwrnUPC.description: A yamaraj's miracle spells are used only to pronounce judgment, typically either to restore a dead or destroyed creature to life, bind a creature to the Boneyard, or banish a creature from the Boneyard.

LMv9Jl8QyuoKhMpw.name: Spirit Touch
LMv9Jl8QyuoKhMpw.description: An yamaraj's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune and deal [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} to living creatures and [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6正能量伤害} to undead.

WleXuHzXfn7II29b.name: Yamaraj Venom
WleXuHzXfn7II29b.description:
While a creature is clumsy from this poison, it is doomed with the same value

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {3d8}[poison]]]{3d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {5d8}[poison]]]{5d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {7d8}[poison]]]{7d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3} (1轮)

Yellow Musk Brute.name: Yellow Musk Brute
Yellow Musk Brute.publicNotes: A creature transformed by a yellow musk creeper's tendrils boring into its brain becomes a yellow musk thrall if it's Small or 中型, or a yellow musk brute if Large (a Small creature becomes a Small thrall rather than a Medium one). The transformation takes 1 hour. A yellow musk thrall takes only the most rudimentary of actions: bringing the yellow musk creeper water and new creatures to infest. After a few days (or if the creeper dies), the thrall wanders off into the wilderness and falls dead within 24 hours. The body of a deceased thrall sprouts a new yellow musk creeper within hours of its death, becoming a fully grown plant within 24 hours.

HQ205X1b6CWTHXfU.name: Slow
HQ205X1b6CWTHXfU.description: A yellow musk brute is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

6t0iHm0ru1bcVGTw.name: Entangling Tendrils
6t0iHm0ru1bcVGTw.description:
5尺。

Grasping tendrils extend out from the brute. When the brute ends its movement next to a creature, or a creature ends its turn next to the brute, that creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} by the tendrils.

JqWD8UssH8Z7OeZz.name: Limb Extension
JqWD8UssH8Z7OeZz.description:
触发 The yellow musk brute is reduced to 15 HP or fewer

效果 Creeper tendrils tear through the brute's limbs, causing its forearms to tear loose. The brute's melee reach increases by 5尺。

Lv1GZd4xpvCGfjkz.name: Pollen Touch
Lv1GZd4xpvCGfjkz.description:
When the brute strikes a creature, that creature is exposed to yellow musk creeper pollen, as Spray Pollen (DC 15). The creature is fascinated by the yellow musk creeper that spawned the brute, not by the brute itself. The affected creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:15] save.

Once a creature succeeds at any save against Spray Pollen, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}. For as long as it is fascinated, it must spend each of its actions to move closer to the yellow musk creeper that spawned the brute as expediently as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the creature is adjacent to the yellow musk creeper, it stays still and doesn't act.

大失败 As failure, but the condition doesn't end automatically. The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the fascinated condition and other effects end.

Yellow Musk Creeper.name: Yellow Musk Creeper
Yellow Musk Creeper.publicNotes:
Made up of thick, green vines with numerous yellow flowers, the yellow musk creeper grows at places where the ground is enriched with spilled blood and corpses, like battlefields and graveyards. An ideal environment for the yellow musk creeper isn't inhabited, but draws occasional humanoid visitors the plant can transform into thralls. The yellow musk creeper enraptures creatures with its bright yellow pollen to bring them close. It then physically alters their brains with its tendrils, implanting a seed in each to turn the creatures into mindless thralls. The yellow musk creeper might try to take over a sleeping creature, but it lacks the faculties to sneak up on anyone, and is likely to wake victims before it can drag itself close enough.

The plant's pollen can spread far on the wind but quickly becomes too diffuse to cause harm. Wilderness scouts learn to sniff out the distinctive musky scent of the pollen, which stays potent even in harmless quantities. A sprouting creeper is also easy to detect, since it grows from the rotting, messy corpse of a thrall creature.

fDOQq8mfa2PhlHcF.name: Bore into Brain
fDOQq8mfa2PhlHcF.description:
The creeper bores dozens of tendrils into the brain of a Small, 中型, or Large humanoid creature that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, willing, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by Spray Pollen, and within reach of the creeper's tendrils.

The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|traits:humanoid] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} on a critical failure).

Subsequent failed saves against Bore into Brain increase the stupefied value. If the creature reaches stupefied 5, it is turned into a yellow musk thrall. Boring into a creature's brain doesn't end fascination caused by Spray Pollen.

w7tx24OC6vP2T7De.name: Spray Pollen
w7tx24OC6vP2T7De.description:
The yellow musk creeper blasts yellow pollen in either a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Each creature in the emanation must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save.

Once a creature succeeds at any save against Spray Pollen, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}. For as long as it is fascinated, it must spend each of its actions to move closer to the yellow musk creeper as expediently as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the creature is adjacent to the yellow musk creeper, it stays still and doesn't act. If anyone takes a hostile action against the creature or its allies, the effect ends. Otherwise, the creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effects end.

大失败 As failure, but the condition doesn't end automatically if anyone takes a hostile action against the creature or its allies.

Yellow Musk Thrall.name: Yellow Musk Thrall
Yellow Musk Thrall.publicNotes: A creature transformed by a yellow musk creeper's tendrils boring into its brain becomes a yellow musk thrall if it's Small or 中型, or a yellow musk brute if Large (a Small creature becomes a Small thrall rather than a Medium one). The transformation takes 1 hour. A yellow musk thrall takes only the most rudimentary of actions: bringing the yellow musk creeper water and new creatures to infest. After a few days (or if the creeper dies), the thrall wanders off into the wilderness and falls dead within 24 hours. The body of a deceased thrall sprouts a new yellow musk creeper within hours of its death, becoming a fully grown plant within 24 hours.

ADUDwILKarUV2YPp.name: Slow
ADUDwILKarUV2YPp.description: A yellow musk thrall is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

bW6X64ql7gjX9zqQ.name: Entangling Tendrils
bW6X64ql7gjX9zqQ.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Grasping tendrils extend out from the thrall. When the thrall ends its movement next to a creature, or a creature ends its turn next to the thrall, that creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:14] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} by the tendrils.

HXybLZsE68ejwZbJ.name: Limb Extension
HXybLZsE68ejwZbJ.description:
触发 The yellow musk thrall is reduced to 4 HP or fewer

效果 Creeper tendrils tear through the thrall's limbs, causing its forearms to tear loose. The thrall's melee reach increases by 5尺。

i8TVY4kXRvQIaLLG.name: Pollen Touch
i8TVY4kXRvQIaLLG.description:
When the thrall strikes a creature, that creature is exposed to yellow musk creeper pollen, as Spray Pollen (DC 14). The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the yellow musk creeper that spawned the thrall, not by the thrall itself. The affected creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:14] save.

Once a creature succeeds at any save against Spray Pollen, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}. For as long as it is fascinated, it must spend each of its actions to move closer to the yellow musk creeper that spawned the thrall as expediently as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the creature is adjacent to the yellow musk creeper, it stays still and doesn't act.

大失败 As failure, but the condition doesn't end automatically. The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the fascinated condition and other effects end.

Yeth Hound.name: Yeth Hound
Yeth Hound.publicNotes:
Wicked canine creatures who live for the thrill of the hunt, yeth hounds often serve evil masters as guardians and trackers. Yeth hounds resemble lean, sleek dogs with overlarge ears and narrow paws that can tread on air as easily as the ground. Despite their canine appearance, yeth hounds are remarkably intelligent, although they rarely display this intelligence except when devising intricate tactics to ensnare their quarry. Their eerie bays echo across the countryside when they are engaged in a hunt, and they particularly enjoy baying to frighten and disorient intelligent creatures. Yeth hound packs can number as many as a dozen members, each working in uncanny communion with its packmates to corner and kill their prey. Yeth hounds like to drag their victims back to their lairs to eat at their leisure, so these lairs often contain discarded treasures from the hounds' previous meals.

Yeth hounds despise two things: sunlight and other canines. They hunt only at night if they can, often breaking off their hunt at dawn to retreat to a subterranean lair or den, no matter how close they had come to catching their prey. Yeth hounds usually attack wargs, wolves, and similar creatures on sight, working to drive larger or more powerful canines from their hunting areas when then can't simply overpower and kill them.

Evil rangers, bestial demons, and wicked cults are frequently gifted yeth hound servants by fiendish patrons. Such hounds often serve as spies and are quick to turn against those who fail to advance the patrons' wicked aims. The cult of Lamashtu, in particular, is fond of using yeth hounds as temple guardians.
Yeth Hound.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

hBvEzmMtwWP1eG7b.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

3de6fgPOs2joOR89.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
3de6fgPOs2joOR89.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

uNH8ZKqCgsh6qYis.name: Bay
uNH8ZKqCgsh6qYis.description:
The yeth hound emits an unearthly howl audible up to 300 feet away. Any non-fiend creature that hears the howl must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}. Any creature that critically fails and is within 60 feet of the yeth hound is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} (or until it recovers from its frightened condition).

Whether it succeeds or fails the saving throw, the creature is then temporarily immune to Bay for 24 hours.

MgWi09fDy6GgzHJM.name: Sinister Bite
MgWi09fDy6GgzHJM.description: A good creature bitten by a yeth hound must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save. On a critical success, the creature is temporarily immune to sinister bite for 1 minute. A creature that fails becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or increases the value of its frightened condition by 1 if already frightened.

Young Brine Dragon.name: Young Brine Dragon
Young Brine Dragon.publicNotes:
洋龙通常为蓝绿色，生有闪亮的鳞片，以及能够帮助他们在水中游弋的冠饰和顺着颈部生长的褶边。他们对善恶无感。因为洋龙固执己见且愿意将自己的秩序强加于他人，许多洋龙最终会谋求统治一片经过精心设计的社区。这些社区井然有序且经过周密的规划，在此施行着严格的礼仪标准和一成不变的律法都由洋龙自己制定。由洋龙亲手缔造的社区居民构成可能是任何族裔的生物，但最常见的是人类、人鱼、天狗或沙华鱼人。

根据龙自身的性格，这些社区的居民可能会将洋龙视为从仁慈的秩序之力到可怖的暴君间的任何存在。无论如何，典型的洋龙对于善行和慈善事业没什么耐心，相比个人的幸福，他更关注的是社区作为一个整体的力量和健康程度。然而当有外部势力开始侵占他们的领地时，洋龙就会一改对社区那冷静客观的态度。在此情况下，洋龙会迅速介入并协助社区抵御外敌。

尽管洋龙乐于开拓定居点，但他们很少在城区内筑巢，取而代之的是在海洋洞穴或者能够俯瞰海岸线的悬崖上筑巢。他们需要一处可以隐藏自身的地点，一处让自己感到安全的地方储存和炫耀自己聚敛的财富。洋龙的宝藏通常包含他们所统治社区的居民上交的贡品和税金，外加从沉船中找到的奇怪发现。
Young Brine Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

n61gabHGuCegRfKD.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

cUtNYZ935fPsgj8x.name: 碱水喷射 Brine Spit
cUtNYZ935fPsgj8x.description:
触发 洋龙可以观察到且距离30尺范围内的生物使用专注动作

效果 The dragon spits a glob of caustic salt water at the creature. The creature takes [[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save). On a failure, the concentrate action is disrupted.

URm0Bj51PHUjgnXS.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
URm0Bj51PHUjgnXS.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acidic salt water that deals [[/r {9d6}[acid]]]{9d6酸液伤害} in an @Template[type:line|distance:80] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

qxkuhugvyoxDpt7N.name: Draconic Frenzy
qxkuhugvyoxDpt7N.description: 龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次翼击打击。

GpD6rwvIzYFSvtUC.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
GpD6rwvIzYFSvtUC.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Young Brine Dragon (Spellcaster).name: Young Brine Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Brine Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
洋龙通常为蓝绿色，生有闪亮的鳞片，以及能够帮助他们在水中游弋的冠饰和顺着颈部生长的褶边。他们对善恶无感。因为洋龙固执己见且愿意将自己的秩序强加于他人，许多洋龙最终会谋求统治一片经过精心设计的社区。这些社区井然有序且经过周密的规划，在此施行着严格的礼仪标准和一成不变的律法都由洋龙自己制定。由洋龙亲手缔造的社区居民构成可能是任何族裔的生物，但最常见的是人类、人鱼、天狗或沙华鱼人。

尽管洋龙乐于开拓定居点，但他们很少在城区内筑巢，取而代之的是在海洋洞穴或者能够俯瞰海岸线的悬崖上筑巢。他们需要一处可以隐藏自身的地点，一处让自己感到安全的地方储存和炫耀自己聚敛的财富。洋龙的宝藏通常包含他们所统治社区的居民上交的贡品和税金，外加从沉船中找到的奇怪发现。
Young Brine Dragon (Spellcaster).senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

n61gabHGuCegRfKD.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

bZ2HrYqzk0Ig2q4w.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
bZ2HrYqzk0Ig2q4w.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

cUtNYZ935fPsgj8x.name: 碱水喷射 Brine Spit
cUtNYZ935fPsgj8x.description:
触发 洋龙可以观察到且距离30尺范围内的生物使用专注动作

效果 The dragon spits a glob of caustic salt water at the creature. The creature takes [[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save). On a failure, the concentrate action is disrupted.

URm0Bj51PHUjgnXS.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
URm0Bj51PHUjgnXS.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acidic salt water that deals [[/r {9d6}[acid]]]{9d6酸液伤害} in an @Template[type:line|distance:80] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

Young Cloud Dragon.name: Young Cloud Dragon
Young Cloud Dragon.publicNotes:
云龙在本质上是流浪者、探索者和旅行者，他们最享受的便是看到新大陆和邂逅与众不同的生物。云龙的颜色从浅蓝色到暗淡的乳白色不等，生有粗壮且卷曲的角以及较短的鼻子。云龙会在山峰最高处的极端高海拔地区设置巢穴，但他们经常外出旅行，离巢与在巢穴内的时间基本相同。云龙会花费很长时间从高处观察他们飞越的地区，但他们那经常突发奇想的性格让人们很难预测什么会突然引起他的注意，让他们飞下来交谈或调查地面上的东西。云龙不太会作出完全出于恶意的行为，但他们也不怎么行善。对云龙来说，更有可能的做法是单纯地落地取下他们想要的东西，在经过公平的交易后带着对象飞走。

云龙那总是在变化的兴趣似乎与其他龙类制定的复杂阴谋与长期计划毫无交集。这些漫游者是生活在当下的生物，他们与其他真龙一样聪慧过人，只不过他们的关注点总是当下而已。云龙那活在当下的倾向并非精神缺陷——他们对自己行为造成的长期结果有更强的预见性，并不会仅为了当前的利益作出愚蠢的选择。然而，云龙也对担忧未来的事情没什么兴趣，他们对自身能力有信心，认为能够和解决当下的问题一般处理明日之事。

云龙的巢穴往往戒备森严或者隐藏得很好，这也是他们经常四处漫游的习性导致离巢时间很长带来的必然结果。他们的财宝包含格式物品——他们受本能驱使去搜集格式不同的物品，而非集中收集某个特定类型的物品。对云龙来说，藏品多种多样才是完美的宝库。
Young Cloud Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 迷雾视域, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

7Hht50p2jc8ZG7Xq.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

SwC3pb24zjBolDvy.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At Will)
SwC3pb24zjBolDvy.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

QxUxl1vPtZ72uSOi.name: 迷雾视域 Mist Vision
QxUxl1vPtZ72uSOi.description: 雾和霭不会影响云龙的视野；它们会忽略雾和霭带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

pGaSnoNG83zKVZkX.name: 偏折之云 Deflecting Cloud
pGaSnoNG83zKVZkX.description:
触发 龙是一次远程攻击的目标

需求 龙能意识到攻击并且有一只可以自由动作的翅膀

效果 The cloud dragon flexes a wing and creates a billowing cloud of mist. The dragon is treated as if they were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack, so normally the attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check to target them. The dragon also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

tpQDVH3NwAokh2NC.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
tpQDVH3NwAokh2NC.description:
The dragon breathes a thundercloud that deals [[/r {11d6}[electricity]]]{11d6电击伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

0DOPtcRBzrEKku1I.name: 踏云而行 Cloud Walk
0DOPtcRBzrEKku1I.description: 云龙可以如同走过固体地面一般踩踏在云或者雾气上。

dFTh6F51ONxZqLHO.name: Draconic Frenzy
dFTh6F51ONxZqLHO.description: 龙以任意顺序作出两次爪抓打击和一次角顶打击。

QAiOrfL7q6tF2GUV.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
QAiOrfL7q6tF2GUV.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

O4epuzV9B2OOYJXy.name: 原能准备法术 Primal Prepared Spells

7Hht50p2jc8ZG7Xq.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

fSvL2tt222zIYVDm.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
fSvL2tt222zIYVDm.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

SwC3pb24zjBolDvy.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At Will)
SwC3pb24zjBolDvy.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

QxUxl1vPtZ72uSOi.description: 雾和霭不会影响云龙的视野；它们会忽略雾和霭带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

pGaSnoNG83zKVZkX.name: 偏折之云 Deflecting Cloud
pGaSnoNG83zKVZkX.description:
触发 龙是一次远程攻击的目标

需求 龙能意识到攻击并且有一只可以自由动作的翅膀

The dragon also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

tpQDVH3NwAokh2NC.description:

0DOPtcRBzrEKku1I.description: 云龙可以如同走过固体地面一般踩踏在云或者雾气上。

Young Crystal Dragon.name: Young Crystal Dragon
Young Crystal Dragon.publicNotes:
秉性善良但自负的结晶龙是一种美丽的生物，他们灿烂的表皮由多彩的水晶和宝石构成。结晶龙的美是他们自尊心的本源，但也成为了某种弱点，因为他们很容易被贬损其外表的言论激怒。尽管与其他真龙相比，结晶龙本性相对温和，但他们可能会因为别人的无心之言碰触到逆鳞而变得暴躁。尽管结晶龙并不固执，但他们更喜欢有序的环境，厌恶被人打断或被干扰。

结晶龙在地下岩洞内筑巢，并于此处精心培育出美丽的环境。结晶龙那一丝不苟的标准和鲜明的想象力促使自身不断努力改造巢穴的部分外观或布局。这些巢穴对于每头结晶龙来说都是独特的存在，但其内部总是会安置许多镜面，以便他们观察自己的外表。镜面所包含的范围十分广泛，从能够映出倒影的池子到精心制作的镜子，它们总是会按照让龙愉悦的方式排列在巢穴中。向结晶龙赠送一面做工精巧或者附有魔法的镜子作为礼物是讨好他的最佳手段。

尽管结晶龙很容易被他们那亮闪闪的收藏品或者自己的虚荣心而分神，但其本质仍是善心的生物，很容易相处和结交。尽管结晶龙通常会认为邪恶生物粗鲁且让人生厌，但任何其他栖息于其巢穴周边的住民都有可能快速成为他的朋友或心爱的宠物，具体情况则取决于该生物沟通的能力（以及是否能频繁说出结晶龙渴望听到的赞美和恭维）。
Young Crystal Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

znBZYCY2qwfdxbV3.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

G5NJxlLVYCrXX8Jv.name: 螺旋尾扫 Twisting Tail
G5NJxlLVYCrXX8Jv.description:
触发 有生物在结晶龙的尾扫触及范围内使用移动动作或者在一次移动动作的过程中离开自身所占用的方格。

效果 结晶龙以-2的减值进行一次尾扫打击。若命中，结晶龙打断该生物的动作。

JLM9pHvLtJxtkDH5.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
JLM9pHvLtJxtkDH5.description:
The dragon breathes a flurry of piercing crystals that deal [[/r {8d6}[piercing]]]{8d6穿刺伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

cvtGewKiksGkDNKz.name: Draconic Frenzy
cvtGewKiksGkDNKz.description: 龙以任意顺序作出两次爪抓打击和一次尾扫打击。

EW5LH6Dw5jEKEVOU.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
EW5LH6Dw5jEKEVOU.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Young Magma Dragon.name: Young Magma Dragon
Young Magma Dragon.publicNotes:
熔岩龙在其他龙里以其不可预测且傲慢的秉性而闻名。熔岩龙那随时可能猛烈爆发的脾气和性格使得他们通常都过着孤独的生活，哪怕是刚孵化的幼龙，也会在离巢之前频繁地争吵斗殴以确保自身的支配地位。熔岩龙的爆发都有缘由，而且往往可以证明这种突如其来的转变是合情合理的，但他们通常觉得没必要为此多费唇舌。

熔岩龙火山活跃的山脉或者地下深处的巨大熔岩湖汇总筑巢。和所有其他真龙一样，熔岩龙会在巢中储存宝藏，但他们那灼热巢穴自身的性质却限制了藏品的类型，只有金属、宝石和能够抵御火山内部热量的物品才能被纳入他们的宝库里。
Young Magma Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

LxYfnrKWPcZkzYgL.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

cPd8aBLUXVC2uVQc.name: 燃烧之手(随意施法) Burning Hands (At Will)
cPd8aBLUXVC2uVQc.description:
一团火焰从你的手中喷出。你对区域内的每个生物造成2d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

MVRIjPsJ2e4QYHM9.name: 偏转之翼 Wing Deflection
MVRIjPsJ2e4QYHM9.description:
触发 龙成为攻击的目标。

效果 龙抬起一边的翅膀，在对抗触发攻击时AC获得+2环境加值。若龙正在飞行，它在攻击后会下降10尺的高度。

J1OKxBmPeSehcjj9.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
J1OKxBmPeSehcjj9.description:
The dragon breathes a blast of magma that deals [[/r {5d6}[fire]]]{5d6火焰伤害} and [[/r {3d12}[bludgeoning]]]{3d12钝击伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

LBtPHwiQcsiBIHG7.name: Draconic Frenzy
LBtPHwiQcsiBIHG7.description: 龙以任意顺序作出两次爪抓打击和一次角顶打击。

pKF3w8Hj8QFO6ZMv.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
pKF3w8Hj8QFO6ZMv.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Pd7VzQqoVyctHCLg.name: 熔岩泳者 Magma Swim
Pd7VzQqoVyctHCLg.description: 熔岩龙的游泳速度仅限于龙在熔岩或者融化的岩浆内游泳时生效。

Young Magma Dragon (Spellcaster).name: Young Magma Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Magma Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
熔岩龙在其他龙里以其不可预测且傲慢的秉性而闻名。熔岩龙那随时可能猛烈爆发的脾气和性格使得他们通常都过着孤独的生活，哪怕是刚孵化的幼龙，也会在离巢之前频繁地争吵斗殴以确保自身的支配地位。熔岩龙的爆发都有缘由，而且往往可以证明这种突如其来的转变是合情合理的，但他们通常觉得没必要为此多费唇舌。

熔岩龙火山活跃的山脉或者地下深处的巨大熔岩湖汇总筑巢。和所有其他真龙一样，熔岩龙会在巢中储存宝藏，但他们那灼热巢穴自身的性质却限制了藏品的类型，只有金属、宝石和能够抵御火山内部热量的物品才能被纳入他们的宝库里。
Young Magma Dragon (Spellcaster).senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

IqEYrNctOMJsWe6k.name: 原能准备法术 Primal Prepared Spells

LxYfnrKWPcZkzYgL.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

M2m1kK00DFN4SWQb.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
M2m1kK00DFN4SWQb.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

Pd7VzQqoVyctHCLg.description: 熔岩龙的游泳速度仅限于龙在熔岩或者融化的岩浆内游泳时生效。

Young Umbral Dragon.name: Young Umbral Dragon
Young Umbral Dragon.publicNotes:
尽管其他原龙都来自元素位面，但残忍且心怀恶意的影龙却起源于阴影位面的深处。影龙那光滑的黑色鳞片以及蛇形的优雅身躯使其能够从暗处发动突袭，而这些生物也以其最终终结猎物之前玩弄猎物的行为而声名昭彰。这些阴影能量构成的生物有着腐败的饮食癖好，他们对死灵腐肉的喜爱远胜于其他食物。这种怪异的饥渴可能会为周遭的人类社群带来意外的好处，但最终影龙猎杀和杀死不死生物的行为仅仅是为了食欲，而非出于保护他们免受死灵侵袭的愿望。因此这种意外的好运通常都很短暂，当影龙吃光了他最爱的猎物后，便会转而攻击周遭的活物。影龙有时候会为了获得他们喜好的食物而无所不用其极，甚至会亲自创造不死生物然后再以它们为食。

尽管影龙拥有强大的力量，但他们却对公平战斗不感兴趣。当他们面对任何可能对自己造成实际伤害的危险时，都会逃入阴影之中并运用手下的走卒伺机反攻，而不会让自己的生命承担风险。影龙的宝藏五花八门，通常是在把坟墓变为自己的猎食场搜刮这些地方增加自己的财富。影龙对祖传的宝物有着强烈的尊重和兴趣，而他们找来为自己的宝库增光添彩的高价物品，通常都是自己吃掉的尸体和鬼魂世代传下来的宝物。
Young Umbral Dragon.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

tCTtMSu5Ius1bg6U.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

qoSUaPSmr9BrJU8V.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
qoSUaPSmr9BrJU8V.description:
The dragon breathes a blast of darkness that deals [[/r {12d6}[negative]]]{12d6 negative energy伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

Undead creatures take [[/r {14d6}[force]]]{14d6力场伤害} instead of the negative damage.

eR8AFynWU8vfsTA9.description: 龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次翼击打击。

5SaRw4TGk2D0VBTZ.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

W1bCVUm0sI8Wl7Bs.name: 幽灵之灾 Ghost Bane
W1bCVUm0sI8Wl7Bs.description: An umbral dragon's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune, and an umbral dragon's jaws deal an additional [[/r {4d6}[force]]]{4d6力场伤害} to undead.

Young Umbral Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:

x6Fx0o3DKt1aRugD.name: 梦魇术 Nightmare
x6Fx0o3DKt1aRugD.description:
你向目标送去一段恼人的噩梦。在目标下一次入睡时，它必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果你知道目标的名字但是从未遇见过它，目标在意志豁免上获得+4环境加值。

大成功 目标不承受任何负面效果，并暂时免疫1星期。

成功 目标经历了噩梦，但不会承受除了糟糕回忆以外的负面效果。

失败 目标经历噩梦，并且在醒来时 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

大失败 目标经历噩梦，醒来时疲乏，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} 直到不再疲乏。

Zebub.name: Zebub
Zebub.publicNotes:
Zebubs serve as Hell's messengers and spies. Their ability to share what they've seen with other creatures makes them especially useful-not only to other devils, but also to mortal conjurers. Some infernal lords unleash them in enormous, horrid swarms upon unsuspecting lands to debase flesh and land alike while collecting secrets the infernal host might later put to use. Zebubs use any opportunity to manipulate weak-willed or easily tempted mortals into serving the zebubs' whims. While arrogant and deceitful, zebubs lack the cunning and confidence of most devils, and thus their schemes often focus on satisfying self-serving or self-destructive ambitions. Zebubs form from the souls of childish and craven mortals, reshaped by the archdevil Baalzebul in the frozen, filthy wastes of Hell's seventh layer, Cocytus.

每一种特定类型的魔鬼都在地狱官僚结构和阶级制度中扮演着特定的角色，而其中有些魔鬼承担的职责比其他魔鬼更加专业化。
Zebub.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Z60YSknQUrMbR4mB.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

BkBEhqLM3mXNI13M.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
BkBEhqLM3mXNI13M.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

lQzCQf7gDhv2S88W.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
lQzCQf7gDhv2S88W.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

JLbHt0LM9WGhFhGj.name: 召唤动物(仅限集群) Summon Animal (Swarm creatures only)
JLbHt0LM9WGhFhGj.description:
你创造一个为你而战的动物。你召唤一个具有动物特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。升阶该法术会增加你能召唤的生物的最大等级。

升阶 (2环级) 等级 1

升阶 (3环级) 等级 2

升阶 (4环级) 等级 3

升阶 (5环级) 等级 5

升阶 (6环级) 等级 7

升阶 (7环级) 等级 9

升阶 (8环级) 等级 11

升阶 (9环级) 等级 13

升阶 (10环级) 等级 15

MhPq4EOlBLppwQeu.name: Cocytan Filth
MhPq4EOlBLppwQeu.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

潜伏期 [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} (1天)

LNbjPm5a6CTl4lko.name: Infernal Eye
LNbjPm5a6CTl4lko.description:
The zebub records everything they see, and though they don't remember all observations, they can pass them along to another creature.

The zebub replays 10 minutes of witnessed events to a touched willing creature, which receives the memories in a flash of information. By remaining in contact, the zebub can spend additional 3-action activities to replay more information.

After relaying their visions to another, the zebub can't ever recall those events again.

QZup3O3zcKH6TFZd.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
QZup3O3zcKH6TFZd.description:
The zebub's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Zelekhut.name: Zelekhut
Zelekhut.publicNotes:
A zelekhut is a bounty hunter and executioner. The zelekhut resembles a mechanical centaur crafted from silvery metal with golden clockwork wings adorning its back. Instead of hands, the zelekhut's arms end in long, barbed chains that crackle with electricity. Whether sent by the powers of Axis or summoned by mortal authorities, the zelekhut seeks out those who continually evade justice-either through active flight, or by abusing their power and station-so as to bring justice to the multiverse's most notorious fugitives and criminals. Indeed, many a zelekhut's quarry are as famous for their ability to evade capture as for the crimes they commit.

Though the zelekhut is implacable and unrelenting in enforcing sentences, it does not pass judgments of its own or take the initiative in pursuing targets of opportunity. While hunting a condemned serial killer or notorious thief across half a dozen planes, the zelekhut wouldn't shift a single hoof to capture a corrupt ruler whose offenses are far greater. All zelekhuts understand that laws can and must differ from place to place, and it is not the zelekhut's job to moralize, merely to obey its rightful assignments and track down those who seek to flee their punishment.
Zelekhut.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

zMMs9T5D7z0TyE6H.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

hljYIMEGFNQ7w61Z.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
hljYIMEGFNQ7w61Z.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

TxRwH6kafpwqJtmQ.name: Truespeech
TxRwH6kafpwqJtmQ.description: A zelekhut can speak with and understand any creature with a language.

DfefDz8ZxlBybpoa.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

iZA7ek0jbfpt5FDo.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

qfkx0yR9a3Qh4LsT.name: Double Attack
qfkx0yR9a3Qh4LsT.description: The zelekhut makes two chain Strikes, each targeting a different creature. Each Strike counts toward the zelekhut's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it has made both attacks. If the zelekhut subsequently uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown} action, it affects all creatures it hit with Double Attack.

Zomok.name: Zomok
Zomok.publicNotes: Mighty plant-dragons, zomoks prowl the woodlands, defending their homes from destructive forces while healing and restoring the woods following natural disasters and ravaging intruders. Zomoks vary in appearance with the seasons, growing verdant green in the spring and summer, changing to autumnal colors in the fall, and decaying to brown in winter. While zomoks can and often do swallow their foes, they have no real need to eat. Any creature they gulp down is typically left behind as a mangled corpse the next time the zomok travels via their Forest Step ability. Zomoks reach 35 to 40 feet in length and weigh 30 tons.
Zomok.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺

lIhEV7aWkpaAEZbm.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

wFwYkevdZGRjwibC.name: 魅惑术(仅限植物) Charm (plant creatures only)
wFwYkevdZGRjwibC.description:
在目标看来，你的言语甜蜜动听，你的形象笼罩在梦幻般的光晕中。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免，如果你或者你的盟友最近威胁它或者对它进行了敌对行为，会获得+4环境加值。

你可以解消该法术。如果你对目标使用任何敌对动作，法术终止。当该法术结束时，目标不一定会意识到自己被魅惑了，除非它和你的友好关系，或者你说服它去做的事情与其期望发生冲突。这也即是说你可以通过常规的方法说服目标继续作为你的朋友。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且意识到你尝试魅惑它。

成功 该目标不受影响，但是认为你的法术是某种无害的东西，而不是魅惑术，除非它能识别该法术（通常通过辨识法术（Identifying Spells））。

失败 目标对你的态度变为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{友好 Friendly}）。如果已经是友好，则变为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{乐于帮助 Helpful}。它不能对你做出敌对行为。

大失败 目标变为乐于帮助（helpful）并且不能对你做出敌对行为。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备。

升阶 (8环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备，并且你能以至多10个生物作为目标。

6JJdqYYhIoqVcIMD.name: 原初的呼唤(不需要次要施法者) Primal Call (doesn't require secondary casters)
6JJdqYYhIoqVcIMD.description: 该仪式的功能就如同 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vgy00hnqxN9VoeoF]{异界盟友 Planar Ally} 一般，不过你需要制作仙女环（faerie circle），以及呼唤的是100英里内的一个动物（animal）、野兽（beast）、精类（fey）、菌类（fungus）或植物（plant）。

Q61EcGc9xdoDN1Kb.name: 植物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Plants (Constant)
Q61EcGc9xdoDN1Kb.description: 你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答，但该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

grFGZyZ8952tQ9yF.name: Entombing Breath
grFGZyZ8952tQ9yF.description:
The zomok blasts forth a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of earth and gravel, dealing [[/r {17d6}[bludgeoning]]]{17d6钝击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true] save); @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to this saving throw. Creatures touching the ground that fail their saves take a 10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} (逃脱 DC 34) on a critical failure.

The zomok can't use Entombing Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

The bodies of creatures slain by Entombing Breath instantly decompose and are destroyed-they can be restored to life only by a 7th-level or higher spell or ritual that restores life. The creature's equipment is unharmed but buried under 5 feet of earth.

Rid4PCaJM2edDiKh.name: Forest Step
Rid4PCaJM2edDiKh.description:
频率 three times per天

效果 The zomok teleports itself with the effects of a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door} spell, but the zomok must begin and end the teleportation effect in forest terrain. The zomok regains [[/r {10d10}[healing]]]{10d10生命值} during this teleportation. Creatures swallowed by the zomok are left behind.

The zomok can't use Forest Step again for [[/br 1d6+1 #rounds]]{1d6+1轮}.

Zyss Serpentfolk.name: Zyss Serpentfolk
Zyss Serpentfolk.publicNotes: Even the least among zyss serpentfolk consider themselves greater than any mammal. Their magical abilities, most notably their telepathy, are all the reason they need to hold this view. And it's true enough that the instinctual skill and magic of any zyss is enough to best the average human.
Zyss Serpentfolk.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

yZqrximA9jX4lr29.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

FtmumZg3l3SZaIex.name: 镜影术(随意施法) Mirror Image (At will)
FtmumZg3l3SZaIex.description:
三个你的幻象在你的位置旋转，令想要攻击攻击你的人可能会命中一个幻象，而不是你本人。任何要命中你的攻击会有随机概率命中你的一个幻象，而不是你本身。如果三个幻象均存在，有四分之一的几率命中你（1d4骰出1）。如果两个幻象存在，有三分之一的概率命中你（1d6骰出1-2）。仅有一个幻象时，概率为二分之一（1d6骰出1-3）。

当一个幻象被命中时，它会被摧毁。如果一个攻击骰没有命中你的AC，但是也没有大失败，它会摧毁一个幻象，但是没有额外的效果（即使该攻击在失败时通常会有效果）。如果一次攻击骰大成功，并且将命中一个幻象，一个幻象被摧毁，并且攻击骰变为对你的一次成功攻击。当所有幻象被摧毁时，该法术结束。

CZh0sJkqcSdR6tyg.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At will)
CZh0sJkqcSdR6tyg.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

3M2SYWM5VaJw4Y1F.name: 腹语术(随意施法) Ventriloquism (At will)
3M2SYWM5VaJw4Y1F.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

8GCV9NHdglsydwmB.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

c74H6Oxpa5sZzsN5.name: +4 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Mental

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段2 [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)
